Manager Response: Hello Tour46087,  Thank you so much for the kind feedback! We are glad the birthday celebration went smoothly. We always love when people are celebrating a special occasion with us. We look forward to seeing you back for your next Disneyland adventure.

Summary: Enjoyed our stay here - very friendly and accommodating staff.  Rooms were spacious, clean, and plenty for our family after a full day at the park!  Breakfast hours are short - so plan accordingly especially after a full day/night at the park. Will probably make this our hotel choice from now on.
Manager Response: Thank you Desiree A!  Thank you so much for making us your choice in hotels! We know you have a lot of options in terms of places to stay in Anaheim and it means the world to us that you choose to stay here with us. We will pass along your words of praise to our staff and we look forward to seeing you back again soon!

Summary: Everytime we make plans for Disney Land we have always made Homewood our home away from home. The staff is so friendly and courteous no matter the time of day.  Breakfast and evening social are a major plus and such a great variety.
Manager Response: Hello Mararm2019!  Thank you so much for the kind review. We always love when guests make our hotel their "Home away from Home." We will pass along your words of praise to our staff and our F&B team. We look forward to your next Anaheim vacation!

Summary: We stayed here with our family while going to Disney Land for three days. from the moment we stepped into the front door we loved this place. Staff were so friendly and helpful and it is such a fantastic hotel for families and kids and there is so many things to do at the hotel rather than go to Disney!!! hahahaha The shuttle next door is very handy and free although the front entrance to Disney is actually not that far too walk which we did a few times. The free breakfast was fantastic and that way you could have a good sized breakfast prior to hitting Disney. Overall very impressive and anyone with kids I highly recommend. We are from Australia and will be telling all our Aussie friends that this is a great place to stay if you want to go to Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you so much Brent Aussie!  We appreciate the positive review and we are very grateful you and your family enjoyed your stay with us. Our staff is always going above and beyond for our guests and we are so glad that you loved everything. We appreciate your recommendation for other families, and would love to have you back on your next venture from Australia.

Summary: We had minor hiccups during our most recent stay at Homewood Suites Anaheim Convention Center. What Stood our to me is Assistant General Manager Mark recognize me and he remembers who I am from my prior stays at Homewood Suites. This is huge for someone of his stature to interact with guests during breakfast.  Mark took time to check in with me and my entire family.  He impressed my family as well. I spent a few minutes to share with him about my experience the day before. Mark took time to listen to me and made me feel a lot better after our brief conversation. He assured me that he would attend to the subject that concerned me. In good faith, he said he would credit me for one night of my stay for the inconvenience. Before ending his shift, Mark conducted a follow up call  to
Manager Response: Hello sovandyh!  I am so apologetic for any inconveniences that were faced during the first half of your stay. Thank you for the opportunity you have given us in order to, "Make it right." We always strive to give guests the best experience possible, and we will do better next time. We have already followed up with your concerns and know what could have been done differently. Please know that from everyone at this hotel, we appreciate you, your family and all of the stays that you all have accumulated. It's comments like this and people like you that make our hotel more of a HOMEwood than a regular Hilton brand hotel property, and we always want our family to feel at HOME when staying with us. We look forward to your next Anaheim venture in December 2019! - Mark

Summary Heading: Great for families that need extra space
Summary: Homewood Suites is our go to when we need a separate bedroom / living room for family travel. This hotel has the best location! We like staying near the Toy Story Parking Lot for transportation to/from Disneyland. Rooms are clean, elevators are quick, and staff is super friendly. Free breakfast is the best we've found - waffles, eggs, bacon, oatmeal, multiple cereal choices, juice, milk, coffee, fruit..... great way to start a long day at the park. If you stay during the week they also have a light dinner option in the early evening - including wine and beer for parents. We haven't used the pool, but the area looked clean and inviting. Wasn't our first stay - and won't be our last!
Manager Response: Hello monicas764,  Thank you so much for the kind feedback! We love that we are your choice hotel when booking a suite and we are pleased that you had such a great experience with us. We take a lot of pride in our breakfast area and cleanliness, so it means a lot that you mention both of those in a positive way. We will pass along your words of praise to the team and we can't wait to see you back again soon!

Summary: The front desk was pleasant and helpful.  The room was clean with no carpet.  It was quiet and the bathroom was well lit, clean, relatively spacious, and thoughtfully laid.  In fact the whole room was setup in a thoughtful way that made things easy.  The included breakfast was way nicer than expected.  It was not the standard continental breakfast, but rather a legitimate hot breakfast with plenty of options.  It worked for our group even with food sensitivities.  The parking was easy and the location was convenient.  It's not a luxury hotel, but I was super happy with the quality over all.
Manager Response: Hello taylor55,  Thank you so much for the kind feedback! We are pleased that you found our front desk team to be pleasant and helpful. They are always providing good recommendations for our guests and always have a great ideas. I'm glad you were able to find the flow of our rooms to be preferable. We try to make your stay as fun and easy as possible. Thank you again for your kind acknowledgment of our parking and breakfast area. Those two touch points tend to be very important to us and we always try our best to maintain them.

Summary: Homewood Suites Anaheim Convention Center is a perfect location to stay when visiting Disneyland. It is walking distance to Disneyland and their bus transportation if you don‚Äôt want to walk all the way to the park. The staff at Homewood Suites make your stay very comfortable. Very friendly and customer orientated. Highly recommend for your stay whether on business or pleasure.
Manager Response: Hello richardwN8388VY,  Thank you for considering us your perfect location to stay. That means the world to us and we are pleased that you enjoyed yourself while at our hotel. As always, we pride ourselves in our customer service, and I'm glad you experienced the best. We greatly value your recommendation and we look forward to accommodating your friends and family in the future!

Summary: This hotel was excellent. Very friendly front desk staff and the room was very clean and nicely appointed. What I really liked about this hotel was the really good variety of breakfast options and the social nights during the week which also had great food options. This was the 2nd hotel we had stayed at in Anaheim and was far superior to our other hotel and even though it is a bit further away from Disneyland, getting an Uber or the toy story bus from next door and back from Disney was easy. Be warned though when I say next door it is still a bit of a hike especially after your third day of Disney and your legs feel like they are going to fall off.  All in all a great hotel.
Manager Response: Hello ladychippy,  Thank you for the kind acknowledgment for our excellence. We always strive for guests to have the best experience possible and I'm glad we were able to make a good impression. We are pleased you were able to utilize the shuttle and we appreciate you for saying we are superior to the other hotels in the area. That means a lot, and we truly appreciate it!  We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: This is a great hotel to stay at for Disneyland trip. Our family usually stays here every year when we go. The breakfast is fantastic compared to some of the other hotels around, and the rooms are very clean and spacious. The toy story parking lot is right behind the hotel so you can catch the shuttle for free to ride to Disneyland. The staff is also great and very friendly. The pool is awesome there is nothing bad to say about this hotel at all. This trip though we felt that the beds were a little dated and uncomfortable, the couch was also a little saggy and uncomfortable. Hopefully they will update some of the furniture before our next stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much Jet 318000,  We greatly appreciate the kind words and nice review. Thank you specifically for taking special note of our delicious breakfast and convenient location! We are sorry that you found our beds to be dated and/or uncomfortable. We always want our guests to have the best experience possible. We will share your comments with the team for improvement purposes and see what we can do in terms of mattress replacement. Thank you!

Summary Heading: Good value hotel that was fit for purpose - visiing Disneyland Parks
Summary: The hotel is good value for money and in a good location for Disneyland.  We had a family of four in a room with a separate bedroom and kitchenette which we felt was a good size and fit for purpose.  The hotel also has a reasonable pool and spa which was nice to use after a long day walking.    The location is around 15 minutes walk to Disneyland or there is a free Disney shuttle bus from the car park next door to the Disneyland entrance.  The only downside was that the free breakfast was awful and unhealthy (in our view), and at peak time (pre-Disney opening) it can be a feeding frenzy.  Despite the fact we were on a budget, we avoided the free food to find some nicer and healthier options nearby.    All in all this was a good value option that was fit for purpose.
Manager Response: Thank you mr35,  We greatly appreciate your feedback and value your reflection on the experience that you had at our hotel. We are glad that you appreciated our convenient location and spacious accommodations. However, I apologize that you did not have the best experience at breakfast. We will follow-up with the team and see what kind of delicious and healthy options we can add for improvement purposes. We hope you choose to stay with us again sometime, We look forward to seeing you soon!

Summary: The Homewood suites are perfect. We found them very comfortable, roomy and well located to all attractions as well as restaurants. The staff are just wonderful, kind and always attentive. We will definitely be coming back! Thanks for being the perfect home away from home xox
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind review! We are glad you found such great comfort in one of our suites. Thank you for identifying our convenient location and friendly staff. We will make sure your kind words of praise are passed around to the correct departments. We look forward to accommodating you next time you are in town!

Summary: Super convenient to Disneyland.  The staff was terrific and helpful.  The room was clean and the beds comfy.  The full breakfast is a great amenity.  This is a terrific value with oodles of amenities!  I highly recommend this Homewood Suites for friends, family, for pleasure or business.  I only wish they had a restaurant.you really can‚Äôt do better.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the nice review! We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us and pleased that you enjoyed our breakfast and the diversity of hotel amenities that are here on property. Thank you again for kindly referring your friends to us. My apologies that our dining area is only open for breakfast and evening dinner Mon-Thurs. However, we usually have a great list of nearby restaurants that do pick-up and delivery orders. Please let us know at check-in if you would like a list of good local restaurants. We look forward to your next vacation!

Summary: Comfortable, clean and good location. Convenient to Disneyland but they do charge for shuttle to the park. Rate was $7 per person per day when we were there. Cheaper to Uber if you have a small group.
Manager Response: Hello Jmatthews1985,  Thank you for your detailed feedback. We are apologetic that you had some confusion with the shuttle. I will pass this information along to our desk and see what we can do for training and improvement purposes. Thank you again for your consideration in choosing out hotel and we look forward to seeing you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Comfortable, Clean & Conveniently Located near Disney
Summary: Quality accommodation - clean spacious rooms, excellent complementary breakfast, friendly & helpful staff & just a 15 minute brisk walk to Disneyland.  Nice pool & mini golf area a bonus.  Would definitely return.
Manager Response: Hello lisajmk74,  Thank you for the nice review and kind recognition. We are glad you enjoyed our amenities and accommodating suites. Our staff always loves taking care of our guests and always exceed expectations. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: Overall nothing special about this hotel.  I don‚Äôt know what I was expecting, but given it‚Äôs high TripAdvisor rating, maybe my expectations were a bit high.  The room appeared clean, needed a remodel.  No USB outlets which made charging phones difficult.  Tub old.  Just needs a refresh.  Breakfast area typical, friendly staff.  Went down to desk to get diamond benefits and all they gave me was the water, no cookies.  Horrible first world problem, I know :)  It‚Äôs fine, but nothing extraordinary.
Manager Response: Hello xiphoid76,  Thank you so much for the feedback. We are truly apologetic that your stay was anything but perfect. We appreciate your recommendation about the USB outlets and we will look into that idea and see what can be done. If you would like to call me sometime, I would love to chat with you further and see what can be done to fix the concern regarding the in-room telephones. We always strive to make guests stay as easy and enjoyable as possible. Please feel free to contact me on my direct phone number: (714) 705-0531. We value you as a diamond member and we would love to have you back whenever you are in town! - Mark

Summary Heading: Great family friendly place to stay
Summary: Great family friendly place to stay and it had bunk beds which the kids loved. Walking distance to Disneyland and heaps of restaurants. Very helpful staff. The large laundry was an added bonus and is cheap to use.
Manager Response: Hello Haylesrmc,  Thank you so much for the nice review! We are glad you enjoyed our location‚Äôs convenience to some great nearby restaurants. The Garden Walk always has amazing options and is very close by. We look forward to your next Disneyland adventure.  Best regards,  Mark

Summary: This would be a five star review except for one small detail I‚Äôll explain in a minute.   First, the positives. The hotel staff were amazing. From the front desk to housekeeping, everyone was pleasant and polite. The breakfasts were terrific. Evening small plates were solid, too. Proximity to Disneyland is awesome and the bunk bed option for a suite was great.   That brings me to the one detail. My mother-in-law slept in the bottom bunk and found an iPod in the bed. That caused me to wonder when the bed was last changed. An iPod seems like something found when cleaning and changing sheets.   Again, I wouldn‚Äôt hesitate to stay at this hotel in the future. They do a terrific job. Just a bit shy of five stars though.
Manager Response: Hello dolamroth,  Thank you so much for sharing you experience with us. You have identified an area of opportunity and rest assured, your concern will be addressed. Thank you again for choosing our hotel and we look forward to your next stay with us.  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: For more than 18 years my husband and I have always stayed at a Hilton Hotel and Homewood Suites it one of my more favorites.  The reason its my favorite is due to the size of the room, and the breakfast.  However, this particular location was very disappointing.  The room was so small, that my husband and I could not pass together back to back between the bed and the dresser, and I am not a large person, I am 5'3, 138 lbs.   We heard stomping from the room above until 2:30 am on our second night stay.  The staff at check in desk was pleasant, the staff at the breakfast not so much.  We have annual passes at Disneyland, and I assure we will not pick this Hilton Hotel again.
Manager Response: Hello ShariV2124,  I‚Äôm so sorry that your stay with us was less than perfect. We always strive for our guests to have the best stay possible and it appears there is some follow-up that can be done. I feel horrible that you no longer wish to stay with us. We will try to improve as much as possible and look forward to hopefully having you back as our guest in the future. Please feel free to contact me directly in case I can help with accommodations.  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary Heading: Proximity to Disneyland and Complimentary breakfast make this a perfect family hotel.
Summary: Complimentary breakfast was good and plentiful, pool very nice, staff helpful, great destination for a family going to Disneyland.  Free shuttle service to Disney within easy walking distance. Very clean, nice helpful staff.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the generous feedback! Our staff is always doing an amazing job and we are pleased that you enjoyed the pool and the convenience to the park. We greatly appreciate your business and look forward to welcoming you back to the Disneyland area.

Summary Heading: Clean well designed rooms, excellent staff!
Summary: We really enjoyed our stay at Homewood Suites Anaheim Convention Center. We loved the idea of the king bed and bunk beds in the room. My kids are older (20,17) and it was nice that they had their own bed without having it be an uncomfortable sofa bed.  The staff was amazing! We felt like we were kings and queens and we couldn‚Äôt have had a better experience.
Manager Response: Hello Stranmer!  Thank you! We really appreciate the nice comments about our staff. They are always trying to help our guests have the best vacation possible. I'm glad our beds were large enough to accommodate your family. Thank you again for the nice review and we look forward to your next Convention Center visit!

Summary Heading: This is an EXCELLENT location to stay at for your Disneyland trip!
Summary: I want to lie and say that this hotel was awful so no one goes there and I can keep it all to myself but it was fantastic.  What can I say...beautiful and clean rooms, excellent buffet breakfast every day, a manager's reception Monday thru Thursday, a beautiful pool area and the list goes on and on.  They have refrigerators and a small kitchen area in each room which is awesome and is great for stocking up on snacks and waters.  It is a short walk (about 1/4 of a mile) to the Disneyland parking area where you can catch a bus to the parks.  I want to point out that when you stay at most hotels nowadays you never really see "the manager."  Not here.  Mark was present and definitely taking care of the guests of this hotel.  I have stayed at numerous places in Anaheim and this one
Manager Response: jp_1674!  You are far too good to us. Thank you for the kind words and praise. We are pleased that you were able to enjoy the main high points of our property: Breakfast, Evening Reception, Pool Area, Full-size kitchen and refrigerator for each suite. We appreciate you recognizing an area of opportunity with your language barrier concern. Rest assured we will follow-up and resolve this with our team. Thank you again and we look forward to welcoming you back to the area for your next Disneyland adventure! - Mark

Summary: Overall loved this hotel! Location is great for Disneyland and all the staff I encountered during my stay were so kind and accommodating. We arrived a little before check-in time but luckily they had our room ready! I forgot the name of the gal that checked us in but she was very kind and stated all the amenities hotel provided. Room overall is very spacious with fridge, microwave, sink and dishes! Room was clean and comfy. The bathroom was also spacious which gets plus points from me. The AC didn't make much noise and loved that it would stay at the temperature you would set. We did enjoy the breakfast as well. Breakfast area was spacious even with a crowd. They had a great selection with kind staff. I would consider staying here again as we travel to Disney a couple times out
Manager Response: Hello travellovermandm!  Thank you so much for the five-star review. We truly appreciate your feedback and we will make sure to pass along your praise to our staff. If you would like to call me, I would be more than happy to find out who checked you in for recognition purposes. I love giving kudos to my staff for great service. Thank you for the nice words in regards to our suites and we are glad the temperature control and breakfast were satisfactory. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: Maybe the best experience I've had for a hotel in this price range.  Very pleasantly surprised about the quality of the food...normally hotel food is meh.  This was pretty good, with a number of healthier options including fruit that actually was fresh.  Next door to Disney parking lot so you can catch a bus to the parks.
Manager Response: Hello moneil810,  Thank you so much for the kind feedback. We are glad you appreciate our value and we are extremely pleased that you enjoyed the food served and especially the fruit. The convenience to the parks is always a plus and we look forward to welcoming you back into the area for more fun soon!

Summary: This was the best hotel I ever stayed in. The breakfast was excellent and there was a lot of food to choose from. My children loved that they could see the fireworks from the room. Also, the room was very sound proof we didn't hear anything the 4 days we stayed.
Manager Response: Wow Aajr85!  That means a lot and I'm glad you enjoyed your stay so much with us. The breakfast is always a good way to add extra value to your stay and delicious as well. We love that you were able to see the fireworks from your suite and glad that the room was quiet for you and your family to enjoy. We look forward to your next vacation. See you soon!

Summary: This hotel is very clean and the beds are comfortable. It is very quiet. Friendly staff. Great breakfast. The location and ease of getting on shuttles to Disney is very easy and convenient. This is a great place for a family stay when visiting Anaheim.
Manager Response: Hello N4246LIlauram!  We love that you enjoyed our hotel so much. We will pass along your words of praise to our staff and look forward to having you back again soon for your next Disneyland venture.

Summary: Great hilton property - clean, fresh, well maintained, nice breakfast, so so 'social hour', friendly & helpful staff.  GREAT location right next to Toy Story parking lot for easy shuttle to Disneyland & downtown Disney.  We booked two adjacent rooms for our extended family, and both had views of evening fireworks.
Manager Response: Hello MaryE2564!  Thank you for the nice feedback. We are pleased you enjoyed our breakfast, convenient location and friendly staff. The firework view rooms are always fun. It allows guests to enjoy a nice drink and some snacks while sitting in the comfort of your own room to watch the show. We look forward to having you and the extended family back again for more fun in the future.

Summary Heading: Great stay and a walk to Disneyland
Summary: Great hotel and loved how close it was to Disneyland.  Staff was friendly and hotel was clean.  Enjoyed breakfast at the hotel prior to heading off to Disneyland.  Check in and out was quick and made for a great stay.
Manager Response: Hello maryclimo,  Thank you so much for the nice review! We appreciate you taking special note of our convenient location and friendly staff. We are glad you enjoyed our breakfast. It is always fresh and convenient. We look forward to welcoming you back for your next Disneyland adventure.

Summary: Homewood Suites was situated in a very convenient location. Close to Disney and many restaurants. The Disney Toy Story Parking Lot is right next door and you can hop on their shuttles for free. Our booked tours picked us up right in the hotel lot and the Super Shuttle from LAX dropped us right at the door as well. The rooms are large and very clean. We sat outside around the fireplace in the evening to relax and chat with other guests and it was fun. The breakfasts were really good with sausage, eggs, waffles, pancakes, breakfast potatoes, yogurt, cereal, muffins pretty all the staples were offered and varied slightly each morning. Nice way to begin your day. I will definitely stay here again when returning to the Anaheim.
Manager Response: Hello Carolyn J!  We sincerely thank you for your kind feedback! We are please that you and your family enjoyed your stay with us and especially glad that you enjoyed our breakfast. We will make sure to pass along your praise to the team and anticipate your next Anaheim venture.  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary Heading: Great stay! I will always stay here when coming to Disney!
Summary: I recommend this hotel to everyone when going to Disneyland. Truly a gem!! Convinient, clean and always accommodating! This hotel is my favorite. It is next store to the Toy Story parking lot which I love. I am able to take the stroller and my mom can take her electric scooter right on the shuttle rather than loading it into the car. Also saves you the Disney parking fee each day! Breakfast is an amazing bonus! Get up, eat and head out to the parks!
Manager Response: Greetings Jen R!  Thank you so much for your kind review. We love that we are your favorite hotel and that your family has found such a nice comfort and convenience. We are glad you were able to take advantage of our parking and shuttle system. We are always cooking up tasty creations for our breakfast area. We hope to see you back again soon!  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: Great hotel close to shuttle to Disneyland friendly staff very clean and spacious great pool good food wonderful stay will stay again for sure !! Great price..pillows were not good but everything else was fantastic!!
Manager Response: Hello Kandie B,  Thank you so much for the nice comment! We will make sure to pass along your words of praise to our staff and we are pleased that you enjoyed everything. We will make sure to take a good look at our pillows for replacement purposes. Thank you for your suggestion with that.  Looking forward to your next Anaheim vacation!  Mark Morihiro

Summary: Researched for a very long time and homewood suites lived up to its expectations. We arrived early and the front desk was very kind and gave us a pool key and parking pass to use until check in. Unfortunately There were no rooms available to check in early or they would have got us into a room. The pool area was fantastic. Bathrooms, splash pad, kiddie pool, hot tub, game room and main pool all in the fenced pool area and basketball and mini golf though a gate. Breakfast was wonderful with so many things to choose from. Breakfast was busy but plenty of seating. Our room was the best set up. Bunk beds with a trundle, king bed, crib which was a crib and not pack and play, and sofa bed. Very comfortable. We walked to Disney and took the shuttle. Nice to take the woody lot shuttle
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review! We greatly appreciate your consideration and we are pleased you enjoyed our splash pad, kiddie pool, hot tub and game room! We are also pleased that you enjoyed the set-up of your room as well. We look forward to having you come back again soon!  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: Being a Marriott rewards member we have not stayed outside that chain for years. But when shopping the Anaheim/Garden Grove area for this trip their rates were higher and their reviews were a little worrisome, so I thought I‚Äôd take a look around. I am very happy I did because I found the Homewood Suites! Their rates were comparable to other hotels in the area. The rooms were clean and the bed was a little firm but comfortable. The full size refrigerator was handy. The pool area appeared to have nice seating and barbecues and a nice fire pit. In our opinion, it‚Äôs breakfast buffet was better than average with several hot choices. Lots of kids were enjoying their freshly made waffles! We personally loved the chicken enchiladas!! If going to Disneyland, the hotels location is
Manager Response: Hello AJVV24!  Thank you so much for your kind review of our hotel. We are pleased you enjoyed our spacious suites and accommodating amenities. We will make sure to pass along your words of praise to our kitchen crew about the enchiladas and we look forward to welcoming you for your next Anaheim venture.   See you soon!  Mark Morihiro

Summary: Very nice hotel within walking distance to Disneyland. Good breakfast everyday and evening social light dinner Monday thru Thursday. Nice having kitchen area with good size fridge with freezer to keep drinks and snacks.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind feedback! We always recommend guests stop by for our evening dinner service  (Mon-Thurs from 5-7pm). We are always serving up tasty creations and keeping our menu fresh. We look forward to welcoming you back for your next Anaheim venture!  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: A huge thank you to Adrian and Lorena.  Both were very helpful during my check in and I appreciate them .  The hotel was very quiet and extremely clean.  Definitely worth the stay. I usually stay with the Hyatt Brand but this Hilton had it all!!!!
Manager Response: Hello colby101105!  Thank you so much for acknowledging our front desk agents, Adrian and Lorena! They always take such pride in their work and do their best to exceed expectations. We also greatly appreciate your words about staying at Hilton properties. We look forward to seeing you back again soon for your next stay!  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary Heading: Great for Disneyland with the family
Summary: Great place for family to stay for Disney.  There is a shuttle right next door or you can drive it. It‚Äôs all very close.  For the price and room style (room with kitchen) it was an easy choice.  Would stay again

This hotel is less than 0.5 miles to Disneyland, and it was a pleasant walk to and from the park. Was glad we stayed here, and avoided parking at Disneyland. The hotel was very clean, and there was plenty of parking.

My daughter and I took four 17 year olds to Disneyland. We stayed at Homewood Suites. They were so accommodating to all of us. The free breakfast and dinners was perfect when trying to feed teenagers. The staff was amazing and helpful. We will recommend them to our friends and will always stay there in the future.

We had one of our best stays ever near Disneyland at this hotel.  The breakfast and evening reception had a wide variety of choices. The beds were comfortable. I liked  the different options for room configurations. We had a very quiet room on the 5th floor overlooking the pool. We had a short walk over to the Toy Story parking lot each day and used the free trams to get to the parks. Very convenient, nicer room option!

We loved this hotel because of the people and the comfort. The staff made the biggest difference.  My children actually asked me to book this hotel again!   One example is during our evening meal (yes, it is worth having dinner here).  Elsa who works in the evening in dining area went out of her way to make sure that my children and I had exactly what we needed.  She was kind, attentive and simply wonderful!

We booked this hotel through Disney as a ‚ÄòGood Neighbor Hotel‚Äô and were not disappointed.   The suites are perfect for a family, immaculately clean and spacious.  Staff here are so friendly, everyone we encountered was polite, courteous and had a smile, nothing was too much trouble.  The breakfasts were ample to start the day and the evening reception (Mon - Thurs) was a really nice touch.  The proximity to the transport for Disneyland Resort was a real bonus and ran smoothly so you never had to wait too long to get a bus.  There are various restaurants in walking distance and it feels safe to be out on the evening.  The pool area is kept immaculate and is so inviting, the fire pit with the comfy seating is a real cosy addition.  This hotel is a real gem with staff who seemed
Manager Response: Hello JustM,  Thank you for the nice review and kind words. We are glad your stay with us went perfect and you found such a nice convenience at our hotel. It means a lot for your to identify our hotel as a "gem" and we look forward to having you back for your next Anaheim vacation.  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: Rooms are dated, but clean.  Close to Disneyland with free transportation from Disney parking lot next door.  Downside, you walk through a desolate parking lot thats dark to get to the hotel on your return back in the evenings.
Manager Response: Hello Connector25805699659,  We always strive for guests to have a perfect stay and we are sincerely apologetic that the walk back from the park left a bad impression of us. If you have a minute, I would love to speak with you directly. Please feel free to call me on my direct phone number: (714)705-0531. I look forward to connecting with you!  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: I came in on Monday and checked out on Tuesday morning. I love staying at Home Wood Suites they take such good care my Feather allergy making sure there are no Feathers in the room. The staff are the best the treat everyone like they are family
Manager Response: Hello Passenger29477,  Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us! I'm glad we were able to take care of your "No Feather" request and make your stay comfortable for you. We will make sure your words of praise are passed along to our staff and we look forward to seeing you again soon!  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: This is our favorite hotel near Disneyland.  We come down several times a year.  They are family oriented with many amenities.  We go based on their customer service.  Victoria has always given great service at the front desk. Elsa is always helping guests in the dining room.  Mike serving beer giving pointers on places to get a good Bavarian pretzel since we were teased thinking we would have pretzels during their social hour.  Other reasons we go are the beds, feelng safe, cleanliness, staff, food, rooms, pool, and other activities for the kids.  Mark is always helpful if we need anything.  The only thing I would change is those towels for the pool.  They are very small and are not soft.  I know they are that way so they don't disappear.  We go to other properties and none of
Manager Response: Hello gacloser2!  Thank you so much for identifying our staff. Mike is always full of great recommendations. Elsa and Victoria are always taking such great care of our guests and are huge assets to our team. We will make sure that everyone mentioned here gets the kudos they deserve and we look forward to seeing you come back again!  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: Great service , clean, family environment. Free breakfast and dinner . Very friendly staff , convenient to convention center and area attractions such as Disney and other fun stuff. Rooms have kitchen and furnished with everything u need. .
Manager Response: Hello Jeremy W!  Thank you for the nice review. I'm glad you were able to enjoy our convenient location and accommodating amenities. We will make sure you words of praise are passed along to our staff and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Thanks I will be staying here again soon! The staff was amazing the food and amenities were awesome hilton hotels are the best thanks alot hilton! I highly recommend any hilton hotel to anyone looking to stay
Manager Response: Hello MiyaE8,  We loved everything about your review! We will make sure your praise is passed along to our staff and we are very pleased with your recommendation. We will see you again soon!  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: A great clean place to stay with lots of amenities for a young couple going to Disneyland. The hotel offered a nice standard continental breakfast daily and a social hour with meals on weeknights. The food was well cooked and satisfying and I can imagine while not as delicious as eating out this is a great option for people looking to save money. The room service came and made our beds, switched out towels and changed garbages daily. They even unexpectedly did some of our dishes too! The front desk put goodies in our room for both our honeymoon upon arrival and then again on my birthday. When you‚Äôre already doing so much walking for Disneyland the hotel doesn‚Äôt seem too close for walking to stores/restaurants. However, we were easily and inexpensively able to Lyft to Target ($5
Manager Response: Hello Sara13y,  Thank you for the nice review. Congrats on your wedding and we are so glad that we were able to be part of such a special trip. We feel honored that we were able to help make it even more special. We look forward to hopefully having you and your family back for your future vacations.   Thank you again,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: Family stayed for 5 nights during our Dianeyland vacation.  We really enjoyed the amenities offered including the awesome breakfast, great social hour in the evenings, and the exciting outside areas (pool, basketball, putting green, and bar-b-que pits.  The beds were comfortable, the staff was friendly, and the room was perfect.  Added benefit of being right next door to the Toy Story parking lot was the cherry on top!  We will definitely be staying here again in the future!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the nice review. I‚Äôm glad you were able to enjoy all the amenities and the room. We can‚Äôt wait to see you back for your next Disneyland adventure!  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel several times and although it can be a bit more pricey than other options in the area it always delivers and you get what you pay for.  I want to single out Maribel at the front desk.  We arrived way early and our room wasn't ready... no problem.  We were allowed to park and went off to Disneyland.  When we returned late that night Maribel was at the front desk.  She had upgraded our two queen bed room to a premium king bed room.  When I explained that we needed at least two beds she gave us another premium king bed for free!!  Who does that??!!  We will continue to stay at this hotel and other Hilton locations because of people like Maribel.  I hope Hilton recognizes great employees like Maribel who truly take care of customers. Thank you again for
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and recognition of Maribel. We apologize that things didn‚Äôt work out as originally intended, but we are pleased that everything turned out perfect. We look forward to seeing you back again!  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: The hotel is a place for holidays but also for business people that don't want the manicured and staid hotels.  Front desk staff are very attentive - shout out for Mirabel plus restaurant staff are equally, if not more hard working - shout out for Elsa who all make the hotel feel and vibe.  I have been staying here on and off for the last 4 months and would not trade this place for anywhere else.   Ssssh don't tell anyone about this awesome place where you can see the fireworks from your hotel room each nite.

We've stayed here 4-5 times now, and it's our go to Hotel for Disneyland. It's walkable, but also right next to a Disney Parking Lot, and my kids often ride the parking shuttle when they don't feel like walking. Love the Pool area, love the breakfast, and love the evening socials. Rooms are big and perfect for our family. We will continue to stay here on our future Disney trips!
Manager Response: Hello missjennyavery,  Thank you so much for your continued loyalty to our hotel. We love that you have made us your choice in hotels in the Anaheim area. That means a lot! We will make sure to send your words of praise to our kitchen staff and pool maintenance crew. We greatly value you as a guest and look forward to welcoming you back on your future Disneyland ventures.  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: We stayed here as a springboard to explore LA and Anaheim. We didn't mind the drive into LA because it was nice to come back to a peaceful location after the congestion of the city. Breakfast had lots of options. We enjoyed the evening snacks served. The hotel is clean, staff is friendly, complimentary coffee and fruit and water are out all day. Kids loved the pool area which was pretty and well maintained. There is lots of outdoor seating and a great grill area. We did not use the grill but we saw plenty of others take advantage of it to make their dinners. Rooms are quiet, have a nice seating area, comfy king bed, and kitchen with dishes, fridge/freezer, silverware, microwave, garbage disposal, and stove top. Convenient to restaurants and stores. We couldn't have enjoyed our
Manager Response: Thank you blp1979,  We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us! We appreciate you mentioning our staff, food options, and spacious rooms. Our outdoor area is perfect for summertime. We are pleased that you were able to make yourselves at home. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary Heading: Great staff, clean rooms, no problems!!!
Summary: Convenient location to park shuttles, clean rooms, very friendly staff.  Property is well lit and maintained very well.  Parking lot is secure, breakfast is good, and short walk to anything you need.  I didn‚Äôt drive my car for two days since it all was close by.
Manager Response: Hello Navigator47497211344,  Thank you for your positive feedback. We truly appreciate your acknowledgment of our staff, location and lighting. Sometimes its the small things that are important and make a difference. We hope to see you back again soon!  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: Awesome friendly staff, great amenities such as breakfast, golf & basketball area, game room, outdoor grill. Pool size is okay. Social evening is great! Shuttle to Disney park is just right next door.
Manager Response: Thank you so much! We really appreciate the feedback and value your consideration in choosing to stay with us. We are pleased that you enjoyed our amenities and friendly staff. We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: The complementary breakfast is convenient. The evening social is also nice. Room is spacious and clean. Walk to convention center. Plenty of parking space. It would be good for both business and family stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the nice review! We are pleased you were able to take advantage of the food offered for breakfast and dinner. We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: Elsa Lopez was great.  She was very attentive to our needs and stayed on top of us the whole meal, making sure we had all that we needed.  She was amazing and helped to make our stay more enjoyable.  Awesome service.
Manager Response: Elsa is a Rockstar! We will make sure and pass along your praise. Thank you so much for staying with us and for your feedback. We hope to see you back again soon!  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary Heading: Checking in and out was quick and easy. The staff was helpful
Summary: The room was great, very quiet and clean. Our requests were all met, and it was very close to Lax so the bus service they offer was a short ride and pleasant. We had a handicap person with us and the room was user friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you Laureano2019,  We really appreciate your review and praise in regards to your room's cleanliness. We are glad your party was properly accommodated and we look forward to welcoming you back next time you are in town!  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: We had a wonderful stay at Homewood Suites! The hotel is clean, cute and has a variety of family friendly activities (basketball, pool and minigolf). I felt safe leaving my car in the parking lot overnight. I also loved the kitchenette in our room and continental breakfast. The staff were friendly and inviting - shout out to GM Ben for his help during the booking process.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us! We are all about having fun with the family and we are pleased that you enjoyed yourselves. Our GM, Ben, is amazing and is always very accommodating to both guests and staff. We will ensure your words of praise are passed along! We look forward to seeing you back again soon.

Summary: This is one of those I've ever went especially the breakfast was good and lunch and I really like this one person Elsa and she's one of the great silver ever go visit this place‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê love this place a lot
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We greatly appreciate the feedback and we will make sure your words of praise are passed along to our team (Elsa especially). See you back again soon!

Summary: This hotel exceeded our expectation. From check in to check out, we experienced great service. Shout out to Gwen at the front lobby, Hon, our housekeeper, Miguel and Elsa from social hour staff. Everyone here knows what customer service is. They were all very friendly and attentive. The hotel room we stayed in was the 1-bedroom. We appreciated the full kitchen. Overall, this is our top pick out of all the hotels in Anaheim and we‚Äôve stayed in many Ahaheim hotels since we‚Äôre frequent Disneyland visitors. It‚Äôs is very convenient to the Toy Story parking lot. We will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review. We will make sure Elsa, Miguel and Gwyn are recognized for their hard work. We are pleased that you made good use of our kitchenettes and we look forward to welcoming you back into the area. See you soon!

Summary: Getaway time-close to places we traveled.  Enjoyed the 2 tvs in our room.  Made everyone happy.  Great pool.  Saw many families enjoying the barbque area.  Great music at the pool.  Large pool too. Miniature golf, gaming area, and basketball area.
Manager Response: Greetings! We are pleased that you enjoyed your time at our property. I'm glad you were able to take advantage of the TVs, pool area, BBQ area and outdoor sports amenities.  We look forward to welcoming you back for your future Anaheim ventures. We will see you soon!

Summary: I highly recommend this property. Suites are great for families. Many things to do onsite besides visiting Disneyland. They had beer with dinner!!! They do not have transport but Uber was easy. Nice place.
Manager Response: Thank you! We sincerely appreciate your review and we are pleased you were able to enjoy our evening dinner reception. Free beer and dinner Mon-Thurs is always a great way to add value to your stay. Our kitchen crew always does a great job of keeping the menu delicious and fresh. Thank you again for your kind recommendation. We look forward to having you back for your next Anaheim venture.

Summary: My wife and I have been here 2 years in a row.the staff is super helpful and nice. Rooms are always clean and comfy. I highly recommend this place!! Pet friendly eateries are near by. All in all a 10+
Manager Response: Hello Flocru3!  Thank you so much for your detailed feedback and continued loyalty. We are huge advocates of Good Customer Service and it means a lot for your to acknowledge our staff. They always do such a great job when it comes to taking care of our guests. We look forward to seeing you back again soon!

Summary Heading: 4 Stars - Blend Business and Family Trip! Triple Bunk bed Suite
Summary: So many hotel choices by Disneyland, I chose Hilton Homewood Suites. It‚Äôs a four year old hotel so fairly new. Great location. WiFi was quick for business work and virtual video conference calls.  Great surprise to have a triple bunk bed in the one bedroom!   Check-in was quick and accommodating - all hotel front desk staff were on it. If you‚Äôre not already, sign up for Hilton Honors, great rewards and benefits.   Tips: Drinks are $2-3 a bottle at the hotel mini shop. Vons supermarket is a 5 minute drive, for case of water, drinks, snacks, etc.  If you plan on cooking, there is a kitchen in the hotel rooms. Full size fridge!   Spacious breakfast area, and hotel breakfast is filling.   No reception Friday- Sunday. Great restaurants are 2-5 miles away.  Housekeeping - check under
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review! This has a lot of helpful information and we loved that you enjoyed your stay. Hilton Honors is an amazing rewards program. More information can always be found online and Front Desk loves enrolling new members. See you again soon!

Summary: Travel mix-up. Arrived early. The front desk staff invited to join in the free breakfast and got us our room 4 hours before check-in time; the whole time with smiles and kind words. This remained true for our four day stay, no matter who was at the desk. Shout out to Josue and Victoria.

Perfect for a family trip to Disney or surrounding areas. Very nice room and great breakfast and dinner. This was our first stay and we will definitely stay again! Free breakfast was very good and different options daily. Clean, serviced very well. All day complimentary coffee and tea was also perfect! We took advantage of the free dinner 2xs and it was great! Different options and complimentary drinks! Such a great value!

Summary Heading: Beautiful place to stay with kids!
Summary: Only reason I didn‚Äôt give it a 5 is because it charges for parking and I do not believe customers should have to pay to park when paying for a room. Same for ANY place, though! Concerts, sports, shopping, etc).  However, room was nice and clean (couch bed stiff) pool is HUGE, also a 1.5‚Äô kiddie pool, half-court basketball, and putting green! Toy Story parking lot for Trolley is 2 minutes away.

Every staff member we encountered was amazing, and incredibly genuine. The breakfasts and evening social left a bit to be desired, but I'm an insanely picky eater so take that criticism with a grain of salt. I thought the room was fantastic, and I wish we'd actually utilized the kitchen more. I will agree with a prior commenter on the pool towels, they were pretty threadbare but I was there for the proximity to Disneyland, (FYI, the Buzz/Woody/Jessie parking lot is right around the corner for free busses to DL!) and not the pool. My preference would have been more park time and no pool time, so again, grain of salt... No matter what, I would happily stay here again, no question.

The hotel was okay and offered easy access to Disneyland transportation. They should offer valet parking daily and include more fruit options during breakfast. Overall it was okay my children enjoyed the pool.
Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you for your feedback. We are pleased that you enjoyed yourself. However, we always strive for everyone to have a perfect stay with us. If you have a moment, I would love to speak with you and see what can be done to change your impression of us.  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro Asst. General Manager

Summary: This was our first time here and we had a great time, our room always clean and cozy, special thanks to Maria A. The breakfast delicious, congratulations to the chefs and kitchen staff, servers, etc, specially Martha. We will go back for sure.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words. We will make sure your praise is passed along to Martha and the rets of the crew.   Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: The hotel need renovation and new pool towels. There is no restaurant in the property but you can cook yourself as each room is equip with mini kitchen. The quality of the hotel is low compared to the price .
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your comments. I would love to speak with you directly and see how we can resolve your concerns. We sincerely apologize that your stay was anything less than perfect. We look forward to speaking with you and addressing any improvement items for the future. Please feel free to call me anytime on my direct line: (714)705-0531. Thank you again for choosing to stay with us!  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro Asst. General Manager

Summary: We were there over the weekend and I must say they always go above and beyond to make you feel at home. Always so welcoming as soon as you walk through their doors. Also I must give a shout out to the cook for their great breakfast. AND ESPECIALLY THOSE CHICKEN ENCHILADAS! Thank you to all the staff I can‚Äôt wait til we go back. üëçüèºüëçüèº

Summary Heading: Near Disney,, Free Shuttle to Disney, Free Breakfast, Free Evening reception  Awesome Pool and Suite
Summary: Near Disney,, Free Shuttle to Disney, Free Breakfast, Free Evening reception  Awesome Pool and Suite    Great For Families... Great Staff... Great Breakfast... Nice Pool  Movies outdoor by pool  Set up for families or Corporate

Walked in and everyone greeted us, staff was super friendly. Amazing breakfast and the room was wonderful! I would recommend doing the King Suite room. Great for my wife and I, we enjoyed every last minute in the room.

Love this hotel. Staff top notch suites are awesome amenities are Great. beds are so comfy location is prime. Breakfast and evening social was good. Next to Disney off-site parking   easy access to the buses

Wonderful hotel. Staff-amazing. Amenities-Great. A little pricey, but worth it. Limited on vegetarian protein (just a heads up).  Breakfast was good w/plenty of room for people to mill about. Loved it!

We stayed at this location using Hilton Honors points and cash.  However, we overpaid for our vacation because the hotel said we didn't make two separate but consecutive reservations.  Instead of paying for 4 nights with points and additional nights with cash, the value of the hotel skyrocketed to charge us just as much to stay without using points, yet taking all out points anyway.  The manager stated the points served as a discount payment instead since I booked one continuous reservation.  Had I booked two reservations, I would have paid half of what I actually paid.  This is a dishonest business practice that questions the integrity of the hotel management.  Even after calling the hotel to question the bill, the manager basically said I should have known better and made no
Manager Response: Hello Michael B,  Thank you for your detailed comments. We apologize that you experienced issues with your rate. I took a look and it appears that your reservation rate has not ever been modified. We apologize for any errors that could have been made on the reservations end. We would love to resolve your concerns. Please feel free to reach out to me directly, I look forward to assisting you.   Best regards, Mark Morihiro (714)705-0531

Summary: This hotel is amazing. This is the first time we've stayed at this property and wished that I had known about this place sooner! The breakfast buffet is fabulous! It has a great variety and is very filling! Don't miss out on the social nights from Mondays to Thursdays. The hotel serves dinner-type buffet meals that is very satisfying. The staff is really friendly and so helpful. This is now my "stay-at" hotel when traveling to Anaheim!

Was in Anaheim California for a school convention.  Homewood suites was great value and with the kitchens we were able to save a lot on meals. We also grilled by the pool which was wonderful and relaxing. Would stay here over and over. The staff was so helpful and friendly. One of the best places I have ever stayed.

Friendly staff and great location. Nice hotel for family vacation. Hotel is close to restaurants and Amusement parks. You can walk to other restaurants nearby. Overall it was a wonderful stay at the Homewood Suites Hilton and I would recommend this hotel to others.

Summary Heading: Perfect stay for a girls trip to Disneyland!
Summary: I cannot say enough great things about this hotel!  First off, it was very clean which is a dealmaker or breaker for me.  Then, the suite we had was amazing!! Great views of fireworks every night!  The Disney parking lot next door made jumping on the free Disney shuttle super easy.  We had a great free breakfast each morning and then Mon- Thurs there's a small meal and drinks for free!  The girl at the front desk got a rental car for me so we could do a fun beach day.  They brought it and picked it up at hotel.  This hotel exceeded all expectations and I will never stay anywhere else in Anaheim!  Great job Homewood Suites!! I love being a Hilton Honors member!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for a family vacation and awesome location!!
Summary: We stayed there this week 6/28 thru 7/4/19.  Awesome service from the front desk to the kitchen staff and all.  We would definitely stay here again.  The happy hour from 5 to 7 with Carmen and Victor was great.  Always friendly and willing to help in any way they could.  I definitely recommend this hotel and we will be back in the future.   Thanks!

Good place to stay. Close to parks. Everyone was nice and accommodating. Will definitely come again. Staff helpful. Only drawback is some digit put shampoo in the hot tub, so we got a bubble bath. Will definitely stay again.

Clean and great place to stay. Super close to restaurants and sights. A lil rowdy in the lobby of groups of kids gather, other than that all was good. I would for sure book another stay at this specific hotel!

We stayed here in May 2019 and I would rate the property a nice mid-range 3 star.  The good - The beds were full size and not queen but the bed linens were soft and comfortable. The breakfast had a large variety and was surprisingly good. The light dinner in the evening was limited choice, but if you liked what was offered t was plentiful. Having breakfast and a light dinner included could be a big savings for a family.  The so-so - There were no USB outlets in the room. The  sofa in the living area was a dirty stained orange  that we were afraid to sit on, much less try to sleep on. The bathroom sink was outside the bathroom and very cramped. The location was a very long walk to Disney, although having the Disney parking lot next door where you could catch a bus was convenient.
Manager Response: Hello Kate L,  Thank you for your detailed feedback and for choosing our hotel. We appreciate your nice comments about our bedding and breakfast. Our team does a great job of keeping the selection fresh and delicious. We will share your comments about the in-room USB outlets with our team and see what can be done for improvement purposes. It sounds like you had identified a couple opportunities of improvement. Please know that we will take them to heart and try our best to improve for the future.

Summary Heading: Big Rooms and Solid Breakfast/Light Dinner
Summary: We have stayed at a LOT of different Disney-area hotels and were pleasantly surprised by the size of our room here.  Having a small kitchen and sitting area was very helpful for our family of six.  Breakfast was pretty standard but we were happy with the large dining area -- we never had to wait for a table or cram into a too-small area.  We were also excited to see chicken/beans/rice/tortillas as a breakfast option one morning.  Perhaps the best surprise of our stay came on our first night -- we arrived on a Thursday so there was a "light dinner" offered.  The theme was "ball-park favorites" so I braced myself for hot dogs, potato chips, and cheap beer.  Well... they had all of that but also a huge salad bar, two different kinds of soups, and DIY sandwiches.  They offered wine

The rooms are pretty comfortable with good amenities, but there was a very strong chemical smell mainly in our sitting room.  My guess is carpet cleaner??  Gave us all headaches.  But there were no other rooms available.  Luckily, we were able to hang out in my sisters room.  None of the windows open.

The room we got was a two-room suite: a bedroom (with a king bed and bunk with a trundle bed) and a kitchen/living room (the couch may have been a sleeper sofa, not sure). The beds were hard - not very comfortable. The bathroom sink was outside the bathroom, meaning if you wanted light to wash your hands, it lit the entire bedroom. We were awoken every morning around 6:30 with the sound of stampeding feet above use that went on for about 3 hours. The bathroom door was excruciatingly squeaky. They came to fix it twice and it seemed to work the second time.  Basically, for daytime, it was a nice room - less so when trying to sleep. It was very conveniently located to the shuttle to Disneyland and within walking distance to different restaurants and groceries.The staff were very
Manager Response: Hello NeikoBaon,  Thank you for your detailed feedback! We sincerely apologize that the beds were to firm for your enjoyment. We also apologize that the noise from other guests ended up waking you up. We will brainstorm with the team of a creative way to solve this issue. Overall, we greatly appreciate your consideration in choosing our property. We apologize that your stay was less than perfect. We are pleased that you had good interactions with our staff. They always go above and beyond whenever possible. We look forward to hopefully seeing you back again for your next Anaheim venture!

Summary: If you're interested in uncomfortable beds and food-covered beds and dirty floors, this is just the place for you!  Otherwise, I would stay away!  For the price, I am sure you could find a much better location and value for your money!
Manager Response: Greetings!  Our most sincere apologies for any areas where we may have fallen short. It sounds like you have identified some needs for training and you can feel confident that we will take your comments to heart. Our team is all about improvement and we are already implementing the proper systems to correct our cleanliness. We would love the opportunity to speak with you directly and see how we can resolve your stay. Please feel free to contact me directly (714)705-0531. I look forward to taking your call!  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: We stayed the night before and the night after our Disneyland visit, and the hotel proved to be a great choice.  From the moment we checked in the hotel staff made a great impression with their friendliness and eagerness to be of service.  They helped us purchase our Disneyland tickets and assist with getting our tickets and Max Pass set-up on my smart phone. We then enjoyed a get together they host every evening from 5 - 7 pm with free beer and wine and several generous food options.  We were surprised that waiters even came around to offer seconds on wine!  Although intended to be more of a pre-dinner event, I think that some families made it their evening meal.  Breakfast was also very generous with quite a few choices. Another real plus was that it is directly adjacent to

Good value for a family vacation. Offers a lot of value and amenities for the price. Very close to Disneyland park, 10 minute walk to the park or you can jump on the shuttle from the Disney parking lot located right next door.

We loved staying at Homewood suites. Really clean, housekeeping staff were really nice. Comfortable beds, Easy/fast check-in and out. Complimentary breakfast, has pool.  It's next to Toy story parking lot or only a 15- minute walk to Disneyland.

We stayed here before a Disneyland adventure.  The room had every desirable feature and was extremely comfortable.  The food was very delicious, the staff is super friendly and helpful and breakfast was quite nice.  I would stay here anytime I was in the area.  Totally pleased üòÄ

Stayed here with my family during a weekend Disney visit, and loved the hotel, service, and all it had to offer. The breakfast and evening socials were great, and the kids really enjoyed the movies by the pool

We loved this hotel, spent 4 days here while we visited Disney Land. Staff were so friendly and polite especially with the kids. The rooms were big enough and the kitchen allowed us to cook exactly what the kids wanted to eat. Breakfast was really good too and they had free meals in the evening too. Very affordable rate and super close to Disney land with the free shuttle just around the corner.

Summary Heading: Great hotel and staff, not so good guests
Summary: I did not book the right room for fireworks view but a short call and all was solved. My great experience started right there. Then I got in before check in time and they got a room for us. Score again!  Staff is phenomenal and work really hard to make you feel welcomed. Housekeeping made my kids super happy with the towel animals.   WiFi was very spotty in my room first night. It was not taking my room # and last name and after several tries it did. But then it disconnected again just after a few mins. And repeat... I reported that and it worked fine using a code they provided.  I have young kids and they loved watching the fireworks from last our room before going to bed.   Only bad thing was the other guests here during the same time. One lady decided to shave her legs
Manager Response: Hello MarcusL384,  Thank you for your consideration in choosing our hotel. While we greatly appreciate your comments in regards to our staff. We sincerely apologize that other guests impacted the amount that you were able to enjoy our hotel. Normally guests love our amenities such as: the outdoor basketball court, put-put green and the arcade room. We also have movies displayed at night on our movie wall. We apologize that your "Hotel Day," was not as enjoyable as we intended it to be. We would love to accommodate you again next time you are in the area. We will take your comments to heart and use them for a good training opportunity for the future.

Summary Heading: The best place for you vacations
Summary: The room was very comfortable and clean, all the personel was so nice and the breakfast and dinner were so good, we had a excellent experience with the service in the diner room we really appreciate the service of carmen olguin our waitress she was so polite and she answer all of our questions we recommend this hotel 100%.

I stayed at the Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim with my family to go to Disneyland.  Was able to take a bus to Disneyland and everyone at the hotel was kind and helpful. I really Recommend this hotel.

This was a nice property adjacent to the Toy Story parking lot.  We were able to get to the park by walking around the corner and taking the parking lot shuttle, that came every 5-10 min.  The rooms were spacious, and there was a good variety of food for breakfast and evening reception.  The hallway carpet could be cleaner.  The rooms were fairly clean, but some corners were dusty and there was leftover chex mix under the couch.

Stayed here from 06/07-06/10  We drove from the Bay Area to LA for 6 hours, arrived in LA around 10:30 went out to eat. Told my husband to go check if we can check in early and if we couldn‚Äôt, we‚Äôll leave our luggage until the room is ready.   #1 The front desk agent that helped us was super nice she found a room on the first floor which I preferred. Our room was super clean. These rooms are good for families, theres microwave, refrigerator, stove, utensils etc. They provide snacks everyday. (Sodas, chips, chocolate and granola bar for FREE)   #2 Breakfast was free!! They had amazing breakfast servers, they were very nice and attentive. Good breakfast omelette, sausage, waffles, pancakes, and yogurt.   #3 Location of the hotel!!!!! The hotel was 15 min walk from the toy story

We recently took a trip to Disneyland for the new Starwars Galaxys edge opening and stayed at the Homewood Suites by Hilton in Anaheim the Convention Center location. We were impressed with being greeted upon entering by Victoria and even though we were early ,our room was already ready for us. We were also given water bottles for being a rewards member which was a nice treat.We also had some magical mousekeeping:)    Our room was clean and spacious as seen in the pictures and we loved the daily breakfast that was included as well as a managers reception M-T (that is a light dinner) that was included on our stay.  I also have to add that the staff (Kat and AJ )were amazing! We had ordered food and there was an item that was needed but wasn‚Äôt brought from the local pavilion

We had a great stay at this hotel and service was great! We stayed in a King Non-Suite and the room was very nice, clean, and modern. There was one day that we got back at 3pm and our room hadn‚Äôt been cleaned. Already tired, we out the DND sign on and skipped cleaning for that day.   The evening food was simple and not at all good. It was nice to have the option for a quick snack but the quality just wasn‚Äôt there. The Mac and cheese was good but they served it two nights in a row when the second night it wasn‚Äôt even on the menu, most likely reused.  The breakfast repeatedly refused food from the night before. For example, one night they had salad, with cut up chicken on the side. The next day they had the same chicken for breakfast and called it breakfast fajitas with rice and
Manager Response: Hello 594estebanv,  Thank you for your detailed feedback. We are pleased that your stay overall was enjoyable. We will make sure and share your comments about the dining service with our team and do everything we can to improve. We apologize that you ended up skipping your breakfast and we will take that into consideration when choosing our menu for the month. We look forward to hopefully having you come back and join us again!

Summary: This hotel was outstanding in every facet! I would reccomend this hotel to anyone that needs a suite for a family of three or more. The breakfast was outstanding and so was the staff. Other amenities are just a few blocks away.

Amazing. This Homewood Suites gives better customer service than most Hilton Hotels and I‚Äôm a diamond Hilton Honors member because I travel a lot. Honestly. Couldn‚Äôt have been more impressed. Food, customer service, cleanliness, parking lot, pool, basketball court, location to Disney parking, everything was first class. Hon Chan is an employee there that greeted us on arrival and remembered us when we were leaving. I honestly couldn‚Äôt believe it. She‚Äôs a gift. This is a rare experience for a hotel not considered the flagship for Hilton brands. I would recommend this to anyone anytime. Also, Mirna cleaned our room and did a fantastic job. Thank you to all. Made Disneyland trip great.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel Option near the Convention Center
Summary: I was on a business trip and needed a hotel with suites as my family traveled with me. The set up was perfect and the rooms/hotel were really clean (I'm extremely picky about this!). The breakfast and evening social were such a bonus - definitely made the stay! Also, the best hotel and housekeeping staff ever. It's an easy walk to Disney and the property has a toddler pool (only 1.5 feet deep) which was perfect for my 1 year old. I would definitely stay here again. The only issue was at check out there was a $16 gift shop charge on the room  - we have no idea what it was and the front desk staff couldn't tell me what it was, only the date it was charged. We needed to get to the airport, so we just paid it.

This was the best hotel visit I have ever had. The customer service was the best I have ever experienced. The people at the front desk were very friendly and helpful. Elsa in the dining area made us feel like VIPs. Araceli did a great job cleaning our room. The breakfast was always tasty and a great value. The complimentary food wine and beer at the evening social was a great way to relax and unwind. Thanks Elsa, Araceli, and Front desk team. You exceeded all our expectations.

Summary Heading: Wonderful place to stay while visiting Disneyland
Summary: Only about a 20 minute walk to the gates of Disneyland.  Free bus drop off and pickup to Disneyland just next door.  Lovely breakfast with lots of options for the whole family.  The free evening meal Mon, Tues, Wed, and Thurs was fantastic with things like salads, bread, macaroni cheese and beer and wine.  We went away full every night.  Wonderful friendly service too from Elsa, she was very attentive.  Was great not having to worry about feeding the kids after full days at Disneyland.  Loved that coffee and tea were always available.  Kids loved the huge pool and spa, along with basketball court and mini golf.  Really convenient having the laundry next door also.  Rooms were large and well equiped with everything that we needed for an enjoyable holiday.  The only thing that

This was our second time staying at this property while visiting Disneyland with our grandchildren.  It was an excellent experience both times, from the family friendly suites with kitchens and bunk beds, the pool area to the varied breakfast and manager evening buffets. Location next to Toy Story parking lot, makes getting back from the park easy.  A special thanks to Carmen in the dining room for thrilling our granddaughter with one of her special ducks!  Also to the housekeeping crew for their creative ways with her blanket and doll:)

Summary Heading: 1st Visit at Homewood! Will definitely be back!
Summary: Wow! I have to say our stay was great! Made reservations with Adrian and Porsha! Answered all my questions! When we arrived about 7:20 pm were greeted and treated like family! Adrian, Maribel and Mark M welcomed us, gave us water, and KitKat bars as we checked in! M-Th the hotel provided a very nice dinner. We just missed the dinner but we met Elsa and Carmen who quickly gave the us milk cookies for the night!  The next morning we had a small bump with the room a (maintenance issue) but Mark Morihiro the Assistant GM totally made right! He moved us to another room that had a great view of the pool, basketball, golf, and game room areas! This was great for watching the boys when they played! My husband could see us while he worked in the room! So many things for the boys and us

Summary Heading: Great hotel for a family trip to Disneyland
Summary: We had a great stay in May, just prior to GE opening. It‚Äôs about a .75-1 mile walk to the park entrance. Hot breakfast & comfortable room with full fridge.  We booked the bunk bed suite and were super happy to find it also had a trundle bed! Perfect for 3 of our kids. Pull out sofa was comfortable too. Would def stay there again.   Target is .75 away the opposite direction as the parks (same street) and you‚Äôll walk by several drug stores on the way to the parks.

We had a great stay at this hotel! No issues at all. Staff was friendly and very accommodating. Breakfast was delicious. The location was very convenient. A short walk to a Disney shuttle or an easy walk all of the way there. Definitely recommend.

My family's experience at Homewood Suites by Hilton was great.  We loved the close proximity to Disneyland parks and especially the full kitchen.  We also loved the bunk beds and separate rooms.  Awesome place to stay and I highly recommend it for value and cleanliness.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel for Family Disney Trip
Summary: If you are taking a family to Disneyland, this is the place for you. The location is great...right next door to Disney shuttle, but also totally walkable if you're up for it...about a mile to the gates. The free breakfast is the best I've ever had at a hotel in this class. Plenty of choices for all age levels, plenty of food, excellent staff. The breakfast chicken enchiladas! I'm still thinking about those. Solid amenities and everything you could need on a family trip. I would definitely book again.

We had never stayed in a Homewood suites hotel before. We were shocked at the high quality of amenities for such a great price. The location was perfect. The staff was amazing. We had a day when we didn't even leave the hotel and it was very relaxing.

The hotel is very convenient to Disneyland.  The staff is attentive and Assistant Manger Mike was very responsive to any concerns.  The evening food was an extra treat.  I would definitively stay there again.

Summary Heading: Thankful to Mark M. for great service!
Summary: We had a difficult time online finding a room that would accommodate our family until we contacted the hotel directly. Specifically, Mark helped us with our reservation and was incredibly helpful, polite, and professional.   If the other staff is as attentive, we are going to have a great vacation!

Summary Heading: Perfect stay from top to bottom!  Great job!
Summary: First off I just want to say the staff at the Homewood suites were terrific!  We were there celebrating our 3 year olds birthday at Disneyland and they had balloons blew up & candy, cookies and chips in the room which he loved!!  Our stay was amazing and every time we stay there is awesome!  Special thanks to Brittany and Mark for making the stay a perfect one!

Rooms with twin sized bunk beds, separate living room/kitchen area, basketball court/mini-golf/arcade in pool/hot-tub/splash pad area, decent hot breakfast (best to avoid the rush if you can....) plus walking distance to Disney.   Easily the best hotel - value & quality - I've stayed at in the Disneyland area.    *IF YOU ALREADY HAVE YOUR DISNEYLAND TICKETS* Avoid the morning walk/long line at the east side entrance - take a $6 uber to Downtown Disney and enter the park using the Monorail entrance.  There were like 5 people in line at 8 a.m. on a Saturday! It drops you off by Finding Nemo.

Good stay with a  lot to do in the area and commiunity.Within walking or driving distance of things to do. While there they had the pool down for 1 day and then did not have casual time on Monday - Thursday with Disney land going.

Great family hotel staff is excellent Elsa Lopez very nice and so helpful front desk manger Mark great person and very nice this is one of the best Homewood suites I ever stayed in from East coast to West coast let‚Äôs not forget Kat the front desk agent just great customer service

Summary Heading: Wow!! Great hotel near Disney shuttles.
Summary: Wow, why didn‚Äôt we find this hotel before. One block away from the free Disney parking lot shuttle that ran every 5 minutes. Hotel was modern, clean, fantastic staff, great food, and had a large pool, kiddy pool, splash pad for kids, three barbecues in the pool area, a big Jacuzzi, a basketball court, and a video arcade. Great price too.
