Summary: Our family of 6 loved this hotel! The rooms were perfect! We loved having a mini kitchen available to us. The pool area and the extra activities were perfect. On the days we did not want to tour, we had plenty of things to do without leaving the hotel. The proximity to Disneyland can not be beat. If you are up for a walk, it is less then 20 minutes or just take the Woody parking lot shuttle which is steps away from the front door. So convenient. We loved the breakfast and the Monday -Thursday nightly reception. I have seen a few people mention that at times plates or silverware was hard to find and we had times when it was not out, but the staff worked quickly to refill it. We loved the spacious area used for breakfast and the reception. Again, sometimes it was full, but we
Manager Response: fredmom6,  Thank you for the time spent on such an in-depth review. I cannot thank you enough for the kind words, and for recognizing our Food & Beverage team on keeping up with the crowds of families that join us for our Suite Start Breakfast and Evening Reception. We all strive to provide a great and welcoming atmosphere, and that is evident in your feedback. Thank you again for choosing to stay with us, and we look forward to welcoming you home again soon!

Summary: This hotel backs up to Disney's parking lot.  We walked to the lot each day to get on the bus that will take you to Disney.  Super easy!  The room was just fine.  We didn't have a shower.  I am not sure if each room is like that.  It did have a refrigerator, cooktop, microwave, dishes.  The beds were comfy.  Our kids were on the pull out sofa and didn't complain.  Wi-Fi is good.  Maid service was excellent!  What makes this hotel fabulous to us is the food!  A great breakfast everyday!  Waffles, eggs, meats, cereal, fruits, juices.  Something for everyone.  Then, Monday-Thursday they have a "light meal" every evening.  We did not call this a light meal.  We called it supper!  It was awesome.  One night was salads, another burgers, another nachos, and another Chinese.  Each night
Manager Response: Dooleyjh,  With our close proximity to the Disneyland outdoor parking lot, I can completely understand why you, as well as other guests, utilize that shuttle. Also, I do want to note that all of our suite rooms with either a king or 2 queen beds do have bathtubs. Thank you again for choosing to stay with us, and for joining us during our Suite Start Breakfast and our wonderful Evening Reception, which I am happy to read that you and your family were able to make full meals out of.

Summary Heading: Not the grand but very nice
Summary: Rooms were perfect for a family of 5. Loved the separate living space with full size refrigerator, microwave, stove top & dishwasher. Cabinets were well stocked with dishes and utensils. The buffet breakfast was a big hit with everyone and the staff was super friendly and helpful. They were working hard keeping the buffet stocked with food and plates. I would definitely bring my family back.
Manager Response: Y7333CCrobertt,  I am happy to read that our suites were the perfect accommodation for your family of 5. From the separate living area to the fully appointed kitchenette, it looks like everything came to good use during your recent stay with us. I cannot thank you enough for the patronage, and we look forward to welcoming you and your family back again soon!

Summary: This hotel is perfect for families. My family of five enjoyed 10 nights here. Rooms are large and comfortable. Kitchen with fridge was a nice extra. Very close to Disneyland. Staff was great. Full, hot breakfast saved us a lot of time and money. Would highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking to stay in So Cal.
Manager Response: KYFoodies,  I cannot express how glad I am to read that your recent 10-night stay with us was a "Wonderful Stay" It really means the world to us, knowing we were able to create a home away from home atmosphere, and we cannot thank you enough for the future loyalty and recommendations.

Summary Heading: A-M-A-Z-I-N-G!! Disney Vacation!! CARMEN From KITCHEN PLEASE READ!
Summary: First I have to say is a BIG thank you Homewood Suites & of course staff members too!! We were there for our 1st time Disney vacation from June 4th through June 7th and boy did Homewood made it great for us! It's amazing I defiantly recommended to everybody!! Very close to Disney you just walk to woody parking approx. 5 min away from hotel which is in the corner and take the FREE bus to Disneyland which is less than 5 min away too! The BREAKFAST is amazing a big wide variety and oh man!! Carmen from the kitchen brought out some AMAZING green chicken enchiladas and let me tell you I still dream with those enchiladas till this day LOL. Well we loved it so much that we are going back to California but this time to enjoy Santa Monica Pier and the beaches near by and we could of
Manager Response: Erick G,  A-M-A-Z-I-N-G is the one word I can use to describe how our hotel staff felt after reading your review! What a great review, and please know that I have communicated your feedback to our staff, specifically Carmen from our Food & Beverage Team. She does a wonderful job, and is a very important part of the team! Thank you for choosing to stay with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back towards the end of July, and I have a funny feeling green chicken enchiladas might be served for our Suite Start Breakfast again.

Summary: From the first day we arrived to the last day we were there our experience at the Homewood Suites was excellent. The hotel room was very clean and the staff was amazing. Thank you for making our stay wonderful.
Manager Response: Your review of our property is nothing short of Amazing! Thank you for taking the time and we hope to see you back again soon.

Summary: This hotel is stellar!  The staff is great!  The accomodations are great!  The food was delicious!  Have only wonderful things to say!  Easy walk to Disney and great location for everything you want to do.
Manager Response: It sounds like we knocked it out of the park for you and your family! We truly appreciate the glowing review and we look forward to seeing you again in the near future!

Summary: We had an amazing time here with our family of 5 and cannot recommend it enough. The hotel was spotless-brand new and exceptionally clean. The rooms were spacious and the beds very comfortable - even the pull out sofa bed on which my husband ended up sleeping on. There was a good variety of food each morning for breakfast, but get there early so it's not too busy. The free 24 hour hot drinks in the lobby are a bonus too. The pool area is clean and a nice place to sit and relax after a busy day at the theme parks. A very unexpected bonus was the fabulous managers social each evening. Free - yes free! beer and wine, drinks for the kids and a light dinner. In fact we ended up having this as our evening meal each night - there was plenty to choose from and the kids loved it. Also,
Manager Response: We are so glad that you and your family enjoyed your stay here with us and want to thank you for the wonderful review! It is a rare occasion that someone is comfortable on a sleeper sofa, so we are glad we picked the right ones. The complimentary meals are something that we are constantly working on to ensure our guests enjoy it, so we are glad we hit the mark. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Three strikes, actually four: for a brand new property, these sins are unacceptable.  Inoperable laundry resulting in a stench in the room.  Disgusting. When asked about where else I can do laundry, the answers were about when the laundry service can be restored, while my laundry sits wet in a stinking room.  Strike three was an inoperable pool in a 105 degree day.  Too new of a property for that to be a valid we excuse. Strike four was the lack of coverage at the front desk.  The phone was unanswered after 20 rings.  Tip of the iceberg particularly in a new property.  Wait until it ages.  Be warned.
Manager Response: Hello Solito S,   We sincerely apologize for any inconveniences experienced during your stay with us. We have already shared your comments with the team and made big improvements since this comment was left. Firstly, we contracted a new Laundry company that is able to keep our machines in better working order. Customer service is always a big priority to our team and we feel terrible that you got a different impression. We have already made sure the team understands where we could have improved. Lastly, the pool is always a large focus for our property. We understand that it is a disappointment when we need to close it, but we try keep these closures to a minimum. Thank you for giving us a chance, we apologize that it was anything less than perfect and we would love the opportunity to have you back!

Summary: Christian was great on the phone, helping me find a room for my family where we could all stay together. We all fit comfortably, and had everything we needed. There were a couple of negatives, like the pull-out having dirty sheets (which they fixed of course) and we had a little trouble with the AC, hence the 4 star. The walk was further than the park than I would have liked. You can take the toy story shuttle, though. It takes a while but gives your feet a break. The absolute best thing was free breakfast and dinner. That was a life-saver when you're on an expensive vacation in a land where everything is over-priced. Coming back to the hotel hungry and tired and being able to go eat, no extra cost, no decisions to be made was awesome, and we liked the food. Also, housekeeping
Manager Response: We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay with us. I love how creative our housekeeping team can be, some of them are especially adept at origami, which is really cute! Our complimentary Evening Reception and Suite Start breakfast is definitely a perk and a great savings to families. I do apologize about the issue with the sofa bed and especially the air conditioning. I would love to gather a bit more information on your stay to ensure others do not have the same issue and to prove our commitment to your satisfaction. Please feel free to email me at keith.moses@Hilton.com or call me at 714.750.2010.

Summary: New and clean. Fun outdoor/pool area. Breakfast would've been good, but couldn't keep food or utensils filled/available.So there was a lot of waiting.Beds comfy but could hear every step from upstairs.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting others know about your recent stay with us. We are glad you enjoyed the clean comfy accommodations and our Suite Outdoors pool area. It is true that our Suite Start breakfast can be a little busy, but we do our best to always keep up with the demand. We do usually suggest to try to arrive prior to 8:30am to avoid the larger rush.

Summary: This is the hotel to stay at. No problems whatsoever and the food for breakfast and social hour was awesome. The entire hotel staff met every one of my expectations and were very helpful. This hotel saves you money by providing food while you are here.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting others know that we are the hotel to stay at when in the Anaheim Resort area! We are so pleased that expressed your views on the staff, accommodations, and overall value of our hotel. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Only drawback was the food quality,although it is complentry and the expectation was low to begin with. You get what you pay for.  There are plenty of other choices for food in the area. Lots to do in walking distance. Overall very satisfied .
Manager Response: We are happy that you left very satisfied, but I have to tell you we are disappointed about your perception of breakfast. Although it is included in your rate, we definitely strive to ensure a quality breakfast and work constantly to improve on our daily specials and seasonal fruit offering. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Our family, consisting of my husband and I and our 3 children aged 12, 10 and 7 stayed here for 8 nights in a 1 bedroom King with bunk bed Family Suite.  I can't emphasize how awesome our stay was, we just thought it was the best.  The rooms have a great layout, are well appointed, with a touch of luxury.  The separate living area is fantastic for families, as parents can sit back and relax at the end of the day, whist the kids watch TV from their bunk beds.  The kitchen is an added bonus and the suite is lovely and spacious with lots of draws and hanging space for clothes. Beds and pillows are super comfortable and for the third child there is a trundle under the bunk bed, which means you don't need to use a pull out sofa, leaving it free for us to actually sit on!  We took the
Manager Response: We truly appreciate you taking the time to put together such a well thought out, detailed review of the hotel and everything we have to offer including our comfortable accommodations, Suite Outdoors, centralized location, and most importantly our service. We look forward to seeing you back here again soon!

Summary: There are so many good things about this hotel! New~Great Location~Breakfast Options~M-Thursday Dinner Snack~Size of Rooms~Outdoor Pool Area~Attentive Staff This hotel is within walking distance of Disneyland and right next door to Disneyland Parking.   We were thoroughly spoiled at this great property!
Manager Response: Our goal is to spoil the families that decide to spend their important time together with us! We are thrilled that you enjoyed the stay and hope to see you and your family again in the near future!

Summary Heading: Superb family holiday, thank you homewood suites
Summary: Myself and my family, stayed here for 14 nights during our family holiday. It was our second visit to Anaheim, staying previously at the Embassy suites a few hundred yards down the road. This hotel is brand new and you can tell. From the moment we entered it looked and felt  new, the rooms / suites were spotless and we'll equipped with everything you could want. The kids absolutely loved the pool area, with my youngest especially enjoying the "hot tub". It was kept clean throughout our stay and the staff truly were exceptional, always on hand to assist with anything. The 2 hour social evenings are a godsend as well, all you can drink and plenty of tasty snacks to eat during the evening,  My only criticism if any, would have to be breakfast time. The food itself was faultless,

Stayed with my family here for a week to visit Disneyland and family. Arrived earlier than expected and called ahead and they had our room ready.  Staff was very friendly and helpful throughout our stay.  Very busy at breakfast in morning but staff stayed on top of things to keep the food coming and cleaning breakfast area.  Pool area looked nice but did not have time to utilize it during stay.  Easy 10-15 minute walk to Disney or you can catch a bus from the Toy Story Disney parking next door.
Manager Response: Dear P2480GBsteveh,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review for your extended stay. We know that the longer you stay, the more chance there are for us to wow you, and the fact that you enjoyed the hotel, staff, and amenities is noteworthy. We hope next time you come down you will get a chance to make a splash in our Suite Outdoor pool and hot tub. Until next time, let us know if there is anything we can do. :)  Sincerely,  Melissa

Summary: The whole experience of staying at this hotel was wonderful.  The hotel was clean and all amenities where in working condition.  The staff was great.  We enjoyed the breakfast that was fresh.  There was plenty of room in the common area.
Manager Response: Dear Shaun B,  Thank you so much for posting such a sweet review. Our team works very hard to make sure we meet guest's expectations and with review like this we know that the effort is being appreciated.  Can't wait to welcome you back. If you need anything please feel free to reach out to me.  Sincerely, Melissa

Summary: We stayed here in June to be close to Disneyland. It was ok. I am use to resorts but this place was very convenient. The suite was big enough for the 4 of us so no complaints there. We didn't have maid service any of our days so can't comment on that. Like a previous poster that parking situation is bad and not a lot of parking spaces for the guests. It is $16 per day for parking. It also had breakfast included everyday and it did change everyday with different options for everyone. Walk next door to the Toy Story parking lot and it will be free. Don't use the Art Shuttle Bus. There is a Dennys in walking distance. All in all the hotel was good for what we needed it for.
Manager Response: Dear Yolie,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. We are happy to hear that the accommodations were just right for you and your party of 3. With regards to the parking; on busier days we do offer valet services included with the set parking fee to help alleviate the stress of finding a spot.  We hope to welcome you back in the future, feel free to contact me directly if there is anything you need.  Sincerely, Melissa

Summary: We  paid a visit to Southern California with our four granddaughters ages 10 through 16. Our stay at the Homewood suites property could not have been any better!  The rooms are comfortable and clean. The complementary breakfast is excellent every day. And the evening social  was a very pleasant surprise. We will be using Homewood suites on every trip we take to Anaheim!
Manager Response: PapaJimbo H,  I'm very happy to read that your recent stay with us was a great one! I am also happy to know that your four granddaughters enjoyed themselves as well. Thank you for the future loyalty and patronage, and we look forward to having you and your family again soon!

Summary: We really liked the hotel. It was extremely family friendly. Breakfast had so many choices, but with so many people they run out frequently and have to restock often. My only complaint is with parking. There is not enough and the spaces are small. Everyone parks over the lines, so if you have a bigger vehicle, it is extremely tight. Overall, our room was very clean and there was plenty of space for our family of 5. My kids loved the bunk bed. Staff was all very friendly.
Manager Response: mattandjeannine,  Thank you for a wonderful review! However, I do want to apologize for the busy crowds during our Suite Start Breakfast, as I'm sure you can understand, given our hotel's proximity to the Disneyland theme parks. Also, I agree, I feel our parking spaces are a bit tight, however on heavier occupied nights, we do provide complimentary valet service. Thank you again for your time, and we hope to welcome you home again soon!

Summary: Top notch friendly staff, outstanding service and room conditions. Keith spent quality time talking to guests making sure everything was good and expectations were met. To our family, all expectations were exceeded and we wished we had stayed a lot longer. Thanks a lot!
Manager Response: Angel L,  What a wonderful review! Thank you for taking the time to recognize our wonderful General Manager, Keith. I am very happy to read that all of your expectations were exceeded, and we hope that your plans will bring you back our way!

Summary: At the start of the stay, we requested to change rooms because our back door opened on the putting green/basketball court, and we preferred to be away from that commotion.  The staff accommodated our request.  ...  When we left, we had lost my son's sandals.  We checked lost and found.  No luck.  Shortly after pulling away from Homewood, we got a call - the sandals were found!  Again, kudos to staff on this.
Manager Response: Geoff N,  I want to apologize about the location of your 1st suite, however I am happy to read that we were able to accommodate your request. Also, I am glad we were able to get your lost sandals to you! Thank you again for sharing about your experience and we hope that we will be able to welcome you back soon!

Summary: My new husband and I were given a night at the hotel and a trip to Disneyland as a wedding gift by his brother and sister-in-law. The customer service at the hotel is top-notch- from the valet, to the front desk associate, Christian, who sincerely congratulated us and later sent balloons, a bottle of wine, and a card to our room. The room was clean, attractively decorated, comfortable, homey, and well-stocked (full kitchen setup- full-sized fridge, microwave, pots, pans, dishes, dishwasher, cleaning supplies, even a wine bottle opener). The complimentary breakfast is extensive- hot and cold options, fresh fruit, a waffle station, various beverages. The pool area is clean and well-maintained. The hotel manager, Keith Moses, was impressively hospitable to us, as well as kind and
Manager Response: Magnolia P,  I cannot express how great it is to read that we were able to provide "Excellent Hospitality" and that Christian and the entire team went above and beyond. Thank you for celebrating with us, and we hope that your plans will bring you back our way so we can celebrate again!!!

Summary: Great location was a eazy walk to Disney shuttle service. Used all the outdoor areas and ate breakfast every morning to save money at the hotel. Morning breakfast can get very busy if you eat closer to closing time so my advice eat early.
Manager Response: Joseph W,  Glad to read that your recent family vacation was a great one with us! From utilizing the Disney shuttle to our Suite Outdoors, it looks like you were able to join us for all of our many amenities. Thank you again for choosing to stay with us, and we look forward to welcoming you home again soon!

Summary: Hotel is a great value for all the amenities available.  All staff was excellent and very helpful. Rooms were well accommodated and had excellent beds. Small kitchen was great and useful. Highly recommend for families headed to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Sergio V,  To have you recommendation is an honor and we are extremely grateful and happy to read that your recent stay with us was an excellent one! Thank you for patronage, and for your future loyalty!

Summary: Great staff and great place! The free breakfast and social hour were way above and beyond what we expected! We estimated that our family saved over $500 on meals during our 8 day stay! Great value for the price with many amenities that my family enjoyed. We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: O533UT,  Over $500 in savings!!! I am very happy to read that you and your family were able to join us during our Suite Start Breakfast and our Evening Reception! Sounds like it was put to great use during your stay, and we most definitely cannot wait to welcome you and your family home again!

Summary: Very convienent location to Disneyland. Staff is very helpful and willing to do whatever they can to help. Arrived early and was able to check In early allowing me to feel safe knowing my luggage was in my room and that was one step taken care when I was ready to return from the amusement park. Breakfast was always hot and good variety, I would reccomend better eggs or and egg station.
Manager Response: lisahY2757CE,  Happy to  know that your recent "Trip to Disney" was a great one! We strive to provide a helpful culture at our hotel, and that is evident in your feedback! Thank you for taking the time to recognize us as a wonderful hotel, and we hope to welcome you back again very soon!

Summary: We only stayed here for one night but it was the best. The hotel still smells new.  The breakfast is really good with some of the best scrambled eggs I have had at a free buffet.  We will stay here again.
Manager Response: It is great that we were able to make that kind of impression in just one day! Thank you for letting others know. We hope next time you get to spend a little bit more time with us!

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel for our family trip to Disneyland
Summary: We picked the Homewood Suites Convention Center hotel because 1) it's proximity to Disneyland, 2) the family King suite with the bunk bed and trundle bed, 3) having a suite with a kitchen and 4) the breakfast in the morning.  We were not disappointed upon arrival!  Everyone was extremely friendly and helpful.  The room was spacious enough for our family.  The beds were comfortable.  The air conditioning is by the bunkbed in the family suite, so the kids were cold at first while we were still warm.  Just gave them an extra blanket, not a big deal.  The breakfast had great options (and the options change daily).  One day was french toast, breakfast potatoes, scrambled eggs, sausage, chicken enchiladas.  Another was french toast sticks, bacon and sausage links, cheese omletes and
Manager Response: This is such an incredibly in depth review that we should use it on our future collateral! Thank you for letting others know about everything the hotel and Anaheim Resort area has to offer. We are proud of what we have and love the fact that you were able to describe all of it in such detail for our future guests. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Clean, courteous staff, good breakfast. Nice pool and spa. Laundry facilities. Room layouts fit families well and close proximity to Disney parking for access to shuttle service to park is great. If you are going to Disneyland I highly recommend this as a place to stay.
Manager Response: It sounds like the hotel had everything you needed and so happy that we were your choice when visiting the Disneyland Resort. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Homewood Suites Anaheim Convention Center Review
Summary: My family stayed May 29 to June 2 (four nights) for our vacation. During check in the front desk clerk booked my room to a person in front of me that was staying for one night and not four. The guy in front of me was puzzled when the clerk took his credit card number and mentioned 4 nights. I spoke up and said that was me.  I stayed 4 nights (I have the receipt that states the number of nights) and my credit card was charged $149.76. At $16/day including the ridiculous 17% sales tax, it doesn't amount to what they charged my credit card. I called the hotel and spoke with Britney yesterday, she said I was charged for 7 or 8 nights and I should have only  been charged for 4 nights, $74.88. She said that she would have to hand it off to the hotel accountant, to correct the error
Manager Response: Thank you so much for responding and affording us the opportunity to make it right! Please feel free to contact me directly at the hotel at 714.750.2010 or by emailing your reservation information to me at keith.moses@Hilton.com and if it has not been fixed I will make it happen! I look forward to hearing from you.

Summary Heading: This was an excellent property with excellent benefits
Summary: Me and my family really enjoyed this property during our stay at Disneyland. I think we'll be staying here again we normally stay at the Hilton across the street which is a much more luxurious experience but this was much more family-friendly and with the items included such as the breakfast and the nightly social it made it much more cost-effective plus my daughter loved it more.
Manager Response: We definitely want to be your families first choice when visiting the Anaheim Resort area. We are glad you enjoyed your stay and everything the hotel had to offer. Let us know if there is anything we are able to do to ensure you come back to see us again soon.

Summary: The dinner social was a little "fancy" for my little kids, but the stay was awesome!  Great swimming pool, and recreation area. Breakfast everyday was fantastic!  Staff was friendly!   We used the toy story shuttles a couple of times even though we had a ART passes!   It was more convenient to use the toy story parking lot shuttle on the way back to the hotel at the end of the day then to wait for the ART shuttle.   Just a 5 min walk from toy story parking lot!
Manager Response: We are so pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us. We are always working on new ways to make the dinner a bit more kid friendly, so more to come on that! We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: This was my first time in California.  The hotel was extremely nice and the staff was great. The room was large and clean. Breakfast was different but good each day. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone coming to Anaheim!
Manager Response: We hope you enjoyed your time first time in California! My guess is that the weather was perfect, but the traffic was outrageous! Thank you for the kind words about the staff and complimentary services. We hope you see you again soon!

Summary Heading: When I say perfect, I mean perfect!
Summary: When I say perfect I mean perfect! This was one of the best stays ever. I often travel and stay in great places with great service but this stay takes the cake. Each and every staff member was great, every contact we had was greeted with a huge smile and a desire to help. The hotel is in walking distance from many places and the Anaheim Resort Transportation (ART) stop is only a few feet away. My favorite part was the fire pit, the first few nights were cool so the fire pit is where I was for at least an hour. I would definitely stay here again and I would also recommend anyone to choose this hotel for your Anaheim stay.
Manager Response: The review that you provided gave me goose bumps it was so perfect! We share all of our reviews with our team and I am able to tell you that your review was inspiring for our team. We look forward to seeing you around our fire pit in the future!

Summary: Loved the pool, ball court and movie outside the kids were able to met friends from all over.  The kitchen was great, I love being able to cook for my kids on vacation.  It makes my life less stress since they have allergies to foods.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let others know about your fun stay at the Homewood Suites Anaheim Resort! We are so glad you enjoyed the amenities and were able to take advantage of the kitchen in your suite!

Summary: This is a brand new hotel.  The complimentary meals were awesome.  There was plenty of food and the quality was excellent.  Both the dinner and breakfasts.  I will definitely stay at this hotel when I return to Anaheim.  Disney is blocks away as is a CVB store.  The staff was very friendly and helpful.  The pool area is really nice.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for the time you have taken to share your comments. We are delighted to learn that your stay was enjoyable and we are grateful for your kind comments, which we have shared with the entire team. We feel so proud to have you with us and we are looking forward to welcoming you back at the Homewood Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: You will LOVE this hotel.  Walking distance to Disneyland with room for a family of 6.  We loved the twin bunks with trundle, pool and whirlpool, nightly movies, basketball and golf, FREE breakfast AND dinner.   The value is unbelievable.  Clean, safe and convenient.  We will definitely return.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for bringing your family to our hotel and the love that you show in the review. We hope to see you and the family back again in the future!

Summary: My family and I spend 5 days on Anaheim, CA, for visiting Disneyland and California Adventures, the Homewood Hotel is only few blocks away from the main entrance and the ART ( Anaheim Resort Transportation / Bus ) stop is almost at the hotel door. This hotel offer a well a good breakfast, to start the long day journey is the best place to stay for a Disneyland vacation.
Manager Response: We are delighted that you enjoyed our stay with us at the Homewood Suites Anaheim Resort! Thank you for letting others know about what we have to offer and we are glad we were able to set you out on your long journey with our tasty Suite Start breakfast!

Summary: Excellent rooms and amenities, grounds are great, staff is helpful, pool & hot tub well maintained. Great breakfast and the evening social was beyond my expectations. location to Disneyland is very convenient

What an amazing hotel to stay at!  Close to Disneyland, super family friendly, business travel friendly, great staff and AWESOME rooms.  Full free breakfast in the morning and happy hour at night...you can't go wrong with this hotel!

We had a good stay. The free breakfast was helpful, we only really had the waffles as the rest of the food was not good. The evening service is great, but don't trust the wait staff to bring anything to your table, they always forget. I'm still waiting for my beer. The pools are awesome. Free coffee all day in the lobby. One big downside, we found the beds really uncomfortable. And the sofa was awful. But the hotel was clean and everyone was friendly. The kids loved it.

Walking distance to Disneyland. Great customer service. The room was big and very clean. Beds were amazing, I could have stayed in them all day.  Free breakfast was pretty gross but I would for sure book again. Great stay thank you!!

Just got back from a 3 night stay. The hotel is brand new, so that covers that. The staff is what sets this hotel apart from the others. Having breakfast and a lite dinner in the hotel we had a lot of  contact with the staff. They are great at all levels. The management has done a great job on there training program. Hats off to all of you at Homewood from Bryn's family.

Our stay suited our needs. The hotel is close proximity of Disneyland, if you would like to walk you can but it is like 15 minutes... but you can...The hotel accommodation is perfect when traveling with the whole family. You have your fridge, stove top, microwave and whatever you need for cooking. In addition, breakfast if provided and if you stay during the week, they provide light snack/dinner. It save you money. You can't go wrong with that!

Summary Heading: Didnt get the room we booked
Summary: We booked our stay at Homewood Suites a couple of weeks before they opened it. We thought we had a great deal and booked 6 nights into a King Suite room. A couple of months after booking I got an email from them saying that there "was a booking error" and they couldn't honour the King Suite room and downgraded us to a Standard King. I think what they meant to say is "we gave that room away too cheaply" Rather than keeping the customer happy and giving them what they booked, we settled for a standard room.   Check in was ok, there was a bit of chaos in reception as someone was stuck in the lift so staff were otherwise distracted and we didn't get a great service. We got checked in and went up to the room. The room itself was tiny, which was annoying as we were expecting a suite.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for letting others know about the hotel. I am so sorry for the challenges that occurred in regards to your room type. I would love to be able to dig a little deeper into what happened as I assure you it is not a practice to displace a room because they have a lower rate. Please feel free to contact me at 714.750.2010.

Summary: The location is amazing- close walk or Disney shuttle lot nearby.  The rooms were perfect in size as all Homewood suites.  Great pool/activity area for the kids- both a regular pool and kiddie pool for those with little ones!  Free breakfast and Dinner/Drinks were icing on the cake.  Highly recommend.

I wanted to write a quick review about Homewood Suites and Benjamin, the assistant general manager in particular.  He really wowed me by his commitment to making sure that our experience was all one would expect from a beautiful new property.  Even though frequent traveler who relies completely on Tripadvisor, I have to admit I rarely write reviews but when a property and it's management shows me that they value my vacation experience as much as I do, I feel it's very important to spread the word!  Once again, thank you so much Homewood and we will be seeing you again very soon!!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay near Disney
Summary: Fantastic hotel. Only negative was the breakfast. Rooms are clean and comfortable beds. Would stay here again. Close to Disney. Have to pay for parking even as a guest. Walk to train for Disney park. High-key recommended.

Amazing place to stay on a family vacation! The room was spacious, clean and lovely. The staff was courteous and friendly. And the evening socials on week nights were really a free dinner. And a good one! Breakfasts were great as well. Overall, I would stay here again in a heartbeat!
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us be a part of your family vacation! We are glad that you enjoyed everything the hotel had to offer and hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Homewood Suites.  We walked to Disneyland..about 20 minutes. The breakfast had many choices and we were surprised at the variety for the evening receptions. The  rooms were very clean and the pool was very nice.  I would highly recommend it on your next visit to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting others know about your recent stay with us! We are thrilled that you enjoyed everything the hotel had to offer, especially our complimentary breakfast and evening reception. We hope to see you back next time you are in the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Not a good experience for us.
Summary: I stayed at this Homewood Suites for a week during a visit to Disneyland.  Firstly I will address the positive aspects of this hotel. The room was clean, which is obviously very important, hence why I didn't give this 1 star. They have a complimentary breakfast and 4 nights a week they offer a complimentary dinner which could certainly help save money. The amenities were decent and the rooms had nice bathrooms. The hotel was in a good location for getting to Disneyland. We took the bus from the Toy Story parking lot most days and walked other days. Wi-fi was good.  However, my experience at this hotel was really disappointing having read so many positive reviews. Here are the issues I had:  The worst issue was the inability to open windows. I realise this is common in many
Manager Response: Hello camwales,  Thank you so much for the constructive feedback. We will definitely make sure to take your comments to heart and we sincerely apologize for any disappointments that occurred throughout your stay. Please know that we have already followed up with the noise mentioned, including more fresh fruit at breakfast, and improving the freshness of our property. We hope you will give us another chance next time you are in town. We look forward to accommodating you!

Summary: I have stayed at several different Hilton hotels. All are clean, comfortable and usually have good locations where I am staying. We always choose the locations that serve the full breakfast. Great room value with the breakfast and the hotel staff is always friendly and professional. Never been let down by Hilton.
Manager Response: Hilton is a wonderful company that does consistently deliver to our guests. We really appreciate you letting others know about this and for choosing us. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: A solid option when in Anaheim
Summary: There is a lot to like about this hotel, with a few small negatives.  We stayed here as visitors to Disneyland, but it would be equally, in fact even more convenient, if attending the Convention Centre which is over the road. We got a fantastic rate when packaged with our flights, and could not beat it on the value for money/quality ratio.  Pros: - Configuration of the rooms - We had booked a one bedroom suite, which was very spacious and gave us the flexibility to shut the bedroom door if someone was sleeping whilst others were awake. We didn't make full use of the kitchen facilities in the room, but it was nice to have a separate lounge area after long days on your feet. - Location -  Its an easy 15min walk to Disney, and not anywhere near as far as I expected it to feel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for putting together this extremely informative, well thought out review of the hotel. We are extremely happy that you overall enjoyed the facilities, location, room, and overall offerings of the hotel. I hate to think that we are missing something, but if you do come up with what it may be or changes outside of the breakfast and shower curtains, please let us know. Thank you for choosing us and we hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: Overall a very clean and family friendly hotel. High on the price range and on top of that $18 per day parking. Included breakfast and happy hour makes it a little better. Close to a lot of attractions. Good dining options around.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for letting others know about our clean, centralized,  family friendly hotel! I apologize about the $16 plus tax nightly parking fee, please know that based on our centralized location to the Disney Resort, Convention Center, and Disney Parking, places us in a completive pricing with all of our neighboring hotels. Thank you so much for staying with us and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: This hotel is a little farther from the main gate at Disneyland than we prefer, but it is still within walking distance.  The rooms are family friendly except that the family suite only has one bathroom and all beds are in one room.  The breakfast was good with plenty of choices.  The rooms are quiet and spacious.
Manager Response: With all of the choices you have in the Anaheim Resort area, we are pleased that you chose! Thank you for letting others know about the hotel and everything it has to offer! We look forward to having you back in the future!

Summary Heading: Amazing hotel to help you stretch your vacation dollars!
Summary: I LOVED this hotel! It is a new hotel and it shows! I stayed here 8 days in May and will divide my review into several sections. There are several things that drew me to this hotel over those that are closer. I have stayed right across the walkway to Disney every year prior, but this hotel has won my heart! It has the toy story bus right next door that will take you to the park, it has free deluxe hot breakfast every day (that actually offered some daily variety), it offered a food reception Monday - Thursday evenings (great money saver), and It offered BEAUTIFUL suites large enough for my whole family, grandparents, and brother!! (8 total including the baby, which they brought a pack and play for.) I will start with the toy story bus. You can ride this to and from Disneyland
Manager Response: This is such a special review and we truly appreciate the time that you took to put it together! It is informative, thorough, and truly embodies all of the amenities and services the hotel has to offer. We also love the photos! We cannot wait to see you back next time!

Summary: The hotel was all we could ask for. Convenient location, large room for the family, and a great breakfast. Staff was excellent, rooms new and stylish, and easy access to Disneyland. We will go again, and we are looking forward to staying there again.
Manager Response: We appreciate the fact that you allowed us to be a part of your families Disneyland Resort experience! Based on your review it sounds as if we were able to provide all of the service and amenities a family could ask for! We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: I travel to Anaheim California in May 2016. Even though I had some issues with payment on this business trip they entire staff at Homewood Anaheim help accommodate me and navigated through the rough waters of payment.  I appreciate all the help and now I am planning a family leisure trip in the near future to Homewood Anaheim.

Summary Heading: The best hotel experience in Anaheim, perhaps the world!
Summary: Reading the reviews before booking and travelling to this hotel I though it sounded too good to be true.  But it's not, this place is fantastic! Rooms are large and well equipped, beds more comfortable than home, breakfast and 4 evening social meals are well catered for, pools, spa, mini golf, basket ball, outdoor movies what more could you ask for.  But the absolute best thing is the customer service, these people really understand the importance of customer service. Yes the hot water for tea coffee ran out in the evening but all you had to do was ask and it was filled up, with a smile.  While there we celebrated a birthday, I went to ask if it was ok to light the candles on the cake and came back with some matches and balloons. I can't say enough about this place, you will not
Manager Response: This review is so great that I'm blushing! We are extremely proud of our hotel and are truly blessed to not only have a beautiful hotel and location, but a truly engaged team. We all enjoy working together and making sure that our guests are taken care of. It is awesome that your perception of the hotels culture is exactly what we strive to achieve it to be. We hope you are able to make it back in the future!

Summary: This place was great! Johnathan who checked us in was awesome. I accidentally booked our second night at a different rate and different room type but he accommodated our stay and let us stay in our suite with the best price. The hote also has complimentary breakfast and light dinners with beer and wine! It's awesome!
Manager Response: I was so pleased to share your lovely review with Jonathan and the team! We always reward our team members when their name is mentioned, so I was able to provide Johnathan with a gift card! Thank you for letting others know about your stay with us and we look forward to seeing you in the future!

Summary: The staff was very courteous and helpful.  They made you feel welcome from the moment we arrived.  We had arrived a few hours before check in and they worked very hard to get us a room as soon as possible.  The rooms are very nice and functional and housekeeping is very attentive to guest needs.  You can purchase bus tickets from the front desk for transportation to Disneyland which is very convenient.  I would stay again if visiting the area.
Manager Response: We are so glad that you found the hotel to have everything you need and that the hotel staff were welcome and friendly. We hope to see back again soon!

Summary: excellent experience on our family holiday with our daughter and her husband and their 3 children. walking distance to disneyland. hotel excellent friendly staff, accommodation very comfortable, clean. kids enjoyed the pools, and we enjoyed the complmentry breakfast service.
Manager Response: We are pleased that we were able to be a positive part of your family vacation and that the staff and amenities worked well for you! We hope to have you back to our Home in the future!

Summary: We prebooked over a month and half in advance to stay for 10 nights with a request to stay on the fifth floor. Unfortunately it was not met.   The hotel was beautiful and clean but I was very disappointed with the front desk staff. When I asked for utensils to grill the receptionist asked if i wanted them washed after someone had just gotten done using them. I was flabbergasted and disgusted. Of course I wanted them washed like seriously who wouldn't?  On our second night at the hotel we received a so called "courtesy call" at about 8 pm accusing us of making too much noise. We hadn't even been in our room for 10 minutes and when I told the receptionist this she was like "oh so it is coming from your room". Were we expected not to walk into our room?
Manager Response: We strive to offer the best accommodations and customer service available to our guests, and it seems that we fell short of those expectations. Please know that the feedback you provided has been addressed with the appropriate department heads and we are investigating the comment made in reference to the BBQ utensils and the noise complaint issue. I would love to be able to make things right for the challenges you had. Please feel free to email me at keith.moses@Hilton.com or call me a 714.750.2010.

Summary: We booked here as we were travelling to Disneyland Resort with our two children aged 3 and 6 months. The family suite was perfect for this as it allowed us to put the children down while still having the living area in which to relax. The beds were extremely comfortable as was the lounge area. There was also a full kitchen which was fully equipped except for a kettle.   There was a little miscommunication as my husband had requested a cot in our online booking but we found that this was not set up - you have to ask at front desk on arrival. However this was organised quickly for us and did not lead to any inconvenience.   The location was great, we only had to walk to the Disney parking lot next door to get the shuttle to the parks and it was close to restaurants and grocery
Manager Response: We are so glad that the hotel worked well for your family needs and the staff was able to take great care of you. We have purchased additional tea kettles for our future guests that make the same request. We hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: A well kept property close to Disneyland Resort with a great staff, what more could you ask for?! All in all a great experience, I will return to the property again and highly recommend it to all my family, friends and co-workers.

Summary Heading: Perfect for our family trip to Disneyland
Summary: We chose this hotel for our family trip to Disneyland after searching and reviewing basically every hotel.  We have 7, 5 and 2 year old girls, so I looked for amenities that would work for us and this place has them.  =) Bunk beds were a big hit for the girls, the bottom has a trundle pull out bed which our 2 year old slept on. Breakfast had good options,  even for picky eaters.  Rooms were big enough,  and clean. The pool was large,  only went to 5ft, but I like that.  Hot tub was large. We only ate dinner one night at the hotel, nacho night.  Staff was very friendly and helpful.  We walked daily across the street to the Disneyland Toy Story parking lot and rode their shuttle (free) to the front gate. The Disney staff never seemed to have problem or issue and they can
Manager Response: What a fantastic review! Thank you for letting others know about all of the ins and outs of not only our hotel, but some information on outside of the box thinking in reference to transportation. We hope to see you back again soon!

Summary: This hotel is PERFECT for a family vacation to Disneyland! We stayed in a family suite; our room was clean, spacious, and comfortable. The hotel amenities are fabulous for families. We loved using the swimming pool after a hot day at the park. The free breakfast is absolutely delicious and they even offer free dinner on week nights with beer and wine included for the adults. We also loved the convenience of free transportation to/from Disneyland, just by walking steps to the Toy Story parking lot across the street! The hotel staff are very kind and helpful. On my daughter's 5th birthday, the staff went above and beyond to make a special birthday cupcake and treat bag for my daughter they all sang happy birthday to her during breakfast service :) I can't say enough what a
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to be a part of your family vacation and I am sorry that you had to be subject to our terrible singing voices on your daughters 5th birthday! It sounds like we really hit it out of the park with you and your family and truly appreciate you letting others know about your experience!

Summary: We stayed here at the beginning of May for 3 nights and again a week later for 5 nights (all prebooked) and both times in a king bunk suite. I had organised with the manager for an early check in via email prior to our arrival as we were landing really early in the morning, to which the Manager said it would not be an issue. Arrived at Homewood suites at 9.30am to be informed that our room was not ready. To say I was disappointed was an understatement. By this stage our 2 young kids and us had been awake for 24 hours and were very much over everything. Was then told that the previous people had checked out and that our room would be ready shortly. Fast forward 2 hours later and our room was finally ready. How it could take that long for a room to be serviced baffles me.   The
Manager Response: I want to thank you for taking the time out to let us know about the issues you had during your stay with us. Please know that we take great pride in our customer service and assure you that the issues you had were by no means the norm. Our Family Suites are our most popular room type, and unfortunately one of our most limited. This will sometimes cause issues with early check in because of the limited availability. I would love to be able to discuss this further with you, ensuring that our Suite Assurance Guarantee proves our commitment to your satisfaction.  Please feel to email me at keith.moses@Hilton.com or call 714.750.2010.

Summary: My daughter and I spent four days at the Homewood Suites by the Convention Centre in mid-May. As previous reviewers have pointed out, it's a relatively new hotel and still has that "new hotel smell" in some instances. I chose this hotel based on the many reviews on Trip Advisor and it didn't disappoint!  The breakfast each morning is delicious. There's always eggs and a protein, plenty of carbs to keep you going and an awesome array of muffins, toast, bagels, juice and more. If I had one small complaint, it's that it lacks fruit or veggies, but otherwise, this is one of the best complimentary breakfasts I've had at a hotel. I'd return for that alone.  The rooms: quiet and very clean. They're spacious enough for large families, or small parties, such as my daughter and myself.

We had a wonderful stay at Homewood Suites.  The staff was super helpful and friendly.  The complimentary breakfast was very good and a big cost saver for us.  We were only able to utilize the evening social once, but we did enjoy it on that one occasion.  I really enjoyed that we could just walk to the Toy Story shuttle around the corner from the hotel, and ride the parking shuttle to the front gate of Disney.  Our room was nice and clean and very spacious for a family of four.  We would definitely stay here again!

I was very satisfied with our stay at the Homewood Suites. The general appearance of the hotel is very clean and modern. The rooms are very spacious and the kitchenettes are always great to have when staying for multiple days with children. The hotel was always clean and the staff was very friendly and professional. The hotel is next to the Toy Story parking lot, which offers a free shuttle to Disneyland - definite perk! The breakfast each morning was excellent, as well as the dinner offered during the week. The kids loved the pools, mini golf, and the game room. Homewood Suites gets an A+ for the awesome family-friendly environment and amenities.  My only complaint would be that the booklet in the room listed a complimentary shuttle to the airport as one of the amenities. When
Manager Response: We are so happy that you and your family enjoyed your stay here with us! It doesn't get much better then an A+! Thank you for letting others know about everything the hotel has to offer. We have ordered a solution to the issue with the complimentary shuttle verbiage, we are so sorry for the confusion. We look forward to seeing you back soon!

Summary: We LOVED our stay at the Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim!  Hhonors program allowed us to check in, pick a room, and find local needs for our family of 6.  The front desk was very helpful and even prepared a special gift for our daughter's 12th birthday before we checked out.  Our kids arae 12-9-7 and 4yrs old and the 3 block walk to Disneyland wasn't too difficult.  The breakfast daily was great and the evening social fed our family and was a nice bonus.  Support staff was kind and our room was perfect!  We recommend 1st floor Family Suite...close to the laundry, pool, putting green, and game room!
Manager Response: We love the fact that we were able to be a part of your family vacation and your daughter's 12 birthday. I hope it was a memorable one for her! Thank you for letting others know about your wonderful stay with us and it is cool that you were able to use our Digital Check in, which allows guests to pick their room prior to check in!

Summary Heading: Possibly our next home away from home.
Summary: We liked this place.  Quick check in. The room had homelike accommodations with a kitchenette, separate room for sleeping, a spacious shower...everything felt comfortable.  They have a managers reception at night and a more than generous hot breakfast in the morning.  We even got a chance to try out theirs their small putting green.  Great experience at this place.  We do reccomend it.
Manager Response: We want to definitely be your next home away from home! Comfort is our business and we are so excited that you enjoyed your time with us. We look forward to seeing you back in the future!

Summary: Our first visit to Anaheim to see Disneyland. Great location to parks. You could walk if you wanted.The breakfast was the best part. Huge and fresh every morning. Kids loved it! Beds were also very comfortable.
Manager Response: I am so glad you enjoyed your stay with us, most importantly the breakfast! This is an area that we are always striving to make better. We hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: We stayed here for nearly 2 weeks in late April, and really enjoyed our stay. Our teenager loved the large pool, movies on the wall and basketball court. We found the breakfast and free dinners to be very good and a real money saver when travelling with a family.  We were sent off each morning with a 'have a good day', and welcomed back on our return.  We enjoyed the couches and fire, and usually had a cuppa and sit down there on our return.  Our room was reasonably large, the design is adequate but the wardrobe is small and made more so by the safe being in there. Because you had to crawl in there to access the safe, you couldn't store more than one suitcase in there. We managed to find space for all of our luggage, but only just! We found all the linen and towels very nice,
Manager Response: It sounds like for the most part, you truly enjoyed your stay with us. Two weeks is a long time and we truly appreciate you deciding to spend it with us. Thank you for constructive criticism as well! Please know I have followed up with the team to check the 24 hour coffee station at least once an hour and spoken to housekeeping in regards to the duvet cover. In regards to the settlement of your account, unfortunately we are required to settle the account each time it hits $1,500. We will let others know about this in the future. We also do have some tea kettles available for our guest, just let us know next time and we will place it in the room! Overall, thank you for your kind words about us!

Summary: This Homewood is brand new, and it is beautiful! I'm giving it an "Excellent" because the small problems are easily remedied.   Everything is quite nice, and the staff is more than helpful. This property is a short walk from Disneyland, and it is right next door to a Disney parking lot where you can catch the free bus instead of paying for the ART or some other bus running from the hotel.   However, the construction crew seems to have installed the common area carpets too early. The elevator carpets are visibly filthy and stinky, and the carpets in the kitchen area also smell like a dirty dog. There is one other small problem: the bathroom in  our unit (521, in case Hilton is reading) smelled faintly of urine. How that happens in a brand new building I don't know, but the
Manager Response: We definitely strive to turn your almost into a perfect! Thank you for letting others know about helpful staff and that the hotel is nice. We have taken your comments and run with them. We have since replaced the carpet in all elevators, deep cleaned the kitchen carpets, and I had your room deep cleaned and personally inspected it! We hope to see you in the future!

Summary: Evening reception with DINNER was GREAT!!  We had Mexican night with carnitas and all the fixings for nachos or taco salad, Asian night with rice and stir fry with salad, meatball slider night with salad and mac and cheese.  The reception was real dinner with beer and wine.  Extremely excellent value. Staff members were amazing.  Extremely helpful and go over and beyond.  Rooms are a good size with a nice kitchen area and Neutrogena brand products.  They even offer to do grocery shopping for you!!  The only kinda negative is the 16$ plus tax per night parking!

Large rooms with kitchens, clean hotel - fair prices. The suites are worth the upgrade but I dont recommend walking to Disneyland - it looks closer on the map than it really is.  Parking is a plus - no upcharge and secure.

We were there for 2 nights and I booked this hotel because it has kitchen. Usually I book private condos and homes but this was a last minute thing and I needed to be near convention center and Disney land and it turned out to be a very nice surprise. Good value for money. üëç

I booked this hotel because they have  rooms with kitchen and good options for families. I was pleasantly surprised the way hotel is set up. Great lobby and breakfast area. Game room and basketball court for kids. Above all very friendly and helpful staff. We enjoyed our stayüëç

Summary Heading: Great hotel and so close to Disney!
Summary: We stayed in a studio 2-queen bed room. It was excellent. Huge space to walk around, the shower was large and the staff was very friendly. We arrived on Saturday around 1:30pm for our room and knew it was a gamble if our room was ready. We did have to wait till about 3pm but they offered us bottle water and apologized for the delay. We could have had them hold our luggage and head out if we wanted, but we opted to just sit by the fireplace and relax and explore the hotel.   Breakfast was better than I expected and saved us from spending the money at the park. They have four waffle makers, cereal, eggs, bacon or sausage (depending on the day), yogurt and granola, french toast and hash browns, and your staple fruit (apples, bananas and oranges).   We decided to walk to and from

This hotel was fantastic from all angles. The room size was great & the kitchen facilities were perfect. Location was only a 12min walk to Disneyland or catch the shuttle from your front door. We were lucky enough to take advantage of the free "happy hour" 5-7pm monday through thursday evenings which involved food & drinks. Buffet breakfast was included in our package & just made the stay very affordable. The hotels activity list is extensive but my kids loved the pool deck area & watched movies whilst swimming. I would highly recommend this hotel & we will certainly be staying here again & at other Hilton Homewood Suites when next travelling to the US.

Deserves 6 stars!!  Room was awesome, and super quiet! They provide an amazing breakfast with everything you could imagine. PLUS, they have complimentary dinner M-Th with free beer and wine! Yes, you heard me right! Oh and the icing on the cake....they go grocery shopping for you! OMG, really?! Yup! They have a sheet on the fridge in your room to list what you want and you turn it in before 8 am and the manager, yes I said the manager, will go grocery shopping for you! Your groceries will be in your room by 5 pm. And they don't charge a service fee! It's just the price of the groceries. Outstanding! We tried it and they got us everything we asked for, even down to the brand of gelato we wanted! This hotel is at the top of my list! Well done, Homewood Suites, you rock!

Stayed here for 5 nights in May on our trip to Disneyland.  So glad I chose this hotel. We stayed in a room with 2 queen beds and a kitchenette. Room was very clean and comfortable. Enjoyed the breakfasts every morning and also the snacks/supper provided Mon -Thu. Tea and coffee available all day. The Disneyland shuttle is next door so that was a bonus. The staff at this hotel were very friendly and accomodating. We arrived much earlier then anticipated due to flight changes and were allowed to check in earlier. We also got late check out as had a late flight out.  Big thanks to Britney, Sienna, Jonathan and special thanks to Melissa and Christian for making our stay a memorable one. Our son is already planning his next trip there.

Summary Heading: Can't say enough good about this hotel!
Summary: Location was great. Shuttle for Disneyland stops a 1/2 block away. Restaurants nearby. The staff at the hotel were the best ever! They were always pleasant & accommodating! Hotel was clean. Beds were comfortable. Breakfast had lots of choices. Not a single complaint!

What a wonderful hotel! My husband was attending a convention at the convention center and it was a very easy walk for him. It's about a 15 minute walk to Disneyland. Rooms were very clean minus a little bit of pink scum on the corner of the shower.  Carpets were clean enough my toddler didn't have  black feet. Beds were VERY comfortable. Front desk staff was incredible, as were the managers I spoke with- Keith and Benjamin. Both were SUPER nice. They offer a grocery service, which we had them pick up 3 things for us since we didn't have a car. The full kitchen was SO nice, and the room was HUGE. We also had a view of the fireworks every night which was fabulous!  Breakfast was fantastic. MANY options, including things my food allergy kid could eat. The social hour was awesome

Over the years, we have stayed at 11 different hotels in the Resort area.  We have decided that this one will now be our go to spot (this was our second consecutive stay).  Apart from it being new, which is a plus, the wrong structure and functionality is perfect for families on a 4-7 night stay.  We stayed in  the one-bedroom with two queens and a pull out which is well worth the upgrade for more space and a separate room with a pull out for a child who needs their own area.  The pool and game room are better than most. We also used the mini-golf one morning which was super fun for the kids.  The walk to the park is not bad at all.  Breakfast was impressive. They have a different specialty dish each morning.  My favorite was the egg enchiladas.  WOW!  There was one morning that

Summary Heading: Family time at Diesnyland and business
Summary: The property is new clean and friendly.   Commendations were very good breakfast and dinner options were nice queen rooms friendly staff.  They had many options for children activities basketball, swimming, miniature golf. Walking distance to many restaurants

My sister and I stayed here before running the Tinker Bell 1/2 Marathon at Disneyland.  It is very convenient to the park and there is a shuttle that runs often between the park and the hotel. The staff was efficient and friendly.  We weren't able to try the breakfast, as it closes pretty early (9:30am on a Sunday) and we weren't back from the run by then.  But do be aware that the transient taxes in Anaheim are approximately 18-19%, which I find outrageous.

This hotel is beautiful. It accommodates our whole family, the pool, the arcade, the putting green and a half court. Amazing rooms, great staff, clean and close to entertainment and restaurants. Definitely coming again.

Couldn't ask for any better for a larger family! The room was large enough to sleep 7 and the full kitchen was great for keeping costs down. It is close to Disneyland and was easy to walk15-20 minutes or catch the Disney shuttle 5 min walk.

This hotel is the perfect spot for families! We had 2 queen beds and sofa sleeper, nice size kitchen/fridge to prepare sandwiches/microwave items to help save money a couple of the days during our stay. Added bonus was the evening view of the Disneyland fireworks from our room! The entire hotel was very clean, pool was a great temperature, and the hot tub worked (a much needed amenity after running 13.1 miles). Staff was very nice and accommodating. Jonathon greeted us at check-in and he was so kind and talkative - it was a nice welcome. My kids wanted to watch a dive-in movie that wasn't scheduled, but the front desk staff allowed my kids to pick one and they put it on by the pool (very cool). Breakfast was good. Close to Disneyland and shuttle service. We had a great time and

Homewood Suites hit a home run with this property.  If you are shopping Harbor Blvd. for a family Disney vacation, look no further.  This is your best choice for value and location.  It's a great value because of the room size and kitchen, extra space needed for the kids and a kitchen to spread out with snacks & drinks and a spare sink when needed.  The free breakfast buffet is a hit with families who need to energize before a day at Disney.  Free beer & wine and a lite dinner are offered Monday - Thursday from 5:00 - 7:00 pm.  One budget drawback is the $16/day parking fee.  This location is great for one major reason.  You are right next door to the Toy Story (Woody) Disney parking lot, providing free shuttle service to the Main Gate.  Having stayed in this neighborhood

I'll start with the bad part of our stay.  I am a very light sleeper and always request the top floor/high floor so we don't hear the people above us.  Upon arriving at 3:00 p.m., we were told our room wasn't available yet.  I was surprised, but again mentioned a high floor please.  When we returned at 7:00 p.m., we were given a room on the 2nd floor and informed nothing else was available.  Hoping for the best, we settled in for the night.  From about 9:30 p.m. until well after 1:00 a.m. it sounded like we had a herd of elephants above us.  Not sure how people can make that much noise, but it is possible.  At 4:00 a.m. the next morning, I spoke with Christian and he told me a room was available on the top floor and he would hold it for me!  When I returned to the hotel after my
Manager Response: We are so glad we were able to make a wrong a right! We are lucky to have the team we do in place as they definitely want to take great care of our guests. We hope to see you in the future!

Summary: Location to Disney is excellent. Kids like the pool. Breakfast was included and was a great added value. I will recommend this hotel to friends and family. Staff are super friendly and willing to help.
Manager Response: Thank you for the short, but sweet, amazing review! We are so happy you and the kids had such a great stay with us. Thanks for letting others know! We look forward to seeing you back in the future!

Summary: We couldn't fault this hotel. The rooms were clean and had everything we needed. The complimentary breakfast was great and free dinner mon to thurs evenings including beer and wine was an unexpected bonus that certainly helped make our money go further on our trip. Location right next to Disney carpark and therefore free shuttle to the park was a huge bonus too!
Manager Response: We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us! Thank you for letting others know about all of the over the top amenities our hotel has to offer! We look forward to having you back again as our guest!

Summary: From the free breakfast to beautiful clean rooms to great staff what else can we say? I would not even think twice about booking elsewhere. Everyone should book here room 219 was great and neat the stairs.
Manager Response: We love that we have your loyalty and look forward to having you back! We will make sure to try to hold onto room 219 for you!

Summary: Great place to stay for your trip to Disney. The breakfast was expansive, satisfied all the little picky eaters. Its about a mile from the park, my 5 yr old easily did it. We throughly enjoyed the pools and spa. They are large enough we never felt crowded with the other guests. They even had a variety of pool toys around for the kids to play with. Small splash pad was neat and grills for your own grilling were handy. We will stay there again on our next visit.
Manager Response: We love that even the little picky eater enjoyed the breakfast and our Suite Outdoors area. We look forward to having you back next time you in town!

Summary Heading: Perfect for family and little kids!
Summary: Bunk beds were absolutely perfect for the kids and the pool area is wonderful. The wait staff were very courteous and welcoming. Very clean comfortable rooms and beds with quality sheets and pillows. Breakfast was very good and evening social was a nice surprise! We highly recommend this to any family with younger kids headed to Disneyland! We will be back!
Manager Response: It is so great you enjoyed everything the hotel had to offer! It is awesome that the sheets and pillows stood out as well as everything else the hotel had to offer. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We just arrived home from an amazing long weekend at Disneyland.  We are a family of 3 and this was our daughter's first trip to Disney and we were very excited.    CHECKIN: We arrived Friday afternoon around 2pm.  I checked in online Friday morning and called the hotel when we were about 30 minutes away to ask if our room would be ready.  It was ready when we arrived.  Checkin was speedy and I was able to have two 3 day ART bus passes charged to our room during checkin.  The front desk personnel were friendly and courteous.    ROOM: We stayed in Room 533, a Spacious Family Suite with a King Size bed and bunk beds.  We also discovered a bonus trundle bed where our toddler ended up sleeping for the entire trip.  This room could easily accommodate a family of 5.  The kitchen and
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your well thought out, insightful review of the hotel. The Family Suites with the fireworks view are among my favorites! I am glad you enjoyed the breakfast enchilada special, next you we look forward to seeing how you enjoy our Evening Reception and Suite Outdoors. Be sure to stick around for the movie by the pool each night!

Summary Heading: Disney vacation home away from home
Summary: Overall a great stay, hotel is about a year old and is still very new.  given the number of guests, many being kids, the hotel is still in great shape and showed little wear.  Staff were very friendly, helpful and didn't hesitate to fulfill any requests.  Only downside was the noise from suite above, perhaps we got unlucky but would aim for a 5th floor room next time just in case.  Great location for walking to Disneyland.
Manager Response: I am glad we were able to be your home away from home! Thank you for letting others know about how much you enjoyed your stay with us. We are sorry to hear about the issue with noise from above. We assure you that is by no means the norm! Please let us know next time you in town we would to have you back!

Summary Heading: Great Place to Stay Near Disneyland
Summary: This hotel is clean, comfortable, with nice breakfast, and complimentary evening light meal during the week.  A great family location for families visiting Disneyland.  A good value for a Disneyland area hotel.
Manager Response: You hit just about everything great about us in a short concise way! Thank you so much for the kind words and we look forward to having you back as our guest in the future.

Summary: We chose this hotel which has just recently opened for our first two nights in the USA. It's location made it ideal for a visit to Disneyland which is a short drive up the road.  Check-In, Smooth and straightforward! The beauty with Hilton group hotels is you can check in the night before and choose your room through a layout plan online. Simples!!  Room, I chose room 423! It is a good size room with everything you will need for a comfortable stay. The room was found in a nipping clean condition and also has a small kitchenette which would be useful on longer stays. The bathroom was excellent size with a huge walk in shower. The north facing room also provided a ideal spot to watch the spectacular firework display every night. Perfect!  Breakfast, There was a good choice of food

We had a great time. The hotel was perfect. We love the separate rooms and the kichenete. The kids loved the pool and amenities. This is a new building with high end finishes. The rooms were clean and staff was friendly.

Our stay here was absolutely wonderful.  The staff was great, very friendly, and helpful!!  The complimentary breakfast was a delight!!  Irene and her staff did a super job each morning!!   Would have no qualms staying at this hotel again and highly recommend it to anyone staying in the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel! Will definitely come back
Summary: Immediately upon walking into this hotel the staff was friendly and nice. Hotel was clean and has great amenities. Breakfast was huge and delicious! They offer complimentary grocery shopping with no extra fees. Close to Disneyland resort, secured parking, lots of great restaurants around and a Target down the street. Made our 5 night stay really feel like home away from home. Added bonus was our room had a perfect view of the fireworks!

Summary Heading: Good value, family-friendly, friendly staff, great amenities
Summary: Our expectations were exceeded! We will stay here again for our next Disneyland vacation.  We were able to get great value, kid-friendly accommodations without compromising on service, quality, and d√©cor. It's a spacious, clean, modern hotel with friendly staff.  We had the 1 bdrm suite with two beds. The suite was fantastic - cleaner, more modern, and still less expensive than most standard hotel rooms in the Disneyland area. We were able to put our daughter to bed, but could stay up late to watch tv in the separate living room.  The complimentary breakfast offers a well rounded, substantial food selection. The happy hour is great.  We didn't have time to use the pool or adjacent bbq area, but it all looked really nice.   The only con is the hotel is not a scenic area you'd

We stayed here 3nights. We picked this hotel because its location to Disneyland and the breakfast included. Parking was $16 a day. The thing is the hotel parking lot is right beside the Disney parking lot. So many mornings families have the kids packed up and walk next door to the Disney Parking lot to catch the shuttle bus to  Disneyland. The main entrance of Disney seemed a bit of a walk from the hotel with young kids but there is a bus stop that can pick you up also to take you to Disney. We were about 40mins from Hollywood. One day we skipped the parks and decided to drive in that area. Very close to SNA Airport and maybe 30mins from LAX. 25mins to the closest beach. Plenty of places to eat up and down the road. There are a few shopping areas and a dollar tree for those last
Manager Response: Thank you so much for letting others know about our centralized location and everything the hotel has to offer! I know you decided not to cook, but you always know you are able when staying with us...or better yet let us do the cooking for you every Monday - Thursday from 5pm - 7pm at our Evening Reception!

Summary: Had an amazing time stay on our recent visit to Anaheim! I'll keep it short and sweet here are some reasons why you should stay if you've got kids like me:  * spacious and comfortable rooms, the beds are heaven!  *Kiddo pool!
