Besides having a regular sized pool they have a tiny one for the kids, no lifejacket required;) * To top it off they project kids movies at night RIGHT in front of the kids pool. yay! * And yet another bonus for the kids is the mini golf course, arcade and basketball court all conveniently located by the pool area.  + Shout out to Adrian who blew up a couple of inflatables for my kids , they had a blast thanks!   For Adults: complete kitchens in rooms,beer for sale by the front desk, large pool , BBQ stations In the back by the fire pit, and lovely
Manager Response: What a great review! We are so happy you enjoyed everything the hotel had to offer including our 'Suite Outdoors' area and that Adrian was able to take care of you. Hope to see you back soon!

Summary: Had a fantastic stay these past 4 days!! Awesome breakfast with variety. Rigo at the restaurant was so helpful! We don't eat pork and he went above and beyond to make sure we had a non-pork option during breakfast. The hotel's complimentary grocery shopping is an amenity I wish was offered everywhere. Not only did they get everything on the list, it was all put away when we got back. We will definitely be staying here on future visits!!!
Manager Response: So great that Rigo was able to take such great care of you! Also, we are glad you were able to take advantage of our grocery option. That is something you don't see at too many places! We look forward to having you back again soon!

Summary: Opened last Nov. Very clean Tremendous staff Ga ve very good service' Breakfast menu comprehensive and variable. Did not partake evening meals (Monday through Thursday) because we went to fancy restuarants in the area.

Great hotel at a great location, only 10-15 min walk to Disney. I arrived early and was lucky enough to get a early check in.  Staff are great and they offer complimentary drink and light meal every evening hosted by the hotel GM, which I think is a brilliant idea.  Rooms are clean and tidy and the hotel seems fairly new.

Had a great stay here check-in was a breeze with Britney, my birthday was recognized by her and the staff. There is a large pool and dining area with good food and it is near Disney, you can take a bus Uber or Lyft we alternated or just walk

Summary Heading: Could not ask for a more comfortable and relaxing stay!
Summary: I visited this hotel for business travel.  Check in was fast and easy, I even received a small treat for being an HHonors member.  I requested a room with a view of the fireworks and I was not disappointed!  The room was very spacious and clean.  Parking is gated.  I never had a problem finding a spot.  There are many families here to visit Disneyland but I never had an issue with noise while in my room.  I did not make use of the evening meal but I did get to enjoy a glass of wine at happy hour.  It was very nice to sit outside and enjoy a beverage after a long day of work.  The breakfast had many choices and the food quality was standard for complimentary hotel breakfast.  I most like the 24 hour coffee service to grab a warm beverage any time.  I will definitely stay at this

We stayed here for 11 nights in Apr16. We had a 5th (top floor) family suite ( king + bunk beds) facing Disneyland. The suite was very quiet, and we had a great view of the fireworks every night.  We had such an awesome stay. The pool and recreation areas are nice ( could do with more shade around the pool though), and the breakfast/ dining /reception area is fantastic. The included breakfasts, and weeknight light dinners were plentiful and filling. I had multiple packages delivered to the hotel with no issues at all, We walked to Disneyland and back many times during the stay, and once or twice caught the Toy Story Lot buses. Both options took around 20 mins. We enjoyed the walk and would pick up items at the CVS along the way. I will recommend this Homewood Suites to all my

Had a great stay. Rooms were clean, beds comfy. Could have used a few more towel hooks and the shower hea needed to be lowered. It's impossible to adjust it if your 5'3. We stayed in the  a king bedroom w/bunk beds.  Breakfast was good. Staff seemed to have trouble keeping up on Sunday Morning around 830. But to give them credit, Friday and Saturday we were down at 7.

room-spotless pool, hot tub -perfect fireplace- perfect to sit by and warm up in the evening front desk-always pleasant, helpful, and professional breakfast- hot, wide selection, with a well-trained staff responding to every request. I am completely impressed with the entire staff of this hotel.  No one is taking a break, or taking it easy.  Everyone is serious about customer service.  Everyone treated me like a guest.  even when they kicked me out of the hot tub after  hours they were very nice about it :) I will come back.  The entire hotel is spotless!  Thank You!

I had a great time will be back ! From the Check in to the checkout first rate ! The best hotel close to Disneyland and the food delicious. My little girl had a ball. Looking forward to the next time. Christian at the front desk was awesome too.

Amazing hotel! Rooms are very clean and nice. The staff was very friendly! Felt really safe staying there and also liked that it was very family oriented. The location is great and with so many restaurants near the hotel.  I will definitely be coming back here again!

Summary Heading: Disneyland and Los Angeles area week vacation
Summary: The staff was very friendly and helpful.  The rooms were clean and comfortable. Good wifi service. The whole family loved the complimentary breakfast.  Good variety each day.  The hotel was next door to the Disney shuttles.

I just stayed at this hotel for 4 nights and it was great! The happy hour is awesome and the breakfast was great!   My family went to spend my dads 60th birthday and he had the best time ever. When Christian at the front desk asked what the occasion for staying at the hotel was, we let him know it was for a b day and he send wine to my parents room. The staff was incredible!  We will defiantly be coming back to this clean, modern and friendly hotel!

I had a great experience! Christian checked me in and was a perfect gentleman, Mirna the housekeeper always made my room spotless, and the location is awesome! Beautiful and brand new property with very friendly and kind staff in the maintenance, housekeeping, breakfast and front desk department. Plus, free breakfast and evening social m-thur, which was amazing! Thanks so much everyone :D

This brand new hotel is situated a mile from Disneyland.  It is clean, pretty, and has easy shuttle access.  Since it's so new, the beds are in tip top shape...even the couch beds.  The staff are really friendly and do their best to be accommodating.  Breakfast is pretty good too.  The pool and Jacuzzi are just what you need after a long day at Disney!

I can not say enough about the hotel and staff. They were very accommodating, friendly and all went out of their way to be helpful -  reservations, housekeeping, breakfast, front desk staff were just spectacular. We were constantly impressed. Keith, the General Manager, also made his rounds during breakfast to check in with guests. I was happy to give him a very positive report, especially regarding our main contact while planning, Christian. The facilities were very nice, and the only minor issue we have with the stove in our unit was immediately fixed at a time that was most convenient to us.  The breakfast buffet was very good, a ton of hot and cold choices, with a different hot dish each day- this was a h8uge money saver for our group with three teenagers!  Regarding ease of

We stayed here for a 4-day vacation at Disneyland with the family including a new grand-daughter.  The hotel is brand new as others have noted and so everything is clean, in working order and feels updated and modern.  The hotel is a great value given the size of the rooms (suites with kitchenettes), the location proximity to Disneyland, and the included breakfast buffet which is quite extensive and good food.  You can walk to DL if you are energetic (not recommended after a long day in the park though), you can take the ART Anaheim Resort bus for a fee, or even better you can just walk a half-block north (to the right of the front door) and catch the FREE shuttle that Disney provides in the Toy Story parking lot.  You will see the entrance for cars on the right just off Harbor

We all had enjoyed our stay at this hotel.  It was pretty close to Disneyland about three blocks away. The staff is very friendly, helpful and accommodating. They were very attentive to our needs. The breakfast changed every day, we were there for four nights and each day was different. The room we stayed at was very clean and everything was in working order. We would definitely stay here again when we go to Disneyland or if we are in the area.

So my boyfriend won a certificate to stay here and I'm so glad he did!! It was such a wonderful hotel. Super friendly staff and guest, the breakfast was delicious for being complimentary and the location was great!it was just a walk away from disney and literally next door to the woody and jessie parking. They had a gym, basketball court, pool and laundry room. It was just so homey! The rooms were super clean and the shower was super nice. The t.v was movable just incase u wanted to watch the t.v from the sofa or bed. The beds were super comfy and the pillows were like made from clouds!! I loved it and I'm certainly going to stay at this hotel from now on!

Where to start, location to DL very good, breakfast very good, room and facilities excellent, staff very friendly and helpful. What we didn't expect were the free dinners including beer and wine, the BBQ area and fire pit and the outdoor movies. Would thoroughly recommend.

On a 3 week long vacation ..chose to end our stay in Anaheim..(ducks...playoffs..angels/just because) great place to stay from beginning to end ..from check-in to check out...offer sufficent  over the top breakfast & social hourssss..our host Melissa was great..professional & fun..oh and "sasssssy" ..after a short conversation during social hr..she voluntarily came over to sit with us & recommend place to venture to.Thank you mel..all staff from check-in to housekeeping..to hosts are fantastic..this is not the first time staying in a Homewood property..I find this consistent in each establishments..thank you hilton!!

New hotel  Rooms are big and clean  Great service and especially to Veronica She was great help us with the family room  And a bed for the baby. We have breakfast and dinner it was fresh and taste. Big parking place. Pool was clean and very nice  Will be back again .

We chose this hotel based on it being a half mile away from Disneyland and the fact that it was less than one year old, no wear & tear.  The ART busses are extremely easy and inexpensive to use to get back and forth to the various areas of the Anaheim Resort area...Disneyland, restaurants, shopping.  The staff were all very nice, the room was clean and it was a bonus having a kitchenette.  My one and only and very minor "complaint" is that I do like it when hotels have situated the sink outside of the bathroom so two people can get ready at the same time.  Other than that, we would definitely recommend this hotel, the pool area is large and very nice; the breakfast had some great choices that changed daily and the ART bus pick-up was right next door.  My biggest complaint is

This hotel is brand new and on prime real estate.   They offer free breakfast seven days a week, free dinner and drinks Monday thru Thursday, and the pool is open until 10pm!  Additionally, the staff were very friendly and helpful and the rooms were beautiful and functional.  The hotel is walking distance from Disneyland and a shuttle to the parks is available near the entrance of the hotel.  All in all this was a great hotel and experience.

This is my second time back this year. Can't stay away from this place. Everyone here is so nice and polite. Very helpful at the front desk as always. Ended up checking out with Britney again. She's awesome and informative. Watched her guide a family that was from out of town to all local restaurants around on a map. Didn't need it because I'm from the area but WOW, that looked helpful for tourists. Can't beat the service at this hotel. So of course I'll be back again lol.

Stayed 5 nights.  Room clean.  Staff friendly.  Walked to Disney parking lot for shuttle to park.  Very nice breakfast and evening social.  Great value for the room rate.  Breakfast is available daily and evening social Monday through Thursday.

A great suite hotel. There is a full breakfast buffet every day and light dinner provided weekdays. Suites are nicely appointed and pristine. Easy walk to the convention center and walk able to Disneyland. Has all the amenities you need like pool, fitness center, and there are also little extras that the kids enjoyed such as kiddie pool, mini golf, and sport court. Pleasant staff.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful review! Thank you for letting others know about the variety of amenities, centralized location, value, and we are glad our staff was able to take care of you! We look forward to seeing you in the future.

Summary: Great brand new hotel in the Anaheim resort area!  Walking distance to the convention center and Disneyland.  Game room, great pool, basketball court and the best breakfast spread of any place we've ever been.  Complimentary happy hour on weekdays. Friendly and very helpful staff.  You will love it here!
Manager Response: It is so awesome to see your message to others letting them know that they will love it here! We strive to make every guests stay enjoyable and it appears we really hit it out of the park with you. We look forward to having you back in the future.

Summary Heading: Best hotel i've stayed at in a long time!
Summary: I cannot stop raving to people about this hotel! Everyone was incredibly nice, and accommodating. The hotel was clean, beautiful and the food they have for breakfast and dinner is AWESOME!  Definitely would stay there again.
Manager Response: We cannot wait to have you back! Thank you for spreading the word about your stay with us, as a new hotel it really means a ton to have great word of mouth.

Summary: We just completed our stay. The place is fresh and new, the staff are super nice and friendly. The complimentary breakfast is very good. I would highly recommend this hotel. It is just minutes form Disney. We will be back.
Manager Response: We look forward to seeing you when you are back in town. Thank you for the great comments about everything we have to offer.

Summary: Excellent Hotel with great spacious suites and very comfortable beds. Would recommend for person wanting a little bit extra room. Very new and great staff including the GM who was at breakfast getting his hands dirty most mornings.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review the hotel! I am blushing as I write this since you acknowledged me. It takes a team to make things work right, and I am blessed to work with the best!

Summary: Our family of 4 stayed for a week at the Homewood Suites Anaheim convention centre.  Just returned August 19th. The hotel is new, clean and looks good! The staff are kind and efficient.  They helped upgrade our room for our last two nights to a bunkbed room, which the kids loved.  Breakfast is a nice feature to have before heading out.  Food is adequate and plentiful.  Its a quick 5 minute walk next door to the Disney Toy Story parking lot, where we caught the Toy story bus to the front gates of Disneyland at no charge.    I would definitely recommend this hotel at the price point that we paid.
Manager Response: RanchuBoy,  What a wonderful review to read! Thank you for taking the time to share about your recent stay and I am very happy to know that it was an excellent one! Also, I am glad you were able to join us for our Suite Start Breakfast to begin your day at the Disney theme parks. Thank you again for the patronage, and we hope to welcome you home again soon!

Summary: We wanted to stay at a hotel that was within reasonable walking distance to Disneyland, with a pool and complimentary breakfast. We found all these features in this new Homewood Suites by Hilton that just opened last fall. It was a 15 to 20 minute walk away from the Disneyland entrance.  Our room faced the pool and barbecue area (yes, you can barbecue here!!!). The bedroom had 2 queen-sized beds with clean white sheets and firm mattress which we really enjoyed sleeping in.  In addition to the quiet air conditioner in the bedroom,  there was also a ceiling fan in the bedroom but we didn't use that.  Bathtub was clean and we enjoyed using the Neutrogena brand toiletries.  There was a small safe to lock up our valuables, very convenient.  The living room which had a 2-person couch
Manager Response: nanags,  I cannot express how happy I am to read that your family vacation with us was a great one! Also, the 3 BBQ grills provided at our Suite Outdoors is always a pleasant surprise for all of our guests! I am glad to read that you and your family were able to enjoy many of the amenities we provide during your stay. Thank you again for such a wonderful and thoughtful review! We hope that your future plans will bring you back our way!

Summary: This is a good option for accommodations near Disneyland/California Adventures. Property is a mile+ from Disney, and offers a regular shuttle service for a modest fee (we paid $20 for 5 days).Shuttle runs every 1/2 hour and drops/picks up near main entrance. Rooms are spacious, with living room, kitchen and separate bedroom. Cable TV/Wi-Fi is free, although Wi-Fi is a bit slow. A free breakfast and afternoon meal is included, both which were very nice. Property has pool/hot tub, but the hot tub was rather dirty. Staff was extremely friendly !! Only caution, which is not the property's doing, taxes and fees ran over $20/night.
Manager Response: sonnyslump,  I want to thank you for taking the time to provide such a great review! However, I would like to apologize for the speed of our complimentary wi-fi services, as well as the cleanliness for our spa. Please know that I have communicated your feedback to our staff so we can work to resolve these issues right away. Thank you again for choosing to stay with us, and we look forward to welcoming you home again soon!

Summary Heading: Great experience booking for large crowd
Summary: While attending an event at the Convention Center I needed to book rooms for a large crowd. The hotel staff was extremely helpful assiting me with arranging everyone's rooms. The rooms were large and spacious and the hotel was very clean and the Staff was helpful through everything! I would certainly recommend this hotel for anyone visiting the Anaheim area, may it be for business or for pleasure!
Manager Response: CAnderson_99,  I am very happy to read that our staff was able to assist you with a large booking at our hotel, especially for a meeting at the Anaheim Convention Center. Also, I am glad that your recent stay with us was a great one, and I hope that your future plans will bring you back to our hotel!

Summary: Loved the size of the rooms...proximity to everything.  Can't beat that "new" smell!  Loved the full breakfast, and the recreation areas (I can understand closing at 10pm but it would have been nice to lounge in the hot tub after a long day at Disney!).  Because of the in-room kitchen, we were able to save $ by packing lunches to take in to Disney.  Everyone was kind and it was an over-all great stay!
Manager Response: Denise0202,  Thank you for such a wonderful review! Also, given the fact that we recently opened in November of last year, I am happy to read that the "new" smell is still around. Thank you again for choosing to stay with us and we look forward to welcoming you home again very soon!

Summary: Thoroughly enjoyed our 3 night stay in March!  Front end staff very friendly and helpful.  Food totally adequate for families and restaurants within walking.  Rooms wonderful and new.  Even watched fireworks from room one night.  Only complaint...pool was too cold for kids to swim.  Wanted to take a break from Disney in afternoon with a nice swim and water was freezing.  Can't wait to return next year for another visit. Warm that pool up in winter!  Would stay at Homewood Suites again.  Thanks!  Family of 6
Manager Response: Carmen B,  Thank you for your patronage, and for the future loyalty! Also, thank you for taking the time to recognize our wonderful front desk staff and for joining us during our Suite Start Breakfast. However, please accept my sincere apologies for the temperature of our swimming pool. Please know that I have communicated your feedback to our maintenance team so we can resolve this issue right away, especially for your return in the winter. Thank you again for your time in providing this review, and we look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: We used our points for a few nights to see some sights in the LA area. This new  Homewood suites did an excellent job handling all of the Disneyland Traffic. The full breakfast was an awesome touch. The parking lot security let us sleep easy.
Manager Response: AirFed,  I am happy to read that your redemption stay with us was a great one! We do our best with the busy crowds that visit the Disneyland Theme parks, and I am happy that you were able to join us for our Suite Start Breakfast. Thank you again for providing such valuable feedback, and we look forward to welcoming you home again soon!

Summary: This place was across the street from Disneyland and was an easy walk to the park. The suites were super clean and comfortable as you would expect, but the service blew us away! Me and my wife had breakfast on Sunday and Ben and the breakfast crew put the "cherry on top" with our stay here.  They were very genuine and made it feel like a welcoming, family environment.  The front desk staff was graciously helpful and provided us with some great recommendations to local restaurants and things to see.  It's because of Ben and his team that whenever we're in town now Homewood Suites will be the only place we'll stay!
Manager Response: djdboy,  I am humbled to read that we were able to place a "cherry on top" of your recent stay with us! I cannot thank you enough for the wonderful comments about myself and our amazing staff. We all strive to provide a warm and welcoming environment, and I am glad that you were able to feel that with us. Thank you again for the patronage, and we, most definitely, cannot wait to welcome you home again soon!

Summary: My family of four stayed there for five nights in April 2016 while visiting Disneyland.  We loved the family suite with king size bed and bunk beds for the kids.  It was nice having a kitchen, although we ate most of our meals courtesy of the hotel - breakfast every morning and dinner/drinks weekday evenings.  The kids loved the pool and sport court.  I loved being able to sit around the fire pit with complimentary wine most nights!  We were able to walk to Disneyland and Main Street in under 30 minutes, although we did take a cab back after one long day, which was $9 before tip.  My only issue was with their dish washing practices - for most meals, I would have to sort through several plates with dried on food before finding a clean one.
Manager Response: GaylynnL,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience with us on Trip Advisor! From the fully-equipped kitchen in our suites, to the Suite Start Breakfast and the Evening Reception, I am glad that you and your family were able to join us for many of the amenities we provide. However, I do want to apologize for the cleanliness of some of our plates. I cannot apologize enough for this, and please know that I will communicate your feedback to our team so we can ensure that this will not happen again. Thank you again for your time in providing such valuable feedback, and we hope that your future plans will bring you back our way!

Summary: Stayed here with my family, including 3 small kids. The place is brand spanking new. Everything was clean. The staff was as friendly and helpful as any hotel I've ever stayed at in my life.  The breakfast is awesome. There were tons of choices at breakfast, and it was better than most restaurant options in the area. I'll stay here every time we come to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Brandon M,  I am happy to read that you and your family had an excellent stay at our "Amazing Hotel". Also, thank you for joining us during our Suite Start Breakfast, which I am also glad you found to be "awesome". Thank you again for the wonderful review, and we hope to welcome you home again soon!

Summary: this was our first stay with a Homewood Suites and we were beyond impressed. It was perfect when traveling with our children, there were lots of activities geared towards children which was wonderful. the hotel was extremely clean and located near all of the attractions. I definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: M9315JBpaulc,  I cannot thank you enough for the patronage, and the 1st time opportunity to stay with us! I am very happy that your recent stay with us left a lasting impression, and your recommendations mean the world to us! Thank you again for your time in providing this feedback, and we look forward to welcoming you home again soon!

Summary Heading: Great for business or for Disney
Summary: We attended at a convention and the Homewood Suites was the perfect distance from the convention center. Close enough to walk but far away enough to get away from the chaos of the convention.  The suites were incredibly comfortable and we loved the having the full kitchen in the room.  The staff was always polite and helpful. Melissa F. was especially helpful towards our group. I noticed that one of Disney parking lots (with shuttles) was right next to the hotel so I will be back soon to stay with my kids.
Manager Response: Shari G,  Given our close proximity to the Anaheim Convention Center, I can clearly see why our hotel would be a prime choice of stay for convention visitors. Thank you for sharing about your recent stay and for taking the time to recognize our wonderful Reservations Supervisor, Melissa. She is a great asset to our hotel, and it is evident in your feedback! We cannot wait to welcome you home again soon!

Summary Heading: Brand new hotel in the heart of Disneyland!
Summary: Booked this hotel last minute as we wanted somewhere close to Disneyland for our last 2 nights in LA. We definitely got more than expected! The place is only 4 months old so everything smells new, looks new and feels new. The staff are very helpful and friendly. Breakfast was delicious and I was very surprised at the complimentary social nights that included food and drinks!   This place was very affordable and we got a lot more here than other hotels in the US for a fraction of the price.  We walked to Disneyland in 10 minutes and a range of restaurants were just a short stroll too.   I would definitely recommend it for any family looking at staying near Disneyland!
Manager Response: We are so glad that you chose us at the last minute and enjoyed your stay so much! Thank you for letting others know about our great new location and mentioning out friendly staff. We look forward to having you back in the future!

Summary: Excellent place for families. Layout of room was great for our family of 5. Some of the most friendly and helpful staff I have ever met. Staff would go out of their way to help. Grounds were very well-kept. Cleanliness of entire hotel was impressive.
Manager Response: We really do enjoy taking care of our guests and I am so glad that we impacted your stay in such a way! Thank you for letting others know about your experience with us!

Summary: Stayed here for 9 nights and was just perfect with family of 5.Staff were so nice in this near new hotel,Big shout out to Mike Ransom,Melissa n Seina who made us feel very welcome.Walk is 15 mins to Disney or you can sneak in next door to Disney car park and take free buses,they don't check and they run non stop.Breakfast was good as was dinner and drinks 4 nights a week,Free wifi was good..Rooms are quiet and a bonus with full kitchen that has a proper size fridge.Had a room facing fireworks so that was a bonus as well.Kids loved pool and basketball as well.Great value for money.Definently would stay here again.
Manager Response: Wow, we really want to add that 6th star to our resume! Thank you so much for the wonderful review and for mentioning specific people. It means they really impacted your stay to remember them by name! I have already given them accolades! Look forward to your return trip!

Summary: My family and I were there for a staycation we are only a 20min drive south of the property visiting Disney for 3nts the staff at this property is top notch always so friendly. I was in the hospitality industry for 13yrs and have traveled to many different property's and I would have to say this is one I wish I had a name for every employee I had contact with. Everyone is working hard to make your stay a very enjoyable one. Mr. Joseph at the front desk was great always there to help he also helped  me book another night he was so great. Housekeeping and staff from breakfast were great. Thanks so much. This property is close to Disney a quick 5$ ride from uber
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful review. I am blessed to work with the best team in the world day in and day out and I am so happy to see that someone who has been in the industry is able to notice what a great group of people they are. I have passed your wonderful comments along to the team!

Summary Heading: Trip to Southern California visiting theme parks
Summary: The hotel is new. It is in a great location near the amusement parks and within walking distance of great choice of restaurants.  The staff was very accommodating.  The rooms come with breakfast included which is great.
Manager Response: We hope you enjoyed your time at our close by amusement parks. Thank you for taking the time to let others know about our hotel. We hope to see you back soon!

Summary Heading: Great Stay at Homewood Suites - Anaheim
Summary: First time staying at a Homewood Suites.  Perfect room setup for families of 5 or 6.  King bed, 2 bunk beds, one pullout bed on floor and a hide-a-bed couch in the living room.  Nice kichenette too.  Very clean and looked like a new hotel.  Breakfast was great, with lots of variety.  Hotel doesn't offer shuttle to Disneyland, however, city buses run every 20 minutes and are easily accessible from the hotel.  The walk is about 3 large blocks down and was not a bad walk, but with small children it would likely be too long.  Overall we were very impressed with the Homewood Suites.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review of our hotel and letting others know about our Family Suite and the comfort and space it provides. The shuttle to and from the parks is the same throughout the Anaheim Resort Area, which as you stated provided through an outside company called the Anaheim Resort Transportation. Shuttle passes may be purchased through the Front Desk of the hotel. Thank you again and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: An outstanding hotel in an outstanding location for Disney and I imagine the Convention Centre.  Breakfast every day and an evening social 4 nights a week really reduces the workload on parents of children there for Disneyland.    Pool, golf, basketball and the arcade also make non-Disney days easy to entertain while relaxing.
Manager Response: We love to hear sensational in our title! You really let others know the outstanding things about our hotel in a clear concise way. We hope that you also found the Service Outstanding as well!

Summary: Homewood Suites is great!!!  We've stayed at several hotels near Disneyland (Hyatt Regency, Springhill Suites, Courtyard, Embassy Suites to name a few) and we've decided that we've finally found the "just right" hotel for us.   Everyone we came in contact with, from the valet guy when we pulled up to check in, to the waitstaff at the free breakfast buffet, were all so courteous and friendly. It really shows that the employees there really enjoy their jobs.  We were able to check in early so we parked our car at the hotel and walked to the Toy Story parking lot, hopped on the shuttle and were on our way to the Happiest Place on Earth. The parking lot was a lot better than that at Springhill Suites. The parking spots were generously sized so we didn't have to worry about our car
Manager Response: It means so much that with all of the hotels you have stayed at while in the Anaheim Resort area you have finally found your Home with us! The amenities seemed to work out just perfect and more importantly the service was what stood out more than anything! Thank you for your kind words. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: I dreaded my recent trip to Disney for a convention. My last was many years ago. The noise level in hotels was horrible with gangs of families all around you. My trip this time was so much better. Maybe better insulation in the walls, or placement of guests. (Maybe I was just lucky) but it was actually quiet and peaceful in my room.
Manager Response: I would like to think it was not just luck involved with your quiet stay. We opened in November of last year, which enabled our owners to ensure that they took all areas into consideration when designing the hotel. Insulation was one of those things! We are glad we were able to make your dreaded trip a comfortable one.

Summary: Very clean and modern.  Took a business trip with the spouse.  Staff was very friendly and helped stow and secure luggage before checking in to room - we had arrived a couple of hours early.   Very capable walking distance to Convention Center and GardenWalk Mall. Took us 30 minutes to walk to Downtown Disney - might want to shell out the $$ for a cab. Complimentary breakfast and social hours were excellent!
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review! We are glad that the service, complimentary food, look of the hotel, and cleanliness made your stay enjoyable. With Downtown Disney being at the far end of the Disney Resort area, a cab or shuttle is a great suggestion!

Summary: I had a excellent time at this hotel. The staff was friendly and went out of their way to make sure we had a great time. The hotel is clean and very welcoming! The rooms are very spacious and have lots of room for kids to play. The pool area is very relaxing. We enjoyed sitting by the pool after dinner! Great hotel for family and friends to stay at! I would recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Disneyland or even just go get away for the weekend! Nothing but positive experiences here!
Manager Response: With a city the size of Anaheim and with all of the hotel choices, we love to be called the best hotel in town! We are glad you enjoyed your stay and appreciate your positive feedback. We hope to see you back soon!

Summary: Had 3 nights here - very comfortable stay. 15 mins walk to the theme parks. Staff all very helpful. Evening social meal was nothing to get excited about. Breakfast pretty average. Pool and basketball area great!
Manager Response: Thank you for commenting on the great size room, helpful staff, our Suite Outdoors area, and centralized location. In regards tot he complimentary breakfast and evening social, we are always working to make things better by adding additional offerings and making the ones we have even better!

Summary: I'm very glad to have found this hotel for my last 2 nights in California with my family of 4! From the moment that I enter the hotel I knew I was going to love this place, because of how clean and organize things are. It's true,first impression is very important.The staff are very welcoming with their smiles and that is a plus. I had the 2 queen bed suites that had a mini kitchen included: fridge,microwave,stove-top,dishwasher,and utensils. The room was new,nice and smell of fresh paint. I believe this hotel was built in 2015. I've been to many hotel and by far this one has yet to be my favorite :) I find that every Hilton I stay at have always been the best to stay at. Always make me feel like I'm at home. Trust me I'm super picky when it comes to which hotel I make my
Manager Response: Now that is an incredible endorsement of the hotel! Thank you so much for the kind words about our service, awesome amenities, and centralized location. We look forward to having you back in future.

Summary: This is a top notch hotel with friendly and courteous staff. They will go out of their way to ensure you have an awesome stay with them.  The hotel was extremely clean and the grounds were well maintained. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone staying in the area which is located just a few minutes from Disneyland.  You will not be disappointed!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for mentioning the excellent staff at our hotel. As the GM of the hotel, I have to admit I am a bit biased, but strongly agree that our service team is fully bought in and enjoys a culture devoted to taking care of our guests. This makes the rooms cleaner, the grounds better maintained, and the drive to ensure ultimate service for our guests.

Summary: I'm sorry I didn't call in advance for EARLY Checkin but I had to wait from 115 till 430 for a suite.  I went back 3x to see if it was ready.  In addition, they charged me twice for parking.  Overall a nice building and hotel but need some customer service issues addressed.
Manager Response: I would like to personally apologize for the issues you had with your arrival experience and billing issues. We will take your comments and use them as an opportunity to train our staff in how to properly handle situations like this that arise. I do hope the billing error was handled. Please feel free to contact me at 714.750.2010 if I am able to assist.

Summary Heading: Convenient and lots of useful amenities
Summary: Stayed here in a king suite on a recent trip to Disneyland. Will definitely stay here again when the rates are good. The room had everything needed for a longer stay. Separate kitchen area with a full size fridge, dishwasher, sink, cooktop. Fully stocked with dishes, utensils, bowls, etc. They will grocery shop for you but Target is about a mile down the road. Nice sitting area and desk area. Lots of outlets convenient for charging. They have a social hour most evenings with snacks and beverages. Complimentary full hot breakfast in the mornings.  Pros: Great room layout You can buy $5 daily ART Shuttle passes right at the front desk to get to and from theme parks easily. Stops next door. Breakfast has a large variety of items and lots of seating. Pick a room above the first
Manager Response: Thank you for writing such an informative review of the hotel and everything we have to offer. I look forward to sharing both your pros and cons with the management team to celebrate the success as well as to look into fixing any opportunities to make it better for future guests. We look forward to seeing you in the future!

Summary: Homewood was great and we throughly enjoyed our 6-night stat.  Beautiful, clean, lots of amenities, pool, spa, sink seperate from bathroom area, large refridgerator/freezer.  Good insulation - we never heard our neighbors, comfy beds.
Manager Response: What a great review that really packs in a ton  of information in a short statement. It sounds like we hit on a cylinders with your stay! We look forward to having you back in the future!

Summary: My boyfriend and I just recently stayed at this hotel and it was one of the most genuinely hospitable stays we have had thus far. I usually don't eat the complimentary breakfast, but we decided to wake up and go before a long day. I am so glad we did because the service and food was way better than I expected! The crew was excellent and made sure we had everything we needed. Working in customer service myself, it takes over the top service to blow me away, but let me tell you, the front desk crew was exceptionally positive and extremely helpful! The assistant general manager, Benjamin, made an effort to get to know us and help with recommendations around the area and gave us tips for our Disneyland stay. He is a great representation of what all hotel managers should be like,

Summary Heading: OK location and newer but that's about it...
Summary: The location is great.  The hotel is newer so the facilities are in good condition.  We had several issues though and wouldn't stay here again.  First, I asked about a shuttle to Disneyland.  They said it was out front by the best western and it runs every 20 minutes.  We went and found out it runs about every 45 minutes and that there is a fee per person ($3).  It would have been nice to know that.  It would have been even nicer had they told us we could walk next door (literally it shares a fence) to the Disneyland parking lot and you can get a bus there.  They run every 3-5 minutes max and free :D!  Second, the breakfast food was not good at all.  The eggs are powered eggs and taste horrible.  Most of the food was under cooked and/or soggy.  The evening meals have beer and
Manager Response: Hello Frank D,  Thank you for the detailed review. We are extremely sorry to hear that you and your family were not able to enjoy everything here to the fullest extent. Please know that we have used your comments as a good training opportunity for our team and we know what we could have done better. We also made sure to follow-up with our breakfast menu selection and we are happy to say that it has improved since this review was posted. Please let us know next time you are coming back to Anaheim, we would love to help make your next stay perfect!

Summary: I will continue to stay here.and i will always recommend homewood suites.very nice and clean and great staff.thank you guys you are great .ive stayed here many times,from front desk to all around facility you guys are the best!!!

Don't write a ton of these, but so seldom does a hotel far exceed our expectations that I felt compelled to write one.  First off, we booked 4 months prior to arrival and secured a super low rate of around $159/night for a kids bunk bed suite.  Honestly, the rate seemed low when I booked it...it seems too low now having experienced a week there.  Some notes:  Location - Excellent, roughly a 15 minute walk to the main gates of Disney.  We walked there and back twice 5 of the 7 days we were there with 8 and 9 year old kids.  Walk is pleasant, and you cross 1 major (well signalized) road, and two minor ones.  There were days they passed 40,000 steps on their fit bits, or 10+ miles!!  On the walk you pass a CVS, 7-Eleven, and soon a Walgreens.  We stocked up on some items for the

That is a very very good hotel. The rooms are clean and spacious.We stayed in a king bed suite which had a king bed bedroom and a queen sofa bed in the living are both with their own TV, and a small kitchen with a full size refrigerator ,microwave and oven .The staff are very friendly and helpful. The breakfast was very good.I definitely recommend it for families and long stays.

We went on a 5 night, 4 day Parkhopper pass to Disneyland over the Easter long weekend and this hotel was perfect!  4 and 1/2 star really.  Not ultra luxurious but still very nice and great deal for the money in comparison with other hotels. ROOMS: We had a 2 queen bed suite to start off with on the main floor overlooking the Disney parking lot.  We didn't care if we had a view of Disney because we were at the park until after fireworks every night anyway.  The main problem with the room was it was on the opposite end of the hotel to the lobby so was a really long walk after you had walked all day.  Also the queen bed wasn't ideal for 2 teenagers. I had thought one of them would have used the hide-a-bed in the living room but they were too exhausted to pull it out. The second

Stayed for an extended Easter weekend and it was perfect for our family of 5.  Plenty of room in our suite which was clean and comfortable.  Loved the weekday evening social, didn't have to go out for dinner.  Location was great-walked to Disney, $10 cab back. Will stay again!

Currently staying at this hotel and let me tell you, we LOVE it!!!! Arrived on Sunday March 27 and was immediately greeted and welcomed. Front desk was SO nice and friendly!! Answered any and all questions that I had. The boyfriend and I have been coming to Anaheim every year, twice a year for the past 5 years. We are Disney Annual Passholders and stayed at a few different hotels over the years. I asked him out of all the ones we've stayed at, which one is his favorite, and by far he said "HOMEWOOD SUITES!" If you are planning on going to Disney and don't want to spend an arm and a leg and want to be within walking distance, this is THE hotel! Right around the corner from the Toy Story parking lot. You can take the Toy story bus (#20) to Disney and it pretty much drops you off

Karla and Ben were very professional and had excellent customer service. They took time to conversations with my family and I and made us feel welcomed. They always offered to do anything and make things better.

Summary Heading: I dont know if I can or will stay anywhere else!!!
Summary: This hotel has by far been my favorite.  the beds are comfy the room was quiet.  the pool and hot tub where clean.   a full size fridge and kitchen..The breakfast was delish.  and the nighttime reception on Monday eve was a dinner.  Soup and salad and cheese and chips hummus and fruit.  The location is great.  The staff was so friendly also.  Plenty of parking.

Summary Heading: Home from Home, didn't want to leave!
Summary: We just loved Homewood Suites.  On arrival we were greeted with a warm welcome after a long flight, the receptionist told us we were going to love our room and she was so right!  We stayed in a family room and it was immaculately clean.  It had a full size bunk bed and with a trundle underneath, so could sleep 3 if needs be.  It had everything we needed and our room (334) overlooked the swimming pool and basketball court.    We went to Disney on 3 of the days and the hotel is right next door to the Toy Story Disney Parking Lot.  So after a 4 minute walk we could get on the free shuttle bus to Disney.  The hotel offered a good free breakfast, with waffle makers, a choice of cereal, juices, usually scrambled eggs and french toast, muffins, etc.  The waffles were a big hit,
Manager Response: Novanic,  Our goal is to create an atmosphere where our guests feel like we are their "Home away from home" and I am glad to know that you felt that on your recent stay with us! From the family suite to the Evening social, it looks like you were able to enjoy many of the amenities we provide, and I am glad we did not disappoint. Thank you again for choosing to stay with us, and we look forward to welcoming you home again soon!

Summary: Finally a hotel room with enough AC outlets conveniently located! (Note to other hotels - why do I even have to mention this in 2016?)  A good location for the Convention Center or Disneyland. Rooms are very comfortable.

We picked the Homewood hotel as it was brand new property and was getting very good reviews from previous guests. On arrival the front lobby was very clean and welcoming you could tell this was a new property. The pool and eating area were in good condition and also welcome guests into the facility. The first issue we encountered was we arrived at 3:00pm at the hotel and checkin was not until 4:00pm, we placed our suitcases into the holding room and then went to walk on harbour blvd and look around being advised our room would be ready in 1 hour or less. On return 45mins later our room was still unviable and we were told we would have to wait longer. We then noticed there were two other couples in the same issue we were all waiting to check-in. After waiting another 45 mins we
Manager Response: Icemen1977,  Upon reading your review, it is clear that we dropped the ball during your check-in experience with us. Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience, and also know that I have communicated your feedback to our staff so we can work to resolve the issues you have brought to my attention. However, I am happy to read that you will be staying again with us on future visits to the Anaheim area! Thank you for making us your choice hotel in the Anaheim area, and if there is anything that I can do for you, please do not hesitate in contacting the hotel directly so I can better assist you.

Summary: Better then other high end hotels I have stayed at! I will stay there again and again.  Now my future travels will be looking for Homewood hotels only. I have already told my friends about Homewood suites.
Manager Response: Tish O,  To read that you will stay with us "again and again" really means a lot! I cannot express how great it is to read feedback such as yours. Thank you again for taking the time to share about your recent stay with us, and we look forward to having you back again soon!

Summary: Good place to stay and great front desk help from Jonathan and Cristian, just need to add service helping guests with luggages during arrival and departure. About 15mins walk to Disney w/ kids 20mins.
Manager Response: FamDisneyVacay2016,  Thank you for taking the time to recognize our wonderful Guest Service Agents, Jonathan and Christian! However, I do want to apologize that you were not assisted with your luggage while arriving/departing with us. As I am sure you know, we do not have bell services at our hotel, but someone from our staff should have assisted you. Please know that I will communicate your feedback so we can train and follow up accordingly. Thank you again for choosing to stay with us, and we look forward to having you and your family again soon!

Summary Heading: Great rooms - average rates - poor customer service
Summary: The location (close to Disney) is what attracted us. The rates are slightly above average for the area but the rooms are fantastic for families and I have always enjoyed the Hilton brand. As a plus the complimentary breakfast means you are saving $. However - beware the Anaheim resort tax (not advertised in rates) and the "shuttle". You have to pay for shuttles to the Disney area and they are lousy. We found it better just to walk most of the time (which is not fun considering 3 kids under 7). Also - only one staff member was knowledgeable and friendly, the rest didn't seem to care one way or the other.
Manager Response: Hello Steven R,  Thank you so much for your detailed feedback. We are sincerely sorry that your experience with our staff was anything less than amazing. We always strive for guests to have the best possible impression of us and we will do anything we can to recover from that. We always have a couple good recommendations with the Disneyland shuttle. Please feel free to ask the front desk what they recommend and I'm sure they will steer you in the right direction. We look forward to accommodating you next time you are in town!

Summary Heading: Great hotel fopr families and close to Disneyland
Summary: I love the Hilton suites hotels and this was so close to Disneyland that we walked there each day although a shuttle was available. The rooms were lovely with full amenities which we love: refrigerator, microwave, sink, and kitchenette. They also offered free breakfast which was very nice and a free pre-dinner spread. That was a bit less than I expected or maybe more? As a hot dish was provided. I would have preferred snacks and appetizers before heading out for dinner similar to what the Hilton Embassy Suites offers --- a glass of wine or two and some chips and dips.  Otherwise, a great place to stay.
Manager Response: Susan F,  With our close proximity to Disneyland, I can completely see why you would suggest we are a great hote for families visiting Disneyland. Also, thank you for taking the time to join us during our Suite Start Breakfast and our Evening Social. I cannot thank you enough for providing such wonderful feedback, and we look forward to welcoming you home again soon!

Summary Heading: Don't stay here if they're hosting a group
Summary: Do not stay in room 127. Directly located off lobby. Size of industrial closet. You will hear every noise from the lobby and from the outside you will smell the smoke from the outside. My son never went to sleep so late in his life. Totally messed with our Disney plans.
Manager Response: Thank you N4102FFkimberlyb,  We are sincerely sorry to hear that your stay with us was anything less than perfect. We have already taken your comments to heart and successfully solved the issue that you mentioned in regards to room 127. Please contact me next time you are in town, we would love to help make-up for any shortfalls on your next Anaheim venture.

Summary: We took our son to Disneyland, he was turning 2, to see Mickey.  The room had a separated living room and bedroom.  It faced Harbor Blvd, but the traffic noise wasn't an issue at bedtime.  It's a short walk to the Disney Shuttle stop.
Manager Response: JJSpersrud,  Thank you for taking the time to share about your recent stay with us! I am happy to read that it was a great and quiet stay. We hope that your future plans will bring you back to the Anaheim area, so we can welcome you home again soon!

Summary: Helpful staff, great location, clean rooms and good food. The suite we had was very spacious and comfortable for our family of 6. Breakfast buffet was very good and hot, dinner social was small but good.
Manager Response: Stacie M,  Thank you for taking the time to recognize our helpful staff and for joining us during our Suite Start Breakfast and Evening Social. Your feedback really means a lot, and please know that I will communicate to our staff to commend them on a job well done! Thank you again for choosing to stay with us, and for your time in providing such valuable feedback!

Summary Heading: New and Attractive, but problems with breakfast and the lobby.
Summary: It is a very attractive hotel with many amenities, but we had three issues that will cause us to not return:  1. The breakfast food was always lukewarm and not very enjoyable. 2. My wife likes to drink hot tea, not coffee, and the hot water always tasted like coffee. 3. There were gnats flying all over the lobby while we were trying to work one afternoon.
Manager Response: markwS928NQ,  Please accept my sincere apologies for the issues that you had during your recent stay with us. Also, please know that I have communicated your feedback to our staff to get these issues corrected right away. It is our goal to exceed your expectations while you stay with us, and I can only hope that your plans will bring you back to our hotel so we can make it right by you. You have my contact information in a previous message, and if there is anything that you may need, please do not hesitate to let me know.

Summary: So just to start off upon arriving to the hotel, which looks amazing from the outside, I was greeted by the valet attendant. He was very welcoming and asked if I needed assistance with luggage and if I would like my car parked. I was checked in by Benjamin and can I just say the best customer service I have ever received on a stay. He was very polite and answered all my questions with a warm and welcoming smile. After he explained where my room was and asked if he could assist me with anything else. I felt like I was at home and enjoy time with family. That is true hospitality and Benjamin was able to provide that for me. Once I arrived to the room, I was amazed how nice the rooms were and how clean they were as well. Housekeeping does an amazing job keeping the rooms clean.
Manager Response: Brandon S,  What a great review! All of us at the Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center cannot thank you enough for all of the kind words you had to share. Our goal is to create a warm and welcoming environment for all of our guests, and that is evident in your feedback. Both Veronica and myself would like to thank you for taking the time to recognize us, and we hope to have you back again soon!

Summary: Homewood Suites worked out great for us.  There are other hotels closer to Disneyland that offer similar amenities, but Homewood Suites really sets itself apart with the very best customer service from everyone you encounter. The beds were very comfortable, the two-room suite has practically a full size kitchen, living room, two TVs.  There is convenient parking (there's a charge for parking), a large pool, a kiddy pool and a spa. A buffet breakfast is included as is a nice reception from 5 to 7 p.m. most nights with a salad bar, cheeses, crackers, soup, complimentary beer and wine. You could make a dinner out of it. The hotel does not have a restaurant nor a shuttle bus, but the ART bus stops in front of the adjacent Best Western and the front desk sells tickets. The bus runs
Manager Response: NapaPaul,  I am glad to read that you will be back with us on your next Disneyland trip. I cannot thank you enough for the kind words, and for joining us during our Suite Start Breakfast and our Evening Reception. However, I do want to apologize for the miscommunication on our part of where the ART shuttle picks up. Please know that I will follow up with the team to ensure this information is communicated correctly. Thank you again for a positive review, and we hope to welcome you home again very soon!

Summary: Loved the mini putting green, kids & regular pool, basketball court and Jacuzzi. Staff are so friendly and helpful. Amenities like a full hot breakfast, evening social with light meal/snacks and fresh baked cookies were a family favorite. And the bunk bed suites were awesome. Fit our family of six very well. Close to Disneyland and easy shuttle service from ART. Highly recommended for families.
Manager Response: Suzanne B,  What a great review! I cannot express how great it is to read how wonderful your recent stay with us was. It is clear that our "Suite Outdoors" was the perfect amenity for your family, as well as the family suite. Thank you again for your time in providing this feedback, and we hope to have you and your family again soon!

Summary: It was an overall great experience at their hotel. I would recommend this hotel to friends and family if there are traveling anywhere there might be one. Hotel room was clean and so comfortable to stay in.
Manager Response: T8168KS,  Thank you for taking the time to share about your recent stay at our hotel! I am happy to read that we will be highly recommended by you, and that we will be your choice hotel in the Anaheim area!

Summary: Couldn't really imagine having a better stay. Accommodations, amenities, and Staff were fabulous. I used to travel extensively for Corporate Business, and this stay topped any/all of prior travels. I would recommend this hotel to any/all business colleagues and personal friends.
Manager Response: Robert R,  To read that our hotel "topped any/all of prior travels" is extremely gratifying to read. Thank you for such a great review, and for the patronage. We cannot wait to welcome you home again very soon!

Summary: The hotel was very clean and spacious with an very friendly staff. My room was clean. I plan on staying here with my family when I return. The complementry breakfast was good and it fueled me for my day. The staff was on point with service. My only wish was that there were more snack options availible.
Manager Response: Andrea V,  Thank you for such a wonderful review! Your feedback means the world to us, and I am glad that you were able to join us during our Suite Start Breakfast. Also, thank you for taking the time to recognize our wonderful staff! We all strive to provide a great guest experience, and it is evident in your review. Thank you again for choosing to stay with us!

Summary: This hotel was great. It was wonderful staying in a hotel that was big enough for my large family. My kids loved the bunk bed. I was surprised by the full kitchen. The staff was super friendly, even the house keepers.
Manager Response: It is great to hear that you enjoyed the large rooms and our cozy, fun bunk beds! It is also always great to hear that the entire staff took such great care of you.

Summary Heading: Good for convention visit / Disneyland Anaheim
Summary: Hotel is new. Good room size with everything you need, albeit no disposable toothbrush. Target is 15 mins walk away though. You could get anything there. Concierge slightly understaffed but friendly and efficient. Asked for a rental car and it was delivered in 10.   The only flip side.. Unimpressive Breakfast spread. But overall a good stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting others know about our good size room and efficient service. Please know we are going to be adding disposable toothbrushes to our Front Desk (we also have the good ones available in the 24 hour Suite Shop). We are always working to make our breakfast better, so next time hopefully you will be impressed!

Summary: We loved this hotel!  We stayed in a family suite with a king size bed and a bunk bed that had a trundle underneath, so it slept 3 kids.  It was the perfect size for our family.  The staff was was nice and the hotel was very clean.  Breakfast was amazing, and the breakfast staff were very kind and kept things tidy and refilled.  We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We look forward to having you and your family back! We are so happy that we are the best hotel so far....but our goal is to the best ever!

Summary: We stayed here 2 adults, 2 kids in a family suite for 6 nights.  It was nice having all the space and a refrigerator.  We ate breakfast here several times and it was very good.  They did slightly change it up each day with the hot items.  Plenty of fresh fruit which was very nice.  My boys used the basketball court (check out ball at front desk), hot tub, and heated pool.  Very happy with all.  We did laundry twice as well and it was $4 per load ($2 per machine) and there was always plenty of machines.  The room is large, but the setup is all wrong.  The bathroom door opens into the vanity area so if someone is standing there it's very cramped.  Which also opens into the 2 doors to the closet.  I'm pretty sure whomever did the floor plans to this wasn't thinking about all those
Manager Response: TexasGingerbread,  Thank you for taking the time to provide such an in-depth, and valuable review! It is extremely gratifying to read how intricate your review is, and all of the wonderful things you had to mention. Please know that I have communicated your feedback to our entire staff on a job well done, and to correct all of the deficiencies you have brought to my attention. Again, thank you for your time in providing this feedback, and for choosing to make us your choice hotel in the Anaheim area!

Summary: The sleeping options of reserving a King, bunk, and trundle was terrific for a family of five. This is the first time in two years that each of my children had their own beds, and my wife and I didn't have to share the King with one of them.  Breakfast was more than decent, and the size of the buffet was the largest I've experienced at any homewood suites.
Manager Response: Scott M,  I am glad to read that your recent stay with us was a great one! Also, I am very happy to know that our family suite, trundle bed included, made for terrific sleeping arrangements. Thank you for taking the time to provide such a great review, and for choosing to stay at the Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center!

Summary: I initially had difficulty with reservations and desk. Pricing of rooms were different with desk and travel agent and had no choice to stay and pay higher room rate. My saving grace was a young man named Antonio. I told him my frustration and he adjusted my rates to what I was initially quoted. He was very accommodating and kept my business. The Hotel itself was clean and overall was I was very satisfied.
Manager Response: padelart,  I want to apologize for any inconvenience that the reservation process might have caused you during your recent stay with us. However, I am glad that our Front Desk Supervisor, Antonio, was able to assist you. Please know that I will communicate your feedback to him on a job well done. We are happy to have your loyalty, and we hope to welcome you home again very soon!

Summary: My family stayed here for 3 nights in at the end of January. The smell of new carpets was still in the air. Everything was nice, clean...well, new! The staff was very courteous and seemed happy to be working there. I was surprised they had so many options for family entertainment, (not only a large pool, but also putt-putt, arcade and a small court kids can shoot some hoops). We did not use the transit system (pick up at the hotel next door), instead we walked to Disney's parking lot (maybe 2 blocks?)  and from there took the free Disney shuttle that dropped us at the door of the parks. Overall this was a great stay and we will make this our place to stay on all future trips to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Wife_in_Texas,  We've officially opened our doors on November 12, 2015, and I am very happy to read that the hotel still has that "Brand New" smell. Also, thank you for taking the time to recognize our wonderful staff, in which we all do our best to create a welcoming environment for all of our guests and families staying with us. I am happy to read that we will be your hotel of choice for all future trips to the Anaheim area! Thank you again for your time, and we hope to see you and your family again soon!

Summary: We just stayed here this past weekend and it is the best place to stay if you are going to Disneyland!  It is brand new.  The service is outstanding!  Breakfast was great.  Eggs, egg casserole/cheese omelets, waffles, make your own waffles, French toast sticks, bagels, toast, hash browns, fried potatoes, English muffins, oatmeal, muffins, juices, coffee, hard boiled eggs, fresh fruit, yogurt, bacon, sausage patties.  So many options.  They do change the egg casserole, meat, fruits daily.  I highly recommend this hotel.  It is clean and modern.
Manager Response: Brenda B,  What a great review you left for us! I cannot express how gratifying it is to read a review such as yours. It is clear you were able to join us during our Suite Start Breakfast, and I am very happy to know you exercised all of the options we provided during our complimentary breakfast. Thank you again for choosing to stay with us, and for making the time to share about your recent stay with us on Trip Advisor!

Summary: No communication woke up with no water, and kept getting excuses that it would be fixed in 10mins, then 15mins. We could not shower, use the restroom and get ready for the day. We finally used water bottle to brush teeth and left hotel after hours and water still not on.
Manager Response: I am so sorry for the troubles that you went through with the water, please know that the water going down was by no means planned and was an issue caused in one of the guests in one of our suites. The emergency required us to shut down the water for some time. The timeframe we were notifying our guests was based on the information provided by a specialist brought in to fix the emergency situation. Unfortunately, they were incorrect on their timing. I do want to stress that this was a complete anomaly and not something that should happen in the future. Please allow us the opportunity to make this up to you! Please feel free to email me at keith.moses@hilton.com.

Summary: This is a great location!! It is really close to Disneyland and restaurants. This was my first stay at this hotel and I will definitely stay here again.. The hotel staff was the friendly staff I have encountered in a long time. The rooms were a great size. The entire hotel grounds were spotless.. Whether your a couple getting away for a quite weekend or a family with kids going to Disneyland this is the perfect hotel, everything is within walking distance.. All this plus free breakfast!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review of our property! We take great pride in our accommodations, cleanliness, and making sure we take great care of our guests from a service perspective. We hope to see you in the future!

Summary: This hotel definitely met my expectations. The staff was nice when I was welcomed to their hotel and when you passed by staff members they were always nice. The rooms were really nice. We walked in everything was nice and neat everyday. We stayed for four days and we definitely felt relaxed the whole time, it was definitely a peaceful break from reality. I had my son on this vacation with me and boyfriend with me and they both enjoyed the hotel very much. My son kept saying he wanted to go back to the hotel. I definitely recommend this hotel. Bonus they have an awesome breakfast.
Manager Response: There is nothing better then a nice, relaxing vacation! We are glad we were able to be a part of that and that you were able to enjoy everything the hotel had to offer. We look forward to seeing you in the future!

Summary: This was our first time staying at Homewood Suites and we absolutely loved it. The rooms include a large bedroom as well as living area, small dining room table and a fully equipped kitchen. Breakfast is included and has everything you could possibly want. For those who are traveling Sunday-Thursday, there is also an evening "snack". The night we were there it was delicious tortilla soup, chicken sliders and kale salad. It was much more than a snack and saved us from having to buy dinner. They have activities for kids, game night, etc. The dining room is enormous. If it is your desire to sit a listen to the news on a big screen, you can. If you are traveling with your children, there is a lovely area for watching Disney movies. Homewood Suites somehow has succeeded in
Manager Response: We are glad that you decided to give Homewood Suites a try! You really managed to explain everything we have to offer and more! I truly appreciate and agree that our hotel caters to everyone, whether on business or pleasure. We look forward to seeing you back here in the future!

Summary: I stayed here during the week and was able to enjoy the free breakfast, dinner and DRINKS! Staff were very friendly and accommodating, they were nice enough to give me a room with a firework view! Only issue I had during my stay was the tight space in between the fridge and counter.
Manager Response: Nick J,  Thank you for the wonderful feedback! Given the fact that you'll be back is very rewarding. Thank you for your loyalty and patronage. We cannot wait to welcome you home again soon!

Summary: The Staff was fantastic from check in to check out. Walking through the hotel every staff said hello and smiled. The room was also very nice with everything you would need.  The location is great with lots of things to do. We will be staying again, and i would recommend this place to everyone.
Manager Response: Christine M,  Thank you for such a wonderful review! I am happy to read that from check-in to check-out, your experience with the staff was a great one. We all aim to create a welcoming and comfortable experience for all of our guests, and that is evident in your feedback. Thank you again for your patronage, and we hope to have you with us again soon!

Summary: Stayed here with the family. This hotel has everything you need here for a big or small family. We definitely enjoyed our time here with lots of comfort & laughs. Our room was a family suite with a great view of the Disneyland firework show. It was a perfect way to end our night. It's a new hotel so of course it was beautiful. I love that it's big but not too big. It's just the right size. The pool area is a must especially in the summer. Unfortunately it was winter so I was only able to enjoy the hot tub. But I'm not complain about that! I do know they have a fitness center but I didn't try that out. I really loved the breakfast they provided in the morning. It was complementary so I was wasn't expecting anything too good but it was great! The biggest surprise was the FREE
Manager Response: TIANNA M,  Your feedback on our hotel being your "Home away from home" is wonderful. I cannot express how thankful and gratifying it is to read feedback such as yours. Also, I am happy to know that you were able to join us during our Evening Social. Thank you again for your time in providing such wonderful feedback!

Summary Heading: Best Family Hotel Close to Disneyland
Summary: Well we stayed here on recommendation from my nephew after staying closer to Disneyland entrance the last visit 3 years ago.  We have 4 small children and were excited to book the family suite with bunk beds while my wife and I got a king - well to our surprise the room had a trundle bed underneath the twin bed!!! All of our kids got their own bed (the 4th in a pack-in-play, but there was a couch hide-a-bed), and we got a king!  The staff was amazingly nice and very knowledgeable about the resorts.  The walk from front door of the Hotel is 1 mile to the Disneyland gates (where they take your tickets, not where they screen your bags).  So not a bad walk for the morning, but a little long for the evening with kids.  I would walk back to the hotel and come and pick up the kids and
Manager Response: James C,  I am glad that you chose to stay with us, solely based on a recommendation. What really makes me happy is that we lived up to that recommendation. From the family suite you and your family enjoyed, to wonderful staff, it is clear that your recent stay with us was a great one. Also, I am very happy to read that our maintenance team was able to provide the "Force" for your 4 year old son's light saber!

Summary: Room is so comfortable (bed, pillows)! Kitchen is great. Hot b'fast was good. M-Th evening social: light dinner and drinks - what a nice surprise!  Less than a 10 minute walk to the Convention Center and a quick ART ride away to Disney. We will be back next year!
Manager Response: karenhibl,  I am happy to read that your first time visit with us was a great one! Also, I am glad you were able to join us during our Suite Start Breakfast, and the Evening Social. Thank you again for taking the time to share valuable feedback on your recent stay with us!

Summary Heading: Wow!  Who needs Emb**sy Su**es!  Best Service and Value for your DisneyLand Experience
Summary: Thanks to Christian who worked his magic to help book and place our pair suites near each other.  Friendly staff, beautiful hotel, delicious food and great location. Perfect, Perfect! Already booked a return next month. Thanks again! Fran and Extended Family
Manager Response: Francine M,  I am happy to read that our wonderful Guest Service Agent, Christian, was able to work his magic on making your reservation, and accommodating your family. We look forward to welcoming you home again next month!

Summary: Summary: We loved our stay here.  I couldn't say enough about how happy we were with everything!  Room: Outstanding.  It was brand new.  We stayed in the King Room with bunk beds, and our three children slept comfortably in the bunk and trundle beds.  It was awesome.  Staff: EVERYONE was great.  At the free breakfast, people asked multiple times if we needed anything, cleared our dishes, etc.  The front desk was great.  I mean, the hotel staff was just outstanding and seemed to be proud to work there.  Overall value: Very good.  We stayed for two nights for Disney, and were glad we did.  Location: It is about a 5 min walk to the convention center and about a 1 minute drive to the nearest Disney lot (right next door).  It was very convenient for Disney.  Would I stay here again:
Manager Response: amyandpeteb,  I am very happy to read that you found our hotel and our staff to be very accommodating and was happy with everything. I cannot thank you enough for such wonderful feedback, and please know that I will communicate this to the entire staff on a job well done! Thank you for choosing to stay with us, and we look forward to welcoming you and your family home again soon!

Summary Heading: Great hotel, great location, AMAZING STAFF!
Summary: Everything from check-in with Antonio and Christian, to check-out was simply wonderful! The room (bunk bed family suite) was perfect for our family of four. We took advantage of the kitchen area as well as the separate living area. We had additional family staying in the hotel, so having a place to gather in our room or another room was a must. We enjoyed the wonderful breakfast each morning before heading off to Disneyland. The breakfast staff (Dulce, Yasmin, Carmen, Mario, Anney, and Adriana) did a great job of keeping everything stocked and clean. The breakfast area can be a little hectic with lots of people going in every direction but they did their job every morning with a genuine smile on their faces. Jerry, Jorge, Joyce, and Karla were in charge of the evening reception
Manager Response: The fact that you took the time to actually recall and recognize such a large number of our associates tells me the impact the service we provided had on your stay with us! We take great pride in our accommodations, but it the service that keeps people coming back. We look forward to seeing you soon!

Summary Heading: We LOVE Homewood Suites by Hilton
Summary: Our group travels to Anaheim annually for a conference and have stayed with Homewood Suites by Hilton each year. We appreciate the at-home atmosphere, the hot breakfast and dinner, the modern suites, awesome amenities, and location, for the price we pay. The staff has always been welcoming and helpful.  We recommend this hotel for anyone for any type of travel - most especially if you're traveling with a group of teenagers! Thank you, Homewood Suites!!
Manager Response: We love the fact that you love us! Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for the great comments about the hotel and staff!

Summary Heading: One of the best we've stayed at as a family
Summary: From the staff, to the accommodations (including the room, breakfast, and happy hour), to the pool and hot tub, we were thoroughly impressed. And for us, affordability was an important factor in deciding to stay at Homewood Suites Anaheim. We would come back here in a heart beat, and will recommend it to friends and family.
Manager Response: We are so pleased that we were able to take a small part in your family vacation, by providing the kind of service and accommodations that bring people back. We look forward to seeing you!

Summary: Our recent stay at this hotel was amazing. Everything was well taken care of and the staff was great, especially the maintenance worker Adrain.  He went out of his way to help my family. After a long week in Disneyland my van battery had died just before we were about to depart. He helped me attempt to jump the battery. Unfortunately, it was not successful but Adrian still wanted to help me so he offered to take me to AutoZone up the street (5+ miles). Being from out of town he really saved us and helped me to get a new battery and install it.
