It is never easy being in a frustrating situation like this but Adrian was an amazing help to me and I want to ensure he gets recognized for his quick and helpful actions. Thank you Adrian for offering to help and for going out of your way
Manager Response: Wow, Adrian really did a great job of taking great care of you! I am pleased to report that for reasons such as this as well as his amazing maintenance aptitude, he just won our Employee of the Month for January! Thank you for sharing your story!

Summary: I found this hotel online by chance when I was searching for affordable places for my family Disney trip.  I was impressed with the reviews and price of the hotel and figured we would give it a shot as it was a new hotel and was right beside the Disney parking lot (you can take the Disney shuttle from there for free).  Here is a list of amenities and freebies we got all for the super affordable price we paid: - 1 bedroom suite (1 king bed, bunk bed with pull out, sofa bed, kitchen with complete kitchenware, dining area, living area, 2 tvs and Neutrogena toiletries) - you can comfortably fit 8 people in this room and there was only 3 of us - large lap pool, kiddie pool, hot tub, and water sprinklers for the kids - game room (most of the games are free except for 2 which only cost
Manager Response: You're right...it doesn't get any better than this review! Thank you for mentioning everything the hotel has to offer. We love that fact that we were that surprise hotel for you (we just opened November 12, 2015) that made you declare us the Best in Anaheim! We look forward to seeing you in the future..

Summary: My husband and I only stayed here one night..but wish it was more! I believe the manager said they've only been open since November, so everything is nice a still has a new feel. Where do I start..This was the end of a 5 day trip between San Diego, LA and Anaheim and we had been "on the go" from the time we landed.  So we were looking just to relax before heading home. And that is exactly what we did..checked in around 2pm and did not have a need to leave the property until we checked out the next morning around 9am.  Location- excellent..less than 2 miles from Disneyland and Downtown Disney..as well as plenty of restaurants near by.    Rooms- very spacious, clean and comfortable. We had a room with 2 queen beds, sleeper sofa and kitchenette. The only issue I could see with the
Manager Response: You really gathered a lot of information in such a short stay! We are glad you were able to relax and enjoy all of the amenities we have to offer! We look forward to having you back in the future for a longer stay!

Summary: The staff here was the most attentive, friendliest staff of any hotel I've ever stayed.  Always acknowledged you as you were coming or going.  The location for the Convention Center was extremely convenient.
Manager Response: I never grow tired of hearing all of the fantastic comments about our marvelous staff! Thank you for letting others know about your experience!

Summary: This was a great place.  The rooms were clean and spacious.  The staff was friendly, kind, and courteous staff.  The complimentary breakfasts and evening social foods were excellent breakfast...best I have had anywhere.  I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for letting others know about the hotel. I especially appreciate the fact that we were able to provide such a great complimentary breakfast. We are constantly working to make our breakfast better and it sounds as if our efforts are working.

Summary: We stayed at the Homewood suites for our annual family trip to Disneyland.  We have stayed the Grand Californian and the Disneyland Hotel and they are of course the whole experience. However for what you pay in my opinion it's not worth it especially when you have a GREAT place like the Homewood Suites.  The rooms are great, the grounds are fantastic and clean, and the complementary meals are phenomenal.  The thing that really sets this hotel apart is the staff.  Every single person we came in to contact with made is feel like a million bucks.
Manager Response: I think you said it perfectly, as our goal is to make every guest feel like a million bucks! It is hard to compete with some of the juggernauts in the market, but we do take great pride in what we have to offer!

Summary: Best place to relax, play with your family and let Homewood Suites plan your full day with plenty of first class treatment for a very low price!  Your kids can be themselves and you are free to enjoy adult amenities while they enjoy kid amenities.  Low internet connection was a bit annoying but not bad enough to take any pleasure away from our stay
Manager Response: We were actually designed to ensure that both the kids and adults have an amazing time with all of our offerings and the service we provide. It appears that we hit those targets! Please know that we have been in contact with our internet provider to ensure a must better connection heading into the future.

Summary: The hotel was very clean and room was spacious.  Breakfast needs to improve as food items were overcooked and dry.  The parking fees are high (and charged tax on parking).  There were so many additional fees we paid an additional $96 over and above the room rate for a two night stay.  Checked out other hotels within a one block area which were just as nice; offered the same amenities with FREE parking and FREE shuttle service to Disneyland.  Love Hilton's Homewood Suites in general; but, will stay at a different hotel on our next visit to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know about your recent stay with us and for mentioning the clean spacious rooms. Please know that I have reviewed your comments on breakfast with our department head and cooks and we are constantly striving to and will make things better. In reference to the additional fees, we do have a $16 per night parking fee, which when surveying the area is a standard occurrence. With our proximately being directly next door to the Disneyland parking and across the street from the Convention Center, the parking fee seems to be warranted. There are tax and assessments required of all Anaheim and Garden Grove hotels of a little over 17%, which unfortunately we have no control over. Other than that, there are no additional fees. I would be more than happy to assist in verifying the nature of these fees. Please email me at keith.moses@hilton.com if I am able to assist.

Summary: I really like clean and spacious room with bedroom and separate living room w kitchen and full size fridge. My room is facing the pool(512) even thought the room is next to elevator but we din't hear any noise. Breakfast have good selections.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to let others know about our spacious, quiet suites, as well as our complimentary breakfast served daily. We hope you were also able to enjoy our complimentary Evening Social, open Monday - Thursday, which includes light dinner and beer and wine. We look forward to seeing you back int he future.

Summary: This place is perfect.  New, clean, helpful staff, walking distance from Disneyland, family friendly.  We will be staying here again.  Everyone was helpful and we had a great experience. I would recommend to anyone.
Manager Response: It doesn't get much better than this! Having both Amazing and Perfect in your review makes us beam with pride. Thank you for the wonderful recommendations  We look forward to having you back in the future.

Summary Heading: A Comfortable Stay With the Feel of Home
Summary: We came here for a 2 nights stay to visit Disneyland (Fri and Sat). The Homewood Suites is located within walking distance to both Disneyland and Gardenwalk. They do charge parking but the rate is reasonable since you are so close to the parks. The large pool is refreshing and the hot tub is a plus. There is a fitness center, basketball rim, and putting green to keep the kids busy. I think the best part is the morning breakfast. If you have a family of 4 or more, the food savings nearly pays for the room if you visit on the weekdays. The hotel is clean and the WIFI is connection is good. The only negative I can think of is the queen bed only room. It's not a suite and cramp unless you are by yourself.
Manager Response: You really hit on the majority of the amenities the hotel has to offer and it tells me we are doing something right, when you say that we had the feel of home! In regards to your room, the hotel actually only has two rooms in the hotel that are queen only (and only a total of 25 standard rooms). The remaining 190 are all Suites, ranging from studio, one bedroom, and our family suites (which have a cool bunk and trundle bed).

Summary: Homewood suites normally does very well with taking care of it's guests. My teip wws no different. However, i did jave a few small problems. For starters my hot water wasn't worming properly so two days im i had to switch rooms. Jonathan the night manager was great he took care of it all for me- he even gave me a clean room to shower in for the night.   A few other small problems not worth mentioning occured. Im just glad that Homewood Suites has a great staff ro handle these issues. Cynthia is also great... thanks!
Manager Response: It is great to hear that our wonderstaff staff was able to help make things right for you. For you to remember them by name truly means that they made a difference. Please know that the hot water issues should be behind us. If there is anything I am able to do, please feel free to contact me at keith.moses@hilton.com.

Summary Heading: Great hotel for a memorable Disneyland family visit!
Summary: Great hotel in close proximity to Disneyland.  The suites are designed with families in mind - King size bed for the parents, bunk beds and a trundle for the kids.  This family of five was very comfortable for our six night stay!   The staff is very accommodating, professional and welcoming.  The breakfasts and dinners are plentiful and, with the close proximity to Disneyland, it is easy to come back to the hotel to eat dinner and get back to the park for the evening.  The kids were able to watch a nightly movie outside on the pool deck as well.   Another benefit of the location is the Disney Buzz Lightyear parking lot right next to the hotel.  It is a short five minute walk to the parking lot shuttle which takes you right to the front gate!   We will stay here next time we come
Manager Response: I know from experience how special a family vacation is and I take great pride that our hotel was such a positive part of that memory. Thank you so much for mentioning all the great things (especially the movie wall....I love that thing!).

Summary: Suites are awesome! Great trundle/bunk beds. Great breakfast and great amenities (swimming pool and gym). Walking distance to Disney. I would highly recommend it.  Breakfast was crowded close to closing time but they kept replenishing the food up to the last moments. There is also a nice outfit eating area so there was sufficient place for everyone.
Manager Response: I have to admit, this is the first time we have been referred to as the new girl...but I find it endearing! Thank you for bringing up all of the specifics on the hotel. In regards to the breakfast, it is true it that the generally the final 45 minutes to an hour are by far the busiest. We suggest that guests arrive between 6:30am - 8:30am to avoid the majority of the rush.

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel - close to convention center and restaurants
Summary: Booked this as I was attending trade event at the Anaheim Convention Center.  Very nice hotel and staff.  I would definitely stay there again. What was nice if you don't mind walking you were only a 10 - 15 min. away from lots of nice restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting others know about our wonderful staff and accommodations, as well as our centralized location. We look forward to having you back in the future.

Summary: The hotel was very clean and quiet.  The room and bed were comfortable.  The staff was friendly and helpful.  I would definitely stay here again.  Fantastic location for convention center. Plenty of restaurants within walking distance.
Manager Response: A five night stay is definitely enough to get to know the hotel, and we are happy to hear that we seemed to hit on all cylinders. We look forward to seeing you back with us in the future!

Summary Heading: great hotel for family trip to Disney
Summary: got two suites right next to each other.   New hotel so VERY clean.  Great swimming pool, hot tub and Jacuzzi.   Staff was more than helpful with questions on transportation to and from Disney, good restaurants, etc.  Will definitely stay at this hotel for our next Disney family trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing up to be a part of your family vacation! Love to hear how VERY clean the hotel was and that you were able to use our 'Suite Outdoors' section of the hotel. We hope you were able to check out the basketball court, putting green, and arcade as well. We look forward to seeing you in the future!

Summary: The hotel is brand new.   Which makes using uber or gps sort of difficult.   Every time it tries timeouts us through the Disney parking lot.    But the hotel is great clean, brand new, and a decent selection at breakfast.   It's extremely great for visiting the convention center.   Less than 10 min walk.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share about your recent stay with us! I want to apologize about the location inconvenience with the GPS and Uber, however we are working on improving our location with these 3rd party companies to make for a better guest experience. Thank you again for your time, and we hope to welcome you home again soon!

Summary: I visited with two friends for a 3-day Disneyland trip.  The new Homewood Suites was a great place to stay.  We had a room with 2 queen beds and a sofa bed so that each of us had a separate bed.  Even with the sofa bed open the whole time, the room did not feel crowded.  Although the hotel was quite full and our window faced the busy Harbor Boulevard, we didn't hear any street sounds or noise from other guests. The walls must be extremely well insulated for sound.  A complementary buffet breakfast offered lots of choices for everyone.  The food looked fresh and appetizing.  The staff was constantly refilling the buffet during the entire breakfast period.  Other staff members would frequently come by our table and ask if they could clear the used dishes.  Every staff member I met
Manager Response: SusanK_SJ,  From the Suite Start Breakfast to the wonderful staff, it is clear that your recent stay with us was a great one! I cannot express how gratifying it is to read feedback such as yours. Thank you again for taking the time to recognize our wonderful hotel, and we hope to welcome you home again very soon!

Summary: Last year I spent nearly 150 nights in different hotels, including 12 nights in Anaheim.. This was my first time staying in this particular Homewood Suites. I highly recommend this hotel. It is one of the best hotels I have stayed in, especially for families.
Manager Response: Jordan R,  Your review, given the number of nights you spend in hotels, means the world to us. I cannot express how great it is to read that we will be highly recommended, as well as being one of the "best hotels" you have stayed in. Thank you for the wonderful feedback, and please know that I will communicate this to our entire staff on a job well done!

Summary: Front desk: very friendly and professional. The associates at the front desk were welcoming and very accommodating.¬†  Amenities: Good size pool area and spacious lounge. Restaurant/dining area seemed like a nice spot, there were alot guests there, not empty table in sight. Fire pits are a nice touch as well.¬†  Room: very clean and spacious.¬†  The room had 2 huge HD TV's free HBO. Very modern looking room also. The Kitchen area has everything you need in order to cook if you need to. And we also had a very nice view of the busy street down below and Disney fireworks. The beds were very comfortable as well. The noise level was superb, slept like a champ. All in all, I will be staying here again and I HIGHLY RECOMMEND you do too.
Manager Response: Dear Andrew P,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a nice review for us. I hope we were able to clear a table off quickly for you when you came down for Breakfast! Turnover is so high and we definitely want all our guests to get a Suite Start to their day! We hope to welcome you back in the future! Until then, take care!  Sincerely, Melissa

Summary: Stayed here for a one night visit to Disneyland. Staff courteous and friendly. Nice , spacious room with lounge and kitchen area. Breakfast was the usual Homewood suites food. Extremely sufficient for a big day out. Coin laundry, gym, basketball court, pool. A 15 minute walk to Disneyland. Believe hotel only opened recently.
Manager Response: Dear Lions300,  Thank you taking the time to review us on your brief stay. Hopefully next time you are here you can make it more of an extended stay to enjoy all of our awesome amenities. Until then, take care!  Sincerely, Melissa

Summary: This is the 3rd Homewood Suites Hotel my family has stayed in.  I found them all to be very clean and comfortable.  Perfect for longer stays as it has a good sized kitchen (with full size refrigerator ) and front room area in which to spread out leaving the bedroom free for the using with a door separating both areas.  Found the bathroom sink area a bit crowed with 4 girls!  Overall I would recommend this location for the cleanliness and the location to the parks.
Manager Response: Dear SCBadone,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and brand. Homewood strives to become your Home Suite Home while traveling. We hope to welcome you back in the future. If you need any additional help please reach out to me.  Sincerely, Melissa

Summary: We only stayed one night but we were very impressed. Our room was not ready when we got there, but we were there very early and did not expect the room to be ready. We went to Disney Land while we were waiting on our room, they called us when it was ready and had our luggage in our room when we came back to check in. We grabbed a quick bit and was back at Disney an hour later and enjoyed our 1 day in disney.
Manager Response: Dear Joe Carrie L,  What a quick trip! I am happy to hear that we were pleasant surprise with our customer service was. We hope to welcome you back in the near future!  Sincerely, Melissa

Summary: We had a great stay.  Brand new property with courteous and efficient staff.  Great location.  Easy walk to Disneyland or free Disney Shuttle stops on one side and Anaheim Resort Transit ($5 per day) on the other side.  Large and well equipped  fitness center.
Manager Response: Dear Bill W,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We hope to welcome you back in the future. Until then, take care!!  Sincerely, Melissa

Summary Heading: Look no further for a place near Disneyland
Summary: This Homewood Suites is a new property which is only a 15-minute walk from the main gate to Disneyland/Disney's California Adventure.  We wanted a one bedroom suite and the only one available due to our late booking was a family one bedroom suite.  What a great room.  There was a divider between the bunk/trundle bed part of the room and the king size bed.  They was also a sofa bed in the living room.  Plenty of room.  The sink was located outside of the bathroom, so one could shower while the other person could use the sink without a steamed over mirror!  You would not even need the kitchen in the room for breakfast because that meal is included in the room rate.   The dining area off the lobby was huge!   There was a large island where one would find plates, silverware, hot
Manager Response: Dear Janet L,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. We'd be honored if you could call us your Home Suite Home! We are so thrilled you got a chance to enjoy our hotel fully. Please feel free to contact me if the future to book your next stay.  Sincerely, Melissa

Summary: plenty of room for a family of 5 or more in the room with the king bed and bunk bed since there is an additional pull out bed under the bottom bunk.  was a 20 minute walk to the Park, but the walk home with little ones is long.  Due to the charge for the bus to get to the park, we ended up parking around the block in the Disney parking lot for $18 and taking their transportation which was more cost effective with a larger group and faster since it's a direct route and doesn't make other stops.
Manager Response: Dear Naomi P,  We are happy to hear that our accommodations were perfect for you and your family. The extra trundle bed underneath the bunk is definitely a special add-on that we provide. We hope to welcome you back in the future.  Sincerely, Melissa

Summary Heading: Everything I Have Come To Expect and More!
Summary: This hotel is only about 3 months old, but still looks like it opened yesterday! Beautiful building, nice rooms, helpful staff... I simply have no complaints! Another great experience with Hilton and Hilton Hhonors!
Manager Response: Dear Blake C,  Thank you for being an HHonors member and taking the time to review our hotel. We hope your kind review will get more loyal guests to come visit us and we hope to welcome you back soon. If there are any plans to come back please reach out to me and I'd be more than happy to assist.  Sincerely, Melissa

Summary Heading: Nice Newer Hotel Walking Distance from Disneyland
Summary: We chose Homewood Suites on Harbor Blvd. because of the excellent reviews and the close proximity to Disneyland.  It's a nice property; clean and conveniently located near restaurants, a CVS and other amenities. We had a 1 bedroom suite with two queen beds on the second floor, which overlooked the Disney Toy Story Parking lot.  The room was clean and quiet, and well worth the price paid (about $140).  Overall, we really enjoyed our stay.  The staff was helpful and polite at check in and check out.  We didn't hear much noise and the beds were very comfortable.  Our only complaint was that the hot water was not consistent.  It took a very long time to warm up, and never got truly "hot."  We felt guilty leaving the water running (since we're in the middle of a drought in Calif.)
Manager Response: Dear lmdean,  I am happy to see that your research on our hotel did not let you down. We are conveniently located less than a mile away from the Disneyland Resort and a short walk to the Anaheim Convention Center and we also offer complimentary breakfast daily and a Manager‚Äôs Reception Monday through Thursday.   I would like to however apologize about the water issues you experienced during your stay. If you could email me at Melissa.Ferree@Hilton.com so I can follow up with the maintenance team to make sure that room is better, it would help us. We hope that this hasn‚Äôt soured you on us and we hope to welcome you back in the future.  Sincerely, Melissa

Summary: Great new hotel. Breakfast was good and the rooms were nice. There is a shuttle to Disneyland available, but if you walk next door to the Disney Parking lot, you can ride the shuttle for free. I would highly recommend this hotel to visitors to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Dear Lisa F,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. We hope you enjoyed your stay and that you got to enjoy the many amenities we have to offer. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Sincerely, Melissa

Summary Heading: I Never rate a "10" on anything
Summary: This Hotel rates a "10" on everything.  Excellent Fitness Center.  Short Walk to the Convention Center.  Short Walk to Disneyland.  Excellent Rooms that are clean and the Appliances work.  Great Breakfast in the Morning and the Managers reception in the evening completes the day.
Manager Response: Dear Errol M,  We are HONORED to be given a 10 by you. We hope to convert many more guests and potential guests to what we have to offer. You can call us your Home Suite Home anytime and we truly hope to welcome you back in the future!  Sincerely, Melissa

Summary: This is a new hotel, it is very clean and nicely done with up to date features like lots of charging stations.  It has a separate pool for kids and adults which is nice, and they show outdoor movies by the kids pool.  The Family suite was unique, it has 3 beds for kids, a bunk bed and a trundle bed underneath.  The full kitchen with full size dishwasher and Fridge is great to have, especially when you have small kids who use sippy cups and bottles.  It's a large room and very comfortable for a family.  The staff was very friendly and were responsive to our requests.  They have a complimentary breakfast and evening reception (weekdays) however, we thought the food was not good-well, I'll just say it-the food was bad.  We ended up eating out and not taking advantage of the
Manager Response: Dear Mjoy3636,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. We are very proud of how spacious our family suites are. However, I would like to personally apologize if our breakfast and dinner options were not to your liking. Also regarding the parking and the transportation to Disney I would like to apologize that you experienced difficulties going back and forth to the park. Much like any tourist attraction you will run into the homeless population and while this can be a bit tough we do recommend the ART shuttle. ART does allow parents to hold their children on their laps without an issue since it is a short commute. If you would like to further discuss your trip please feel free to reach out to me at 714-705-0553 or melissa.ferree@hilton.com.  Sincerely, Melissa

Summary Heading: New hotel, very clean, great breakfast
Summary: Pretty obvious this is a new hotel... everything spotless (sometimes a rare gem in a busy area like Anaheim is that is frequently visited by families). One thing that stood out to me was the breakfast area.. boy they are prepared for a crowd... 4 waffle stations, lots of hot food options, and plenty of tables.  Other than room & breakfast, didn't use or see rest of hotel... but am thinking this could be a place to bring the family and not have to worry about a crowded, can't find a seat, breakfast experience.
Manager Response: Dear pmmnc,  Thank you so much for taking the time to commend our Breakfast staff. We definitely count on them to flip tables and continue to have the hot food coming out. We hope summer and competition season will be manageable that we continue to be on top of things for our guests to enjoy their stay. Hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely, Melissa

Summary: Great place! Lovely rooms, great location for the convention center. I couldn't believe how amazing the managers dinners were! After a long day at a conference it was so wonderful to come back to a lovely dinner and a glass of wine. Everyone was so welcoming and friendly. Planning on using Homewood again for the conference next year!
Manager Response: Dear Adrienne W,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. We absolutely love convention time around Anaheim. So many happy, laid back guests who are just so excited for new products and displays. We hope to welcome you back next year!  Sincerely, Melissa

Summary: We arrived early after a change in plans and they handled it beautifully.  The staff went above and beyond with every request and was super friendly.  Room was clean and quiet.  Free breakfast was awesome and you can't beat the location.   I would absolutely recommend to anyone in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer H,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. Are goal is really to make everyone's stay the best possible one. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future. Until then, take care!!  Sincerely,  Melissa

Summary Heading: First time in the new hotel
Summary: We stayed here for 5 nights and spent 3 days at Disneyland. The hotel is still brand new so everything is fresh and clean. The property was very clean, from the time you drove up all the way to the rooms.   The front desk staff was very attentive and provided great service. We had two minor maintenance items and the staff was very quick to resolve them.   Our room was the family suite that had the bunk/trundle bed, which was great for the kids. The beds were very comfortable. The full size refrigerator and dishwasher are a great thing to have for an extended stay.  Having Direct TV was a plus, no limiting the TV options after a fun day out. Also, the wi-fi was great! Two of us were streaming video at the same time with no issues.   Our only disappointment was the breakfast. Yes,
Manager Response: Dear Walter M,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are happy you enjoyed all of our amenities. We do sincerely apologize about the minor issues you experienced while you were here and hope that you will still consider us in the future when coming to Orange County. Regarding the breakfast, we are working on enhancing the taste and hope you still found items to enjoy.  Sincerely, Melissa

Summary: We stayed here for a week. The hotel is new and has lots of thoughtful amenities. My son enjoyed the nightly movies by the pool, which has a kiddie pool, heated pool and a spa, plus grills, comfortable rattan seating and a fire pit. They also have patio heaters when it gets cool. There's an arcade, putting green, workout room, laundry facility and business area with access to PCs and a Mac as well as a printer.  The lobby area has coffee and tea out day or night and the breakfast has several options, including eggs, waffles, fresh whole fruit, etc. And the light dinner four nights a week is also helpful. The dining area is comfortable and clean.  The rooms are well appointed with plenty of space. In addition to the small kitchen, eating and living area, the bedroom had a small
Manager Response: Dear grassrootsgoddess,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so thrilled we could provide amenities that you and your family could enjoy. We hope to welcome you back in the future. Until then, take care!  Sincerely, Melissa

Summary Heading: Sparkling New Facility and Energetic Staff
Summary: Please stay here with these wonderful folks. Aside from everything else they had to offer - the smiles, the accommodations, the friendliness, and the concern for your happiness - they have free wine!!  Great place to stay for Disney or the Anaheim Convention Center!
Manager Response: Dear Chris E,  You are welcome back anytime! Please reach out to us directly the next time you are coming down to Orange County; we will take care of you and your guests.  Sincerely, Melissa

Summary: We stayed at this hotel on a weekend birthday trip to Disneyland with my two daughters and a friend. I chose it for its close proximity to the parks and the free breakfast option. The rooms were clean and comfortable. Breakfast was great with many different selections. The walk to the park is only about 10-15 minutes. Really easy.
Manager Response: Dear Charlotte W,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We hope you enjoyed your Birthday and we are thrilled to have been a small component of the celebration. Hope to welcome you back in the future!  Sincerely, Melissa

Summary: I loved everything and everyone during this stay. They were all extremely accommodating, present, friendly, helpful and everything in between. It was extremely clean and comfortable. For the price it is above and beyond!
Manager Response: Dear Fabi R,  Thank you for taking the time to give us a shout out for our customer service. We hope to welcome you back in the future!  Sincerely,  Melissa

Summary Heading: Excellent property.  Brand new, spacious and clean.  Just arrive early for b'fast.
Summary: My family stayed here for 4 nights during the Disneyland half marathon weekend in January.  We loved this hotel.  It's withing walking distance to the main entrance (about a mile I think) but with our young kids we opted to take Uber to the gate and save our energy for the parks.    I didn't get to try it but the outdoor pool appears to be heated as I saw numerous people swimming and playing in it in 60 degree (or lower) weather.    Breakfast can be a tad challenging here during a busy weekend when there simply doesn't appear to be enough room and the food quickly runs out.  Although the staff did work hard to restock the empty trays so one just has to be patient.  A busy weekend also means an overflow in parking as there simply isn't enough room for all the cars in the lot and
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive review! With a heated pool, I can see how comforting it was to take a dip, especially given the fact that it was 60 degrees out. Also, I do want to apologize for the madness during our Suite Start Breakfast, however, I am glad it did not taint your stay too much with us. Thank you again for the wonderful words, and please know that I will communicate this to our staff on a job well done!  Thank you, Benjamin Ly Assistant General Manager

Summary: I write this as a Hilton Honours Gold member - For comic con two adults and two kids stayed here in two queen beds. safe, comfy rooms with lots of space. friendly and helpful staff, free parking, free breakfast.
Manager Response: It is always wonderful to read feedback such as yours! I cannot thank you enough for sharing your time with us, and I do want to note that we do not provide complimentary parking, however during your recent stay, it looks like someone on our staff wanted to extend a gift to you and your family. Thank you again for choosing to stay with us, and we cannot wait to welcome you home again soon!  Thank you, Benjamin Ly Assistant General Manager

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for the runDisney Star Wars Half Marathon. And, it was a wonderful experience from beginning to end. First, although the reservation was in my name, they allowed my friend who was sharing a room with me and my daughter to check in without me since I would be arriving late. They had valet parking when we checked in which was helpful because it was very crowded. Our room was very nice. Obviously, as a new hotel, one should expect a nice room. But, the design is better than the room at the older property also on Harbor Boulevard. Guest Services was very helpful. After running 13.1 miles, I needed a band aid for a blister on my foot. When I asked if they sold them, the gentleman at the counter went into the back office and just gave me four. Also, when my
Manager Response: Dear Tina L,  I am so happy to hear that our customer service was something that you appreciated. Our staff here works very hard and still they are very sincere. In the future please reach out to me directly so I can assist you on getting the best rate; we'd love to welcome you back.   Sincerely, Melissa

Summary Heading: Still suffering from being newly renovated
Summary: Even as a Hilton property, this place is staffed with people how are very new to the hotel business. They don't know how to meet expectations yet. The clerk did not seem to know how to make change for a $3 granola bar. The A/C runs not and cold only; warm was not an available option. Breakfast hours require your to be up early, even on weekends.
Manager Response: Dear George R,  Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback from your recent stay. If you wouldn't mind reaching out to me at Melissa.Ferree@hilton.com I would love to correspond with you to get more information on the A/C issues and to hear how the staff responded to the issue.   With regards to our breakfast hours; breakfast is served from 6:30am- 9:30am daily. This is done to accommodate both business and leisure guests. I do apologize if you didn't receive that information at check in. We hope that the next time you come to the Anaheim Resort area you will give us another chance.  Sincerely, Melissa

Summary: We stayed here mid January & we're stoked with our hotel choice.  There were 5 of us so the trundle bed worked a treat, being able to quickly store it gave us loads of room.  The rooms are spacious & nicely fitted out with the added bonus of having super comfy beds & great linen.  The location is excellent, we walked next door & caught the toy story shuttle to Disney which were constantly rolling through.  The complimentary breakfast, light supper & cookies were an added bonus.  Staff were friendly & helpful with many great recommendations.  Would stay again
Manager Response: Dear qtmuzz,  Thank you for the great review. We are happy that our Family Suite was perfect for you and your group. At 565 sq. ft. you can definately make this your Home Suite Home! The breakfast, light supper, and cookies are definately a great addition to the beds, linen, and staff. We hope to welcome you back in the future!  Sincerely, Melissa

Summary: New hotel, about a 20 minute brisk walk to Disney.  Staff was great, helpful and quick to respond. Rooms clean.  Has an outdoor 14 person hot tub, smaller kiddie pool and a normal size pool. Self parking at about $16 per day. Large breakfast area. The time I was there, there was  an evening reception Sunday through Thursday. Stayed there for a run disney event and the route for that race went past the hotel out and back, so it was good for viewing.  Coffee and tea available in lobby all hours. About a 40 minute drive to LAX, via routes 405 and 22, although we were not driving during rush hour. I also believe there is public transportation to the parks, but I did not use it. Washer and dryer available $2.00 for each per load.  There is a 24 hour CVS about 5 minutes away walking.
Manager Response: Dear Mike P,  Thank you for covering ALL of the benefits of our hotel! We are happy you enjoyed your stay and hope to welcome you back in the future!  Sincerely, Melissa

Summary Heading: Not prepared for Disney Marathon weekend
Summary: The hotel is new and in a good location, but has many issues that need to be addressed.  -With a true parking cost of over $18 a night with tax, there should actually be a parking space available, instead of parking in a fire lane around the back of the building.  -Saturday breakfast items were empty, the staff could not keep up with food. By 9:00, random things were being brought from the kitchen. With marathon weekend, there were many families of 4-6 per room, not the normal business crowd of 1 per room. They severely underestimated volume. -Given that it was marathon weekend, ending breakfast at 9:30 is too early. I can see weekdays, but not on weekends. Folks go to the theme parks late, then get up to a cleaned up kitchen with IHOP as the breakfast option. -Soundproofing is
Manager Response: Dear dawright0310,  We are sorry we were not able to provide you with a better quality of service. This is not typical of our hotel and staff, and we are always looking for ways to improve our customer experience. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we try hard to make sure all of our guests have a great stay. Thank you for your feedback and we hope you will consider staying with us again.  Thank you, Melissa

Summary: I booked the hotel when it was newly opened. I had some concerns and expected that maybe some construction still ongoing, pool and gym not open, etc. I would say it was a lovely surprise to find out that the hotel was all operating well. Location: walking distance to the Convention Center, walking distance to Disney. In fact one DL parking is outside the hotel. Staff: very friendly and helpful. And happy. Food: Not the best food you can get, but to the price I think it is fine. Gym and pool are very nice. All in all, I recommend this hotel and would stay again!
Manager Response: Dear JennySB,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are extremely pleased that you liked our property. The food is one thing we are constantly improving based on the previous feedback. We hope to welcome you back in the future.  Sincerely, Melissa

Summary: I'll start off by saying I'm a Hilton member (for years) and usually choose Homewood Suites because I like the separate bedroom/kitchen concept for my family, so I was quite excited to see this new hotel in Anaheim. I booked online and a day before our arrival, I was prompted to "check in and choose your room" which I thought was a nice feature. After quite a bit of research, including a call to the hotel itself to confirm, I chose an even-numbered room facing Disneyland so we could see the fireworks.   We arrived and I told the front desk person we had already checked in and I just needed keys to the room.  He gave me keys to a different room than I had chosen.  After about ten minutes of back and forth, it was determined that they didn't actually hold my room, gave it to
Manager Response: Dear A L,  We are sorry we were not able to provide you with a better quality of service. We are always looking for ways to improve our customer experience and this has been brought up to the housekeeping team. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we try hard to make sure all of our guests have a great stay. Thank you for your feedback and we hope you will consider staying with us again.  Sincerely, Melissa

Summary: I had a great first stay. Although I was not able to check in early, I received a call when my room was ready. My room was quite comfortable. HBO was included. The staff was quite friendly and helpful. The included breakfast was great. Although I did not partake, a happy hour with food was also included (Monday through Thursday). The location was close to Disneyland--easily walkable or reachable by bus (Routes 1 or 2). There were many eateries nearby. I'd definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Hardrocker8888,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. Early check in are based on availability, but I‚Äôm happy to see that our team did reach out to you once the room was ready. We hope to welcome you back in the future. If you need any assistance please reach out to me directly.  Sincerely, Melissa

Summary Heading: Great location, but some bugs to work out
Summary: My wife and I stayed at this brand new property (so new in fact you can still smell carpet glue and fresh paint) in January 2016.  It's in an awesome location, a mere ten minute walk to both the Disneyland Resort and the Anaheim GardenWalk.  Staff were extremely friendly and helpful.  The breakfast area is large and able to accommodate crowds, even on weekends when everyone is at breakfast at the same time so they can get to the Disney parks.  Now to some of the downsides.  Hallway corridors at this hotel are long and rooms can be quite a distance from elevators.  Something to consider if you're traveling with seniors or small kids.  Parking can be inadequate.  The night we checked in, there were only three parking spaces left in the self-parking lot.  The HVAC system in our
Manager Response: Dear HNS1102,  Thank you for the feedback from your recent stay. We are happy that you liked the location, the staff, and breakfast. I am, however sincerely sorry for the hot water issues you experienced, and with regards to parking we are in the works of getting valet to assist with parking on busy weekends. The valet will be complimentary on top of the parking fee we have. We hope to welcome you back in the future; feel free to reach out to me for assistance or to go in further with information from your last stay.  Sincerely, Melissa F.

Summary: PROs: > Room was extremely spacious, though it was odd that the style of the room was very dated for a new hotel.  > Good location for Disneyland & Convention Center. For Disneyland, just walk to the Toy Story parking lot next door and hop on the shuttle. Walking distance to the Convention Center.  > Staff was extremely friendly & helpful.  CONS: > Somewhat noisy. Could easily hear people upstairs, in the hallways, and outside. It wasn't a big concern but was still noticeable.  > Not a big deal, but the bathroom sink's water pressure was extremely high & the faucet was positioned too close to the back of the sink, so the countertop often became extremely wet. So, avoid putting anything you want to keep dry on the counter.
Manager Response: Dear Erica O,  Thank you for taking the time to write us a review. I am sorry for the inconveniences you experienced at our hotel. Please call me in the future to book your stay, I will try my best to locate you on a high floor away from noise.   Sincerely, Melissa F.

Summary: Our suite was very spacious and clean and very comfortable. We did have a problem with the toilet either not flushing or continually Flushing they were very good about coming up and trying to fix it each time and for the inconvenience they gave us $40,000 points which was good for a free room for another visit I was very pleased and satisfied with the customer service. The breakfast is great for families on the go to Fuel up before going to the parks
Manager Response: Dear 1955mickeyfans,  Thank you for allowing us to make things right for the inconvenience with the plumbing. We cannot wait to welcome you back in the future! Please call me directly to book that future reservation for you.   Sincerely, Melissa F.

Summary: Watched this hotel being built last year when I visited Anaheim for a convention. I then booked 5 rooms in this brand new hotel, sight unseen.  Four rooms were studio suites and one was a one bedroom suite.  Each room was clean, bright and well appointed in every way.  Nice, fully furnished kitchen, living room and bedroom areas. Comfortable bedding and great shower.  Now, the unexpected - a great breakfast that changed each day served in a huge buffet area.  No waiting for one waffle maker or chafing dish - honestly the best breakfast buffet ever.  An added plus was the snacks/dinner served from Monday through Thursday that was different each night and served as a dinner including wine and beer.
Manager Response: Dear SusanKNewYork,  Thank you so much for taking a chance on us; we are thrilled we did not let you and your party down. Hope to welcome you back in the future; feel free to reach out to me directly for reservation assistance if you need any help.  Sincerely, Melissa F.

Summary: Great location to Disneyland with all the conveniences of home.  Clean and friendly environment.  Free breakfast and coffee is a plus, the manager's reception was a nice surprise.  You do not need a car if you are going to Disneyland or other nearby parks.  The shuttle transportation is easy and affordable.
Manager Response: Dear Karen R,  Thank you for the 5 star review. We consider ourselves not only a Home Away from Home, but a Home Suite Home! With fully stocked kitchens, complimentary breakfast daily, and evening manager's reception family can kick back and enjoy their vacations. We hope to welcome you back in the future; feel free to reach out to us if you need any reservation assistance.  Sincerely, Melissa

Summary: My business stay here was exceptional. Joe and Miguel from maintenance went above and beyond, without even asking. Keith, the manager, was refreshing to watch as he made sure everyone was being taken care of, even the staff. I watched as he held doors for them and asked about their day - who does that!? Wonderful stay and I would recommend staying here. I'll be back!
Manager Response: Dear Paul H,  Thank you for noticing how caring and extraordinary our team is. It really does start at the top for us and with Keith being our General Manager it really is our main goal to make every interaction with guests the best possible one.   We hope to welcome you and your family back in the future; please feel free to call us for reservations assistance if needed!  Sincerely, Melissa F.

Summary: This is a new hotel in the area. Seems like they've been in business for years. Just based off the hospitality & welcoming arms they had for my boyfriend & I.We got a junior suite. Very nice.Britney and Antonio at the front desk was beyond great. She greeted me with a smile when I came down for breakfast (which was delicious), & answered every question I had. & he made sure I was enjoying my stay. Best service I've had in years at a hotel. Coming back soon.
Manager Response: Dear khloejackson,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We definitely are a new property, but we boost one of the BEST TEAMS in the area! We hope to have you stay with us again in the future; do not hesitate to reach out for reservation assistance!  Sincerely, Melissa F.

Summary Heading: This Homewood Suite makes you feel at Home.
Summary: A recent trip to Anaheim for a trip to the happiest place on earth brought us to the newly opened Homewood Suites.  From check in to check out, with complimentary breakfast and a hotel manager's evening get together, it felt like home.  The staff here make it a warm comfortable place.
Manager Response: Dear Glenn H,  Thank you so much for making us part of the family! We definitely strive to make this a Home Suite Home for everyone! Until next time!  Sincerely, Melissa F.

Summary: This is a brand new hotel. We stayed here for a volleyball tournament. It's a very nice hotel, clean, close enough to everything. The rooms are great because of the kitchen accommodations. The breakfast is complimentary and complete. This hotel is ideal for families and if you are staying a few days in the area. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Carol A,  We are so happy we could be a part of your Anaheim/Volleyball Trip. Hope to see you next time you are in town. For business or for leisure, that choice will be up to you.  Sincerely, Melissa F.

Summary: Granted this hotel is only 2 months old, everything was so clean. Our room was so welcoming and I wasn't expecting the kitchen to be so amazing! The breakfast and evening reception was great. The service was outstanding! Could not be happier with my experience...
Manager Response: Dear Nicole A,  Thank you for the amazing review. We are happy to hear that the rooms, breakfast, evening reception, and service exceeded what you were expecting. We hope to welcome you back in the future.  Sincerely, Melissa F.

Summary: We had a great stay at this hotel. Clean big rooms with a small kitchen and comfy beds. I was very happy with the variety available at the breakfast buffet. The staff was very helpful and accommodating and it was a great location. Close walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear mizo_a,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. I am happy to hear that you liked our beds and the close location to Disneyland. We hope to welcome you back in the future.  Sincerely, Melissa F.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for a Disneyland visit, and I must say I left pleasantly surprised. Service was excellent, rooms were very clean and spacious. It included breakfast, dinner, and wifi. Parking wasn't expensive, and walking distance to Anaheim Resort Transport. I definitively would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear jairo_lopez,  Thank you for the 5 star review! I am thrilled we exceeded your expectations. Our complimentary daily breakfast, our Monday through Thursday Manager's Reception, and our complimentary WIFI are definitely a perk when going back and forth to the Disneyland Resort. Can't wait to welcome you back!  Sincerely, Melissa F.

Summary: This new hotel was more than I expected, from the decor to the room it was top notch. It was an easy walk to Disneyland, although the shuttle stop was right next door for when I didn't feel like walking. The staff was friendly and the check in and out was super efficient. The breakfast was excellent
Manager Response: Dear Carolyn S,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. Please feel free to reach out to us for assistance in booking your next stay when you come  down to Anaheim.  Sincerely, Melissa F.

Summary: My daughter and I stayed here for 4 nights during November 2015. The hotel had only been open a few days before we arrived and we were the first guests in our suite. Everything was perfect, from check in to check out. Complimentary breakfast was offered each morning as well as drinks and snacks in the evening. What puts this hotel above others in the Anaheim area are the staff. Everyone, from front desk to maintenence went above and beyond to ensure our stay was amazing.  Although there are other Anaheim hotels that offer similar accommodation I would definitely return to this one because the staff made us feel like family. We will be back in November :)  PS. Ask Ben, (the manager) if he can identify any of the songs they play throughout the hotel. He kept telling us he had
Manager Response: Krystyne B,   I cannot thank you enough for the positive feedback, and for being one of our very 1st guest in our brand new hotel! It was a pleasure meeting you and your daughter, and I am glad to read that your 4-night stay with us was a great one! Please know that I will make sure to communicate your feedback to our entire staff to commend them on a job well done. Thank you again for choosing to stay with us, and we cannot wait to welcome you home again very soon!  P.s. I still believe I have great musical knowledge, however, we shall see when we meet again!

Summary: Helpful staff all the time and would return again.  With 6 kids breakfast was excellent.  Rooms could be a little larger but staff being SO helpful overlooked that.  Close to the maingate, is walkable even with children.  Showing a movie at night was an excellent idea.
Manager Response: Dear 817gays,  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.  Sincerely, Melissa F.

Summary: We stayed here because my son had a volleyball tournament at the Anaheim Convention center.  It was close enough to walk to the center.  The parking was free and they had a large selection free breakfast and complimentary coffee all day long.  We had a couple of his fellow players staying with us, but with the extra pull out in the living area, we had plenty of room.  The hotel was very clean and the staff was very pleasant. I will stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear HBHappy23,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are happy that the close location to the Anaheim Convention Center and complimentary breakfast was a perk for you and the team. We hope to welcome you back when you come to the area!  Sincerely, Melissa F.

Summary: I was very happy with Homewood, the new hotel is very clean and has a great buffet for breakfast with 4 waffle irons and dinners were good as well, my favourite was nacho night complete with two kinds of cheese and even pulled meat and topped of with warm cookies at night.  My best night was Christmas Eve when we came back from the park late and they turned on the Milk machine for my kids to get milk for Santa and then asked if we had cookies :) Big room's and the kids loved the bunk beds even had a trundle. Loved not paying for a suttle to Disney could take Buzz and Woody bus for free
Manager Response: TButte,  Thank you for taking the time to provide such wonderful feedback! I am also very happy to read that you and your family were able to join us during our Suite Start Breakfast, as well as our Welcome Home Evening Reception. We, at the Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center, have strong beliefs in the spirit of Christmas, and I am glad that you and your family feel the same, given the fact that milk and cookies were left for Santa's arrival! Thank you again for choosing to stay with us, and I hope that your future plans will bring you back to the Anaheim area!

Summary: Great place, super comfy beds and very clean! The pool and fire pit area is very relaxing. Our family really enjoyed the breakfast.  Staff was very accommodating especially the manager Ben Ly.  He made us feel very special.  Will stay here again for sure!!
Manager Response: Chanserei B,  Upon reading your feedback, it looks like your recent stay with us was a great one! From the comfy beds to our "Suite" Outdoors, it looks like you and your family were able enjoy all of the amenities we had to offer. It was a pleasure meeting you and your family, and all of us here at the Homewood Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center cannot thank you enough for the patronage and we look forward to welcoming you and your family home again soon!

Summary: This hotel is new so cleanliness was as expected. The bed was extremely comfortable. Walking distance to Disneyland so not having the hassle of finding transport was welcomed. Complimentary breakfast was a big bonus, as was dinner Mon-Thurs, though food wasn't to my liking most nights who can complain when its part of your room rate! The staff were very friendly. Nothing seemed to much trouble for them. Room tip: Do not stay in a room on the ground floor by outside amenities. Very noisy!
Manager Response: Dear sherynw2016,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are happy you enjoyed our location, as well as our dining amenities! We definitely love the fact that families can enjoy a big, hearty breakfast before taking off to the Happiest Place on Earth. We hope to have you stay again with us in the future.  Sincerely, Melissa F.

Summary Heading: Family Staying with Kids and Grandparents
Summary: Our room had 2 queen beds and a sofa bed with kitchen.  The room was clean and big enough for the whole family to stay in and we had room to walk around.  We used the kitchen and had supper there one night.  The kids played at the basketball court and video game room and had a good time.  The breakfast consisted of eggs, sausage, bagels, oatmeal, juice, coffee, waffles etc. so there was a lot of options.  The breakfast staff was working hard and did a great job.  The room seemed quiet day and night.  If I had to complain then I would about paying another $16 for parking and there was not a bathtub...if you want that kind of thing.
Manager Response: Dear Bradley J,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. We are happy that you and your family enjoyed everything our hotel had to offer. With regards to the parking fee, unfortunately being in the Disneyland Resort area parking is a premium and is charged at all the hotels in the area.  We hope to have you stay with us again, please feel free to reach out to me directly, i'd be more than happy to assist you.  Sincerely, Melissa F.

Summary Heading: Family Disneyland Holiday ruined Charged twice on C/Card and left with little money
Summary: Charged twice on credit card total stay was approx $2635 USD for 14 nights paid $1300 from Visa card on arrival (23 dec) and $1300 from Master card 4 days later (27 dec)  and told them to take money now so bill is nearly paid except $35. but they put on hold (pending bank takes money and can't be used) on 3 different occasions $35, $100 and $1250 USD which for incidentals  phone food drinks charged to room ect.  was told by staff this is usually $50 USD very apologetic for the mistake but could not refund in cash saying pending will be removed after 3 days still not in account manager reluctantly (it seemed) cancelled payment of $1300 which will cancel pending payment and refund $1300 to me but will have to pay back to them which is fine by me but it will take 5 to 10 business
Manager Response: Dear Sabina G,  We sincerely apologize to you and your family. Like I have mentioned in the response below with your husband, Alan G, with the holidays falling on the day that this was brought to our attention there was nothing that we could really. We did our best to assist you both, however giving cash wasn't an option since we don't carry that much cash on hand. We hope that this hasn't soured you on our hotel and hope to welcome you back in the future!  Sincerely, Melissa F.

Summary Heading: charged twice and left with little money
Summary: credit card charged once and almost same amount put on hold (pending) over 3 separate transactions totalling nearly $1800 AUD left with little money for half the holiday finally  refunded (not in cash) put back on card and cleared 2 days after arriving home no compensation or discount offered just apologies didn't help feeding kids going on tours ect. HOLIDAY RUINED  Breakfast buffet not good stuck to toast and cereal
Manager Response: Dear Alan G,  We apologize for any inconveniences you experienced at our hotel. Again with you staying over the holidays your bank was unable to release the holds on your debit cards since they were also on holidays and not operational.   We feel like we tried our best to assist you with reaching out to our merchant services to release partial hold, as well as offered to contact your bank once they came back from being closed, however your banks didn't participate in authorization releases. The holds and lengths the holds that were held are completely up to your bank and we, as a hotel, just have to collect payment on our end. Unfortunately we were unable to refund you in cash due to the fact that the holds were attached to the payments we took and if we had refunded you we would be out of payment.   Lastly, when approached by the management team on your last day you told us that the stay was fine and would have appreciated this candid comment prior to leaving. We hope the best for you in 2016.  Sincerely,  Melissa F.

Summary: Stayed Jan 15.  With family, place is new and immaculate. Beds and pillows very comfy. The free morning breakfast is great, just enough to get you going. Evening social drinks and snacks were great free incentive too.  Staff are exceptional at all levels Only complaint would be the wifi, which is just plain woeful but I was on holidays, so quite an incentive to switch off
Manager Response: Dear Thereisnouseridleft,  Thank you for taking the time to write us a review. We appreciate the feedback on all levels. We are very proud of our staff and our dining offerings. Our apologies with the WIFI, we are working on raising the bandwidth for the complimentary WIFI, however we do offer bandwidth upgrades for an additional charge. Hope to have you stay with us again in the future when you come back to the Disneyland Resort area.  Sincerely, Melissa F.

Summary Heading: New Building, wonderful service, great amenities!
Summary: We stayed at this hotel last week on a 2 day trip to Disneyland from San Diego.  The family suite and hotel in general vastly exceeded our expectations.  Britney, who checked us in, was extremely helpful and friendly.  The evening reception (Mon-Thurs from 5-7pm) was a welcome surprise.  We had a light soup and salad meal with snacks, two selections of beer and two selections of wine.  It was wonderful.  The pool was great but heat could have been turned up a notch or two.  Great outdoor fire pit, game room and grills available for guests.  Also a movie playing for the kids.  The family suite had a bunkbed, queen bed, pull out bed and trundle underneath the bunkbed--it fit our family of five perfectly.  The kitchen was outfitted with pots/pans, microwave, utensils and a cooktop.
Manager Response: Dear badgergirl7901,  Thank you so much for staying with us and writing us a great review. Britney is amazing in her role and we will make sure to give her our appreciation for being named personally. We hope to see you again and we will happily welcome you back!  Sincerely, Melissa F.

Summary Heading: New Hotel, walking distance to Disneyland, Nice services and amenities
Summary: My family stayed at Homewood Suites for 3 nights over New Years Eve and thoroughly enjoyed the room, pool and spa and the complimentary breakfast. The hotel is new so this is an added benefit and it is walking distance to Disneyland. With friendly and courteous staff it made our stay all the more better. Highly recommend. The only improvement I would ask for is for bacon at breakfast and scrambled eggs that are not chopped into little pieces! The rest of the breakfast was great.
Manager Response: Dear  John F,  Thank you so much for the 5 star review and for taking the time to give a shout out to our staff. We were super excited about ringing the New Year with our guests and happy you could be a part of it. Hope to see you and yours soon.  Sincerely, Melissa F.

Summary Heading: Fresh, new building. Housekeeping needs some work.
Summary: We enjoyed our 3 night stay in December. The building is brand new and still has the new paint and carpet smell. Our 2 Queen Bed Suite was a lot larger than similar rooms at other locations. However, there is one room design flaw, at least in Room 352. When you open the refrigerator door it comes within 1 foot of the counter on the other side of the small kitchen. The only way to fully access the refrigerator is to squeeze through this one foot space. If you try to close the refrigerator door when you are standing in front of it you are squeezed into about a 1 foot square space. A person who has a bit larger body type would find that the only way they can use the refrigerator is to lean over the open door to access the inside of the refrigerator.   Now to the housekeeping. After
Manager Response: Dear WaCoCal,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel; however I sincerely apologize for the inconveniences you experienced with our housekeeping team. I will make sure to speak our Executive Housekeeper regarding the towel replacement procedures. I hope you definitely do reach out to me regarding your future stays in Anaheim. Until then, take care!  Sincerely, Melissa F.

Summary: Nice hotel new property in the area. Location is great to get to Disney. Excellent Breakfast selection and large eating area. Try to placed on a higher floor it will be quieter. Rooms are a little smaller than over properties but still worth it. Fantastic for famalies
Manager Response: Dear ALAN B,  Thank you for the time to write us a review. We are happy you enjoyed our rooms and the other amenities of our hotel has to offer. Please let us know the next time you are coming down and we'll be more than happy to welcome you back.  Sincerely, Melissa F.

Summary Heading: Felt like our own condo in Anaheim
Summary: We just stayed here for vacation and thought it was nice with many amenities. It's brand new so the halls and rooms still smell like new carpet and have a modern decor. We did online check-in and picked a one-bedroom suite (519) that we hoped would face the Disney fireworks and it did!   We usually stay at a larger hotel like the Hyatt or the Hilton, but we liked the cozy and quiet, family-oriented feel of this hotel. The location is convenient for walking to Disneyland, restaurants, Target, other shopping, etc.   The one-bedroom suite has two dressers - one in the bedroom and one in the living room. The two flat screen TVs are large and swivel so you can easily view as you are getting ready in the AM, etc. There were many, many high definition cable channels including multiple
Manager Response: Dear Finalsan,  Thank you for being a Hilton Honors Member and thank you for taking the time to review us. We hope in the future you will consider us for your Home Suite Home! And we definitely invite you to come down for our Breakfast and Manager's Evening reception next time you are here.  Sincerely, Melissa F.

Summary Heading: Great hotel for family of 6 to go to Disneyland!!!
Summary: Hotel service was excellent!  Rooms were new, clean, and comfortable.  Make sure you get your Disneyland tickets online so you don't have to wait in line.  You can print them in the hotel business center.  The Toy Story parking lot "woody" is next door!  We just walked to parking lot shuttle which tools us to park entrance!  We did not need to use hotel shuttle!  Hotel room kitchen was a nice plus!  I would stay here again especially if you are bringing 4 teenagers!!!  We loved the jacuzzi, basketball court, pool, light food & drink from 5-7 on Monday through Thursday and Disney movies playing by the pool!!!
Manager Response: Dear clandry2015,  Thank you for taking the time, whilst dealing and raising 4 teenagers, to write us a glowing review. We are happy that our team could make your vacation one that went smoothly. Can't wait to welcome you back!  Sincerely, Melissa F.

Summary: This new property has much to offer all travelers from Park goers to convention guests. From the great comp. breakfast to the pool, basketball court, arcade and office area this hotel features all the latest amenities that you will need during your stay. Staff were all very helpful and eager to serve, which is refreshing considering other hotels around Disney. Manager Ben Ly was especially helpful in resolving a small issue we had and made our stay very pleasant. Overall this great new addition to the area has all the bases covered with much attention to details and all you will need to have a great stay. We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Dear Danny S,  We are so grateful to have guests who genuinely appreciate us. We considerer each and every guest who walks through our doors as family. We want everyone to enjoy themselves and when we hear that guests like you have, it really makes it all worth it.  Please reach out to us next time you are heading down and we'll be more than happy to welcome you back.  Sincerely, Melissa F.

Summary Heading: Not to Hilton's Standard-back to the Doubletree it is!
Summary: I stayed here from December 23-27, 2015.  I had high expectations of a new hotel.  Let me say that my family frequents Disneyland on a monthly basis.  Our go-to hotel is the Doubletree Suites.  However, I canceled reservations there to stay here for a little more space.  The pro's: Front desk customer service is outstanding.  We were able to check in at 10 am.  The rooms are clean & comfortable (we had a 2 queen bed suite). The breakfast is nice.  The cons- housekeeping is atrocious.  We were asked if we wanted our room cleaned twice-REALLY??!!  Of course we do.  Housekeeping failed to vacuum, clean mirrors, wash dishes, trashed my Starbucks recyclable cup and never left enough washcloths and face towels,   I am back to the Doubletree next month.
Manager Response: Dear Monicke F,  First and foremost, I am sorry we didn't meet the standards you are used to with the Hilton and Homewood Brand. Thank you for giving us your feedback, this has been discussed with our Housekeeping Supervisor and we are following up to try to ensure that this does not continue to occur.  On the other note, we are happy you enjoyed our front desk staff and the breakfast service. We hope in the future you might give us another chance.  Sincerely, Melissa F.

Summary: This hotel has the friendliest, most professional staff. Everyone from the front desk to the housekeeping to the folks putting out the breakfast and evening refreshments was pleasant to talk to as well as very helpful. The rooms were lovely, kept clean and spacious. The location next to the Toy Story Parking as well as walkable distance from Disneyland's entrance was great. Breakfast was good but the eggs could use some help. We made the nightly reception twice and found a good selection. However, never saw the cookies that were on the facebook page we saw once we got home. Great facebook page by the way with Darth Vadar as a guest/employee. Very funny. Only downside which is true of every hotel now is the noise volumn. We could hear everyone walking in the hallways as well as
Manager Response: Dear 2011_BAM,  Thank you for your review. We are very proud of our staff and the level of enjoyment they take in their jobs. Based off reviews like this we know we are all on the right path.   With regards to the cookies; we are very sorry. We actually place them at the front desk at 7:30pm Monday through Thursday and they are first come first serve. When you come back to the area please reach out to us to book your reservation and we'll  do our best to save you a cookie.  Sincerely, Melissa F.

Summary: We stayed 12 nights at the new Homewood Suites (29th Nov - 11th Dec 2015).  There was myself (mum), plus 2 daughters aged 20 and 17.  We stayed on the fourth floor in a 2 Queen Studio Suite with views towards Disneyland - so we could see the fireworks at night. From the moment we arrived, we were very happy with this hotel.  After arriving from Sydney, Australia after an almost 14 hour flight, it was great to get an early check in at around 9.30am - we were also delighted to get a late check out at 4pm on our departure day. The hotel itself looks very nice and stylish both inside and out.  I love the open area to the right of the lobby/reception area which is where you have breakfast and the evening suppers.  It is very open, warm and inviting - especially with the lovely
Manager Response: Dear OzTraveller067,  Thank you so much for the feedback and glowing review. We have come along way from the opening month and are happy to say our team is still as strong and welcoming as ever. Please reach out to us the next time you are coming into town; we'll be honored to have you call us your Home Suite Home.  Sincerely, Melissa F.

Summary Heading: good value for proximity to park: and CLEAN
Summary: Very comfortable rooms and for xmas holiday was soo clean.  Very impressed with service at front desk. Breakfast was so so, but I will trade clean room, quiet room for so so food any day. I didnt use the couch bed cause that was lumpy and uncomfortable, but the couch with a blanket is awesome, use a seat cushion against the pillow and your bed for one will be a great place for that extra family member.  We had completmentary popcorn for being a rewards member so use your Hilton rewards card here as well.
Manager Response: Dear Windmortage,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and thank you for being a Hilton Honors Member. We are happy we could be a part of your holiday season and look forward to welcoming you back next time you are in town.  Sincerely, Melissa F.

Summary: We just checked in and found that no baby crib was ready depite of our request on reservation. So I thought it was just mistake and asked for a baby crib again, but the answer was no baby crib is available. I mentioned that I had made a request. But the lady at the front desk just kept saying they cannot guarantee it and the policy is just 'first come first served'. It was not so late. I checked in at 7PM.  Actually I changed the hotel from one inn at Newport beach to this hotel as the inn emailed to me just after the reservation that they don't have baby crib. I believe this is why we make reservations. There could be some reasons they cannot meet customer's requests. Then they should do what they can do. But nobody in Homewood suites does that. They just say 'No guarantee.
Manager Response: Dear Hongig A,  I want to sincerely apologize about the inconvenience we caused you. We will be speaking with our team to make sure we do everything in our power to meet requests that are essential like this one. We are a family hotel and welcome all families, big or small, young or just young at heart.   I would love for you to reach out to me if you have the time. I want to make this right for your and your family. Please call the hotel directly and ask for me or email me at Melissa.Ferree@hilton.com.  Sincerely, Melissa

Summary: The place is quiet compared to the last place we stayed at in the summer. The rooms are huge. Had a decent breakfast for a motel. Crowded so plan for it. We walked next door to the Disneyland parking lot shuttle. Easy walk. Staff was friendly. Early check in would have helped us.
Manager Response: Dear Brian P,  Thank you for taking the time to review us. We are happy to hear you enjoyed the rooms, the staff, and the breakfast. We always recommend our guests come down before the rush, usually 8:00 am- 9:30 am; just a little tip for when you come back.   Sincerely, Melissa F.

Summary: This is a great hotel for familes who will be visiting Disneyland. The suites are very spacious and the kitchen is a bonus to prepare a lite meal to help on your meal budget. The breakfast buffet offers a variety of items so if you want that hot breakfast you will find it or just a bowl of cereal with yogurt. The design of the lobby is great with plenty of seating for the breakfast. Monday - Thursday evenings offer lite appetizer happy hour which way very enjoyable.
Manager Response: Dear Hilda M,  We do feel like we are a great hotel for families on a budget. We have a great breakfast, a wonderful light reception Monday-Thursday, and our kitchen are perfect for meal prepping. Thank you for helping us get the word out and we will be happy to welcome you back when you come down!  Sincerely, Melissa F.

Summary: The hotel just recently opened and if there were any "hiccups", I was unaware of them.  From the moment we checked in, we knew we were in good hands.  Antonio provided us with an early check in so we could park our car and walk to Disneyland (about a 15 minute walk, under a mile) The grounds are definitely kid friendly, a basketball court, putting green and pool.  Rooms are new and large, most with kitchens, some even have bunk beds for the kids.  The evening meal included warm food, salad and wine, all inclusive.(but only Monday thru Thursday)  Breakfast included a waffle bar, eggs, bacon, sausage, french toast and more, again included in the price every day. Everyone working there is anxious to please and very pleasant.  We will be returning!
Manager Response: Dear Cherrygirl029,  Thank you for the kindreview. We are so happy to be improving with each passing day and pleased to be noticed for our outstanding customer service. Antonio is a great supervisor and he, along with the rest of the team, love making connections with our guests. Feel free to call us your Home Suite Home away from home.  Sincerely, Melissa F.

Summary: The hotel is great for the price.  Very spacy rooms, close to Disney (we figured to go into the next door parking lot and use the free parking bus), curtious staff, quite, new and very clean.  Accessibility and parking are an great free extra.
Manager Response: Dear Miguel L,  Thank you for taking the time to review us. We appreciate the shout out for our customer service. Please feel free to reach out to us in the future for all of your Disneyland Resort stays! :)  Sincerely, Melissa F.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay and close to Disneyland
Summary: We appreciated the family suites with the bunk beds for the kids.  Breakfast was great.  Simple access to Disneyland via the ART buses. Would definitely stay here again when we return. The staff was friendly and helpful.  CVS down the street if you forgot anything.
Manager Response: Dear Doug O,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. We are happy you and your family enjoyed the Family Suites, as well as breakfast and the Manager's Reception. Please reach out to us in the future when you come to the area. We will make sure to set you up in a great room!  Sincerely, Melissa F.

Summary: We recently stayed at the brand new Homewood Suites and were very impressed by the friendliness of EVERYONE on staff at the hotel.  The rooms are very nice with comfy beds and a small kitchen if needed.  The location is handy to Disneyland with shuttles close by.  Having a complimentary delicious breakfast and a light dinner  help a great deal so you'll have more money to spend at Disneyland!!
